Grulzul,
그랜드 워로드 Dortene에게 서명

Source: The Khajiit's have a strange religion. Do you know they believe themselves the perfect people? I wouldn't imagine the perfect race quite so ... furry. Of course I held my tongue when Nullini told me this. I can't afford to offend those I travel with, lest I disrupt my shipments to you.
Target: Khajiit의 종교는 이상합니다. 당신은 그들이 자신을 완벽한 사람들이라고 믿는 것을 압니까? 나는 완벽한 레이스를 아주 상상할 수 없을 것이다. Nullini가 나 한테 말했을 때 나는 물론 내 혀를 들었다. 나는 내가 여행하는 사람들을 화나게 할 여유가 없습니다. 왜냐하면 내가 당신에게 선적을 방해하지 않도록하기 위해서입니다.

Source: There are so many Khajiit gods! Nullini was patient as she explained them, but I'm not quite sure why a religion has to be so complicated. When I remarked so, Nullini simply laughed and said, ''Complicated? This one would go mad, should she be told to follow as many rules as you do!'' How funny an outside view can be!
Target: 매우 많은 Khajiit 신들이 있습니다! Nullini는 설명 할 때 인내심을 가지고 있었지만 종교가 왜 그렇게 복잡해야하는지 잘 모르겠습니다. 내가 그렇게 말했을 때, Nullini는 단순히 비웃고 말했다. 이 사람은 당신이하는 것처럼 많은 규칙을 따라야한다고 말하면 화를 낼 것입니다! 외모가 얼마나 재밌는가! - G

Source: I've been thinking of Nullini's question. Why does the thought of others harvesting the Green not offend me? As long as it is not from the Valenwood, and as long as I don't harm the Green myself, I find myself uncaring. I know many of my kind hold this view, but why? I hope this shipment is enough to forgive my never-ending questions.
Target: 나는 Nullini의 질문을 생각 해왔다. 왜 그린을 수확하는 다른 사람들의 생각이 나를 괴롭히지 않습니까? Valenwood 출신이 아닌 한, 그린에게 해를 입히지 않는 한, 나는 자신을 알지 못한다. 나는 내 견해를 많이 알고 있지만 왜 그런가? 이 선적으로 끝이없는 질문을 용서할 수 있기를 바랍니다.

Source:
For pre-purchasing the game, you have received the Explorer's Package bonus features. 

• You can play any standard race in any alliance
• Your Scuttler non-combat pet is now in your Collection
• Your Treasure Maps are attached

Note that your treasure maps are bundled in alliance-specific packages for your convenience.
Target:
예약구매를 하셨기 때문에, 탐험가 패키지를 보상으로 받게 되었습니다.

• 모든 기본 종족을 모든 연합으로 플레이 할 수 있습니다.
• 비전투 애완동물 Scuttler이 수집품에 추가됩니다.
• 보물지도가 추가됩니다.

편의를 위해서 보물지도는 연합 특별 선물에 함께 들어있습니다.

Source:
<<1>>,

Greetings from Grand Warlord Sorcalin. As one of the Dominion's finest Champions, you are hereby granted the following reward. May it aid you in the battles to come!

Fireluin,
Scribe to Grand Warlord Sorcalin
Target:
<<1>>,

그랜드 워로드 소칼린이 인사드립니다! 자치령에서 가장 훌륭한 챔피언 중 한명인 당신에게, 이와 같은 보상을 드립니다. 이 물건들이 당신의 전투에 도움이 되기를!

파이어루인,
그랜드 워로드 소칼린의 서기관

Source: I recently remarked to Nullini how odd it was that she knew so little of Wood Elf customs. I have a hard time reading Khajiit expressions, but I believe I struck a nerve. She snapped at me, ''Well, what do you know of my people?'' And then she stalked right off! You know, I do think she's right. Perhaps it's time to ask some questions myself.
Target: 나는 최근 Nullini에게 그녀가 우드 엘프의 관습을 거의 알지 못한다는 것이 얼마나 이상한 것인지 말했습니다. 나는 Khajiit 표현을 읽기가 힘들지만, 나는 신경을 썼다고 믿는다. 그녀는 내게 물었다. \\\\\\\\\\"그럼 내 사람들에 대해 어떻게 알았 니?\\\\\"\\\\\"그리고 그녀는 즉시 스토킹을했습니다! 있잖아
column4: 나는 그녀가 옳다고 생각해. 아마도 그것은 나 자신에게 몇 가지 질문을 할 시간이다. - G "

Source: Congratulations! Thanks to your exemplary efforts and the work of the warriors in your alliance, you have been crowned Emperor of Cyrodiil.\n\nLong may you reign!
Target: 축하드립니다! 당신의 모범적인 노력과 연합의 전사들의 활약으로, 당신은 시로딜의 황제 자리를 계승하였습니다.\n\n오래 통치하시길!

Source:
<<1>>,

Grand Warlord Zimmeron extends warmest greetings to you, loyal Champion. He is grateful for your part in our efforts in Cyrodiil. He awards you this gift and trusts you will continue to fight for the Pact..

Dreet-Wulm,
Scribe to Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target:
<<1>>,

정예 전쟁 군주 짐머론은 가장 충성스러운 챔피언인 당신에게 따뜻한 인사를 전합니다. 그는 시로딜에서의 우리의 노력 중 당신의 역할에 대해 감사드립니다. 그는 당신에게 이 선물을 수여하고 당신이 조약를 위해 계속 싸울 것을 믿습니다.

정예 전쟁 군주 짐머론의 서기,
드리트-휠름

Source: Yesterday, Nullini and I we were approached by one of the young Khajiits. He smirked and asked, ''That one has so many questions for you, Nullini. Tell me, has he asked for a taste?'' She simply waved her hand and replied, ''If he does, he'll get the same answer as you did!'' And then they both laughed! Khajiit truly are the strangest race.
Target: 어제, Nullini와 나는 젊은 Khajiits 중의 한 사람에 의해 접근되었다. 그는 웃으며 물었다. \\\\\\\\\\"그 사람은 널 위해 아주 많은 질문이있어
column4: Nullini. 말해봐
column5: 그가 취향을 물어 본거야? \\\\\"\\\\\"그녀는 손을 흔들어 간단히 대답했다. \\\\\"\\\\\"만약 그렇다면
column6: 당신이했던 것과 똑같은 대답을 얻을거야!\\\\\"\\\\\"그리고 그들은 둘 다 웃었다! Khajiit은 정말로 이상한 종족입니다. - G "

Source: I finally wrote a letter home. It must have been five pages long! I had Nullini look it over. Twice. She told me that any family who would be upset by a son such as myself are fools. I have to admit, I did tear up at that. She pretended not to notice. I never thought a Khajiit would become one of my most steadfast friends.
Target: 드디어 집에 편지를 썼어요. 5페이지나 됐을 거예요! 누리니를 시켜서 살펴보게 했어요. 두 번이나요. 그녀는 나 같은 아들 때문에 화낼 가족은 모두 바보라고 말했어요. 인정해야겠네요, 그 말을 듣고 눈물을 흘렸어요. 그녀는 모른 척했어요. 카지트가 나의 가장 확고한 친구 중 하나가 될 거라고는 생각도 못했어요.

Source: Another camp, another rumor. I'm not shocked that the others think I'm sweet on Nullini, but it is irksome. She takes the comments in stride though. I'm glad to have her wit, as I simply blush and grow silent when a snide comment is made. Nullini's also becoming a reliable partner in collecting my materials, and her fees are quite reasonable.
Target: 다른 캠프, 또 다른 소문. 나는 다른 사람들이 Nullini에서 달콤하다고 생각하지 않는다는 사실에 놀라지 않지만, 그것은 귀찮다. 그녀는 보폭으로 의견을 가지고 간다. 나는 그녀의 지혜를 갖게되어 기쁘다. 왜냐하면 나는 단순한 얼굴이 붉어 지거나 숨 막힐듯한 말을 할 때 조용해진다. Nullini는 또한 자료를 수집 할 때 신뢰할 수있는 파트너가되어 그녀의 수수료가 상당히 합리적입니다.

Source:
<<1>>,

Greetings, brave Champion. Accept this reward on behalf of the Covenant. Grand Warlord Dortene appreciates your efforts. Now back to the battlefield!

Grulzul,
Scribe to Grand Warlord Dortene
Target:
<<1>>,

안녕하시오, 용감한 챔피언. 규약을 대신하여이 보상을 수락하십시오. 그랜드 워로드 Dortene은 당신의 노력에 감사를 표합니다. 이제 다시 전장으로!

Grulzul,
그랜드 워로드 Dortene에게 서명

정예 전쟁 군주 짐머론은 가장 충성스러운 챔피언인 당신에게 따뜻한 인사를 전합니다. 그는 시로딜에서의 우리의 노력 중 당신의 역할에 대해 감사드립니다. 그는 당신에게 이 선물을 수여하고 당신이 조약를 위해 계속 싸울 것을 믿습니다.

드리트-휠름

Source: Today I was asked to leave the Wood Elf group I was traveling with. They were quite candid in that they wished to not be seen with someone they so easily called a ''traitor to the pact.'' Well, I never! It's certainly all right, as I'd rather travel on my own than with those who would mock me.
Target: 오늘 저는 함께 여행하던 우드엘프 그룹을 떠나라는 요청을 받았습니다. 그들은 그들이 너무도 쉽게 \조약의 배신자\"라고 부르는 사람과 함께 보여지지 않기를 원한다는 점에서 꽤 솔직했습니다.  음
column4: 저는 결코 그렇지 않습니다! 저를 조롱하는 사람들과 함께 여행하는 것보다 혼자 여행하는 것이 더 좋기 때문에 확실히 괜찮습니다."

Source: I am happy to be back in civilization. I return to the city as I once entered this world--wet, hungry and completely naked. A word of advice. When you play dice with a Khajiit, do not wager your armor. Your components are enclosed.
Target: 문명으로 돌아오게 되어 기쁩니다. 이 세상에 처음 왔던 것처럼 -- 축축하고, 배고프고 완전히 벌거벗은채로 이 도시로 돌아왔습니다. 한마디 하자면. 카짓과 주사위 놀이를 할때  당신 갑옷은 걸지마세요. 당신 물건이 다 들어있으니까요.

Source: I've rented a small warehouse in Anvil for bulk goods. Now I may purchase directly from laden ships, store at the warehouse, and resell as needed. I'll need a good name for the placard, of course! It took a while to narrow down my options, but I've settled on "The Bolt Hole."
Target: 나는 대량의 물건들을 위해 앤빌의 작은 창고를 빌렸습니다. 이제 나는 적재된 배에서 직접 구매하여 창고에 보관하고 필요에 따라 재판매할 수 있습니다. 물론 플래카드에는 좋은 이름이 필요하겠죠! 선택의 폭을 좁히는데 시간이 좀 걸렸지만, \\"볼트홀 (The Bolt Hole)\"\"로 결정했습니다. "

Source: I know it may sound odd, but lately I've been dreaming of woodworking. Oftentimes I imagine a woodworker I've met on the road, but sometimes it's my own hands that craft the wood. I always awake feeling guilty … but also excited. I'm not sure who else I can speak of this to. Thank you for being not only my employer, but a steadfast confidant.
Target: 이상하게 들릴지 모르지만, 최근에는 목공업을 꿈꾸고 있어요. 종종 길에서 만난 목공(木公)을 상상하기도 하지만, 때로는 목공(木公)을 만드는 것은 제 자신의 손입니다. 저는 항상 죄책감을 느끼지만 흥분하기도 합니다. 이 일을 누구한테 더 말할 수 있을지 모르겠어요. 저의 고용주일 뿐만 아니라 변함없는 측근이 되어주셔서 감사합니다.

Source: I must apologize for the delay. I am traveling with a caravan of entertainers, primarily females. I am not used to girls, or their customs. They roll their eyes a lot, and seem to reply to everything by saying  what? I only recently realized they do that to give you the chance to change what you said.
Target: 늦어지게 되어 정말 죄송합니다. 저는 대부분 여성으로 이루어진 극단의 상단과 함께 여행하고 있습니다. 전 여자들이나 그들의 관습에는 익숙하지 않습니다. 여자들은 눈을 부라리며 모든 말에 뭐라고? 라고 대답하는것 같습니다. 제가 최근에 느낀바로는 이는 상대방에게 말을 바꿀 기회는 주는 것 같습니다.

Source: My new business is no longer "The Bolt Hole." Last night a crowd of drunken sailors arrived. From the name alone, they expected my new establishment to be a house of ill repute! To avoid further confusion, I changed the name to "Bolts in Bulk."
Target: 나의 새로운 사업은 더 이상 \\"볼트홀 (The Bolt Hole)\"\" 이 아닙니다. 어젯밤 한 무리의 술 취한 선원들이 도착했습니다. 그들은 이름만 보고는 내 새로운 사업장 이 매춘굴이라고 생각했습니다! 더 이상의 혼란을 피하기 위해
column4: 나는 이름을 \"\"볼트 인 벌크 (Bolts in Bulk)\"\"로 바꾸었습니다. "

Source: I erred again with my business name. "Bolts in Bulk" drew a different crowd of drunken sailors. It seems "bolt" is a local euphemism for something you'd associate with a bawdy house. This rules out my alternate names: "The Bolt Store," "The Better Bolt," and "Barrelfuls of Bolts." I've gone with a safe alternative: "No-Bilk Silks."
Target: 나는 내 사업명에 또 실수를 저질렀습니다. \\"볼트 인 벌크(Bolts in Bulk)\"\"는 또 다른 술 취한 선원들을 불러들였습니다. 이곳에서 \"\"볼트\"\"는 매춘굴과 관련 있다는 것의 완곡한 표현인 것 같아요. 그래서 대체 이름들인 \"\"볼트 스토어(The Bolt Store)
column4: \"\" \"\"베터 볼트(The Better Bolt)
column5: \"\" 그리고 \"\"배럴풀스 오브 볼트(Barrelfuls of Bolts.)\"\"를 제외시켰습니다. 나는 안전한 대안을 찾았습니다. \"\"노-빌크 실크(No-Bilk Silks).\"\" "

Source: I hope these components reach you on time. I was delayed. I swore I would not return to that gambling caravan, but I found myself there once again, and I lost my wages. They told me I was gullible, so I had to go back. How else could I prove them wrong?
Target: 이 물건들이 제 때 도착했길 바랍니다. 제가 조금 늦었어요. 다시는 도박 상단으로 돌아가지 않겠다고 맹세했었지만 어느새 거기로 다시 돌아가있었고 제 임금을 잃었어요. 그들은 제가 잘 속아넘어간다고 했고, 전 돌아갈 수 밖에 없었어요. 어떻게 하면 그들이 틀렸다는걸 증명할 수 있을까요?

Source: Ridiculous! "No-Bilk Silks" is the name of a well-known Argonian night-swain. I learned this from the well-heeled sailors who arrived last night, vastly disappointed he wasn't available for "conversation." I give up! Now I'm calling my business "The Raw Deal." I can only hope everyone thinks it's the least appealing brothel in Tamriel.
Target: 말도 안 돼! \\"노-빌크 실크(No-Bilk Silks)\"\"는 유명한 아르고니안 밤 청년의 이름이었습니다. 나는 이걸 어젯밤에 도착한 부유한 선원들에게서 알았는데
column4: 그는 \"\"대화\"\"를 할 수 없다는 것에 크게 실망했습니다. 난 포기할래요! 이제 나는 내 사업을 \"\"로우 딜(The Raw Deal)\"\"이라고 부르고 있어요. 나는 모든 사람들이 여기를 탐리엘에서 가장 별 볼일 없는 사창가라고 생각하길 바랄 뿐이예요. "

Source: As always, here is your shipment! You know, I just realized this, but I've never fully explained to my family back home what my current employment entails. I speak of traveling and trading, but never of the materials I work with. I've resolved to send them a letter to correct this, as soon as possible.
Target: 언제나 그렇듯이, 여기 당신의 화물이 있습니다! 방금 깨달은 건데, 제가 현재 일하고 있는 일에 대해 집에 있는 가족들에게 충분히 설명해 준 적은 없어요. 저는 여행과 거래에 대해 이야기하지만, 제가 일하는 재료는 절대 말하지 않습니다. 저는 가능한 한 빨리 이 문제를 해결하기 위해 그들에게 편지를 보내기로 결심했습니다.

Source: You are to be congratulated for arriving at Champion 100. As a commemoration of your achievement, the Manimarco costume has been added to your Collection!
Target: 챔피언 레벨 100에 도달하신 것을 축하드립니다. 당신의 업적에 대한 기념으로 Manimarco 의상이 수집품에 추가되었습니다!

Source: Do you happen to recall the shady Nord fellow I traded with, after leaving the Redguards? Well, by Y'ffre, I've met him again! I'm not quite sure if it's a stroke of luck or.... No, there's no way this man is following me. That would be ridiculous. Just coincidence, that's all!
Target: 혹시 제가 Redsuards를 떠난 후 거래했던 그 음습한 Nord 동료를 기억하시나요? 음, Yffre가 그를 다시 만났어요! 운이 좋은 건지... 잘 모르겠어요. 아뇨, 이 남자가 날 따라올 리가 없어요. 그건 말도 안 돼요. 그냥 우연이에요, 그게 다예요!

Source: You have achieved Champion 60 — most impressive! In celebration, a special Dark Seducer costume has been added to your Collection.
Target: 챔피언 레벨 60이 되셨습니다 — 정말 대단하군요! 축하의 의미로, 특별한 다크 새듀서 의상이 수집품에 추가되었습니다!

Source:
<<1>>,

Grand Warlord Zimmeron extends warmest greetings to you, loyal Champion. He is grateful for your part in our efforts in Cyrodiil. He awards you this gift and trusts you will continue to fight for the Pact.

Dreet-Wulm,
Scribe to Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target:
<<1>>,

정예 전쟁 군주 짐머론은 가장 충성스러운 챔피언인 당신에게 따뜻한 인사를 전합니다. 그는 시로딜에서의 우리의 노력 중 당신의 역할에 대해 감사드립니다. 그는 당신에게 이 선물을 수여하고 당신이 조약를 위해 계속 싸울 것을 믿습니다.

정예 전쟁 군주 짐머론의 서기,
드리트-휠름

Source: Are there Wood Elves who are woodworkers? I'm not sure how they would be able to overcome this guilt. It's odd, but I never had these questions before leaving home. I hope you'll enjoy this shipment, and please feel free to ignore my questions. I'm sure I'll find my answers during the course of my journey.
Target: 목공인 우드 엘프가 있나요? 그들이 어떻게 이런 죄책감을 극복할 수 있을지 모르겠어요. 이상하지만, 집을 나서기 전에는 이런 질문을 받은 적이 없어요. 이번 선적이 즐거우시기를 바라며, 제 질문은 얼마든지 무시해 주십시오. 여행하는 동안 반드시 답을 찾을 수 있을 거예요.

Source: I hope these provisioner components reach you in a timely manner. I got turned about in a strange swamp and lost one boot to the mud. The nearest wayshrine was a short walk, but a very long hop.
Target: 이 식량 재료들이 제 시간에 도착했길 바랍니다. 전 이상한 늪지대에 빠져 신발 한 짝을 잃어버렸습니다. 근처 여행자의 성소까지는 잠시 걸으면 되었지만, 한발로 뛰다보니 멀게 느껴졌습니다.

Source:
<<1>>,

Greetings, brave Champion. Accept this reward on behalf of the Covenant. Grand Warlord Dortene appreciates your efforts. Now back to the battlefield!

Grulzul,
Scribe to Grand Warlord Dortene
Target:
<<1>>, 

 안녕하시오, 용감한 챔피언. Covenent를 대신하여이 보상을 수락하십시오. Grand Warlord Dortene은 당신의 노력에 감사를 표합니다. 이제 다시 전장으로!

Grulzul,
그랜드 워로드 Dortene에게 서명

Source: I realize that my last few letters may have you questioning my commitment to the Pact. Simply because I have these urges does not mean I will act upon them. I'm sure many Wood Elves go through the same feelings once they've learned of the wonders of woodworking. I'll eventually learn to suppress it, you'll see! For now, it's enough to help you.
Target: 제 마지막 몇 통의 편지 때문에 제가 조약에 대한 헌신에 의문을 품게 될 수도 있다는 것을 알고 있습니다. 단순히 제가 이런 충동을 가지고 있다고 해서 제가 그 충동에 따라 행동하겠다는 뜻은 아닙니다. 많은 우드 엘프들이 목공업의 경이로움을 알게 되면 같은 감정을 겪게 될 거예요. 결국엔 억압하는 법을 배우게 될 거예요, 두고 보세요! 현재로서는 당신을 돕기에 충분합니다.

Source: My name is Gavin Gavonne. Thank you for this employment opportunity. I hope these provisions will prove useful. P.S. Do not concern yourself with the bloodstains on this missive. I was not seriously injured when I stumbled off of the precipice. My fall was broken by a thick patch of spinethorn nettles.
Target: 제 이름은 Gavin Gavonne입니다. 저에게 이런 구직 기회를 주셔서 감사합니다. 이 물품들이 유용하게 쓰였으면 좋겠습니다. 추신. 이 편지에 묻은 핏자국은 신경쓰지 않으셔도 됩니다. 벼랑에서 발을 헛디뎌서 약간 다쳤습니다. 가시덤불 덕분에 운이 좋았습니다.

Source: Finally, I've reached Anvil! With its protected harbor and well-traveled caravan routes, there is nowhere in Tamriel that I cannot send shipments. Except the Reach, of course. And Sunforge. Or Solstheim, come to think of it. But my point stands! Wherever you travel, my shipments shall follow. Even to those wretched places.
Target: 드디어 Anvil에 도착했다! 보호된 항구와 이동이 편리한 카라반 길이 있어서 탐리엘에서 배송이 불가능한 곳은 없습니다. 물론 리치를 제외하면 말이죠. 그리고 선포지도요. 생각해보면  Solstheim도. 하지만 내 요점은 이거야! 당신이 어디를 여행하든지, 나의 화물은 뒤따를 것입니다. 심지어 그 끔찍한 곳에도요.

Source: I've attempted several times to write a letter home explaining my current employment, but somehow the right words elude me. I don't wish them to think ill of me, but I know that if I could speak in person I could explain my unwavering commitment to the Pact. Perhaps it's best to wait until I visit home for such an explanation.
Target: 저는 저의 현재 취업을 설명하는 편지를 집으로 쓰려고 여러 번 시도했지만, 어찌된 일인지 올바른 말은 저를 피합니다. 저는 그들이 저를 나쁘게 생각하지 않기를 바라지만, 만약 제가 직접 말할 수 있다면, 저는 조약에 대한 저의 변함없는 헌신을 설명할 수 있다는 것을 알고 있습니다. 아마도 그런 설명을 듣기 위해 제가 집을 방문할 때까지 기다리는 것이 가장 좋을 것 같습니다.

Source: Though the Khajiit are far more welcoming than my last group, I find their humor strange. One of them will say something that doesn't appear to be a joke, and the rest of the group will suddenly begin to laugh. I can't help but feel I'm missing something here. Something I never miss, however, is your shipment! Enjoy!
Target: 카지트 족은 지난번 그룹보다 훨씬 더 환영받지만, 그들의 유머는 이상해요. 그 중 한 명은 농담으로 보이지 않는 말을 할 것이고, 나머지 일행은 갑자기 웃기 시작할 것입니다. 여기서 뭔가 놓치고 있다는 느낌을 지울 수가 없어요. 하지만 제가 절대 놓칠 수 없는 것은, 당신의 선적품입니다! 맛있게 드세요!

Source: Last night I had to sleep in a tree, courtesy of a hungry pack of wolves.  Thank goodness they didn't catch me in a more open area! I'll have to make sure to find a traveling group soon. I could hardly keep my eyes open today as I collected these materials for your shipment.
Target: 지난 밤 저는 배고픈 늑대 무리들의 호의로 나무에서 잠을 자야만 했습니다. 그들이 더 넓은 곳에서 저를 잡지 않아서 다행이에요! 곧 여행단을 찾아야겠어요. 나는 오늘 당신의 선적물을 위해 이 자료들을 수집했기 때문에 눈을 뜨고 있을 수가 없었습니다.

Source: I've met a group of Khajiit that I've begun to travel with. It's harder to trust them than my other traveling companions, but they've shown interest in helping me collect crafting materials for my shipments. As always, my work to you comes first! I'll just make sure to keep my gold close at hand.
Target: 함께 여행하기 시작한 카지트 일행을 만나봤습니다. 다른 여행 친구들보다 그들을 신뢰하는 것이 더 어렵지만, 그들은 제가 선적할 공예품을 모으는 것을 돕는 데 관심을 보였습니다. 항상 그렇듯이 당신에게 하는 일이 우선이에요! 금을 가까이 두도록 하겠습니다.

Source: Congratulations, you have reached Champion 20. Your well-earned Golden Saint costume has been added to your Collection.
Target: 축하드립니다, 챔피언 레벨 20이 되었습니다. Golden Saint 의상을 받을 자격이 되시며 이는 수집품에 추가됩니다.

Source:
<<1>>,

Greetings from Grand Warlord Sorcalin. As one of the Dominion's finest Champions, you are hereby granted the following reward. May it aid you in the battles to come!

Fireluin,
Scribe to Grand Warlord Sorcalin
Target:
<<1>>,

그랜드 워로드 소칼린이 인사드립니다! 자치령에서 가장 훌륭한 챔피언 중 한명인 당신에게, 이와 같은 보상을 드립니다. 이 물건들이 당신의 전투에 도움이 되기를!

파이어루인,
그랜드 워로드 소칼린의 서기관

Source:
<<1>>,

Grand Warlord Zimmeron extends warmest greetings to you, loyal Champion. He is grateful for your part in our efforts in Cyrodiil. He awards you this gift and trusts you will continue to fight for the Pact.

Dreet-Wulm,
Scribe to Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target:
<<1>>,

정예 전쟁 군주 짐머론은 가장 충성스러운 챔피언인 당신에게 따뜻한 인사를 전합니다. 그는 시로딜에서의 우리의 노력 중 당신의 역할에 대해 감사드립니다. 그는 당신에게 이 선물을 수여하고 당신이 조약를 위해 계속 싸울 것을 믿습니다.

정예 전쟁 군주 짐머론의 서기,
드리트-휠름

Source:
<<1>>,

Greetings, brave Champion. Accept this reward on behalf of the Covenant. Grand Warlord Dortene appreciates your efforts. Now back to the battlefield!

Grulzul,
Scribe to Grand Warlord Dortene
Target:
<<1>>,

안녕하시오, 용감한 챔피언. Covenent를 대신하여이 보상을 수락하십시오. Grand Warlord Dortene은 당신의 노력에 감사를 표합니다. 이제 다시 전장으로!

Grulzul,
그랜드 워로드 Dortene에게 서명

Source:
<<1>>,

Greetings from Grand Warlord Sorcalin. As one of the Dominion's finest Champions, you are hereby granted the following reward. May it aid you in the battles to come!

Fireluin,
Scribe to Grand Warlord Sorcalin
Target:
<<1>>,

그랜드 워로드 소칼린이 인사드립니다! 자치령에서 가장 훌륭한 챔피언 중 한명인 당신에게, 이와 같은 보상을 드립니다. 이 물건들이 당신의 전투에 도움이 되기를!

파이어루인,
그랜드 워로드 소칼린의 서기관

Source: Still no word from Gwendis or Adusa. Not even a message from any of our servants. I should be basking in the scent of the beautiful flowers that Lyam sent me after the ball, but instead I'm pacing back and forth and imagining all kinds of horrible fates that may have befallen my family. Well, the time to wait is over. I need to do something!
Target: Still no word from Gwendis or Adusa. Not even a message from any of our servants. I should be basking in the scent of the beautiful flowers that Lyam sent me after the ball, but instead I'm pacing back and forth and imagining all kinds of horrible fates that may have befallen my family. Well, the time to wait is over. I need to do something!

Source: The dockworkers in Anvil made it abundantly clear I need to hire locals to staff my business. Tomorrow I have two choices: sift through the sotted dregs everybody else refused to hire, or watch the dockworkers throw everything I own into the harbor. I'm still weighing my options. That should tell you the quality I expect to find.
Target: 앤빌 (Anvil)에있는 dockworkers는 내 사업에 직원을 고용하기 위해 현지인을 고용해야한다고 분명히 밝히고 있습니다. 내일 나는 두 가지 선택을 할 수있다 : 고용 된 것을 거부 한 모든 사람들이 선적 된 찌꺼기를 들여다 보거나 항구 노동자들이 항구에 들어있는 모든 물건을 던지는 것을 지켜 보라. 나는 아직도 내 선택의 무게를 달고있다. 그게 내가 기대하는 품질을 말해 줄거야. - G

Source: I took another look around the castle before striking out blindly and I discovered something disturbing hiding behind one of the baskets of flowers. It was a brief note from the Resolute of Stendarr. "Your prisoners shall be free," the note said. It was signed "Jakothon Sacred-Oath." The fool! Those are our household servants, not our prisoners!
Target: I took another look around the castle before striking out blindly and I discovered something disturbing hiding behind one of the baskets of flowers. It was a brief note from the Resolute of Stendarr. \\"Your prisoners shall be free
column4: \"\" the note said. It was signed \"\"Jakothon Sacred-Oath.\"\" The fool! Those are our household servants
column5: not our prisoners!"

Source: I interviewed ten candidates for assistants. All of them are terrible, but I must hire one or the dockworkers will acquaint my belongings with the sea. This is not unlike straining sewage with your teeth—no matter how bad it tastes, you must do your utmost to keep the biggest pieces of dung on the outside.
Target: 나는 조력자 10 명을 인터뷰했다. 그들 모두는 끔찍하다. 그러나 나는 고용인을 고용해야한다. 또는 dockworkers는 바다와 함께 나의 소유물을 알 것이다. 이것은 치아와 함께 하수를 팽팽하게하는 것과는 다르지 않습니다. 맛이 아무리 좋더라도, 배설물의 가장 큰 부분을 외부에 유지해야합니다. - G

Source: Other than the flowers from Lyam, Castle Ravenwatch is deserted. Gwendis, Adusa, even the servants have disappeared without leaving so much as a note to tell me where they've gone to. I was especially happy when I arrived to find the flowers, but now I'm concerned about my friends and family. I'm growing irritated with these reversals of emotions.
Target: Other than the flowers from Lyam, Castle Ravenwatch is deserted. Gwendis, Adusa, even the servants have disappeared without leaving so much as a note to tell me where they've gone to. I was especially happy when I arrived to find the flowers, but now I'm concerned about my friends and family. I'm growing irritated with these reversals of emotions.

Source: Wharf Dog Melloy, a Breton with a Khajiit-tail necklace. Low-Neck, an Argonian who says he is best at "stealing things." Cuts First, who beneath her extensive scars is either a spindly Nord or a stocky High Elf. I must hire one of them to appease the Anvil dockworkers. Very well! I'll give each a trial day and see who outworks the rest.
Target: 카짓 꼬리 목걸이를 하고 있는 건 브레튼인 워프 도그 멜로이입니다. \\"도둑질\"\"을 가장 잘한다고 말하는건 아르고니안 로우넥입니다. 컷퍼스트
column4: 큰 흉터가 있는 그녀는 홀쭉한 노드거나 건장한 하이 엘프일겁니다. 앤빌 부두 노동자들을 달래기 위해 그들 중 한 명을 고용해야 합니다. 좋습니다! 각자에게 시험날짜를 주고 누가 가장 나은지 알아 보겠습니다. "

Source: I'm alone in the castle. Gwendis and Adusa are missing. The servants are gone. Even fair Estelle, who usually offers me my evening meal, is nowhere to be found. I'm hungry! And I'm worried about the household, as well. Why couldn't I have one day to revel in Lyam's loving gesture? Your materials are enclosed.
Target: I'm alone in the castle. Gwendis and Adusa are missing. The servants are gone. Even fair Estelle, who usually offers me my evening meal, is nowhere to be found. I'm hungry! And I'm worried about the household, as well. Why couldn't I have one day to revel in Lyam's loving gesture? Your materials are enclosed.

Source: Cuts First threw a knife at me when I told her to move some barrels. I found Wharf Dog Melloy sleeping off the skooma shakes in my office. Low-Neck is missing, along with my ledger. Thankfully I'd hidden today's delivery, or he'd have made off with your package.
Target: 먼저 내가 그녀에게 배럴을 옮기라고 말했을 때 칼날이 나에게 던졌습니다. Wharf Dog Melloy가 내 사무실에서 skooma shake를 떨고있는 것을 발견했습니다. 낮은 목은 내 장부와 함께 누락되었습니다. Thankfully 히 나는 오늘 배달을 숨겼다, 그렇지 않으면 그는 당신의 꾸러미로 벗어났다. - G

Source: I decided to take a chance and check out some of the caves near Castle Ravenwatch to see if Jakothon was using any of them as a lair. I must say, the hunger pangs are beginning to cloud my judgment, but I won't let a skipped meal or three get the better of me. I just hope I find him and the servants before Adusa does.
Target: I decided to take a chance and check out some of the caves near Castle Ravenwatch to see if Jakothon was using any of them as a lair. I must say, the hunger pangs are beginning to cloud my judgment, but I won't let a skipped meal or three get the better of me. I just hope I find him and the servants before Adusa does.

Source: There's been talk of werewolves in the nearby hills, so I've taken precautions with your latest package. You've no doubt noticed the smell on the packaging! It's a local remedy, sworn to keep them away. If you are yourself afflicted, my sincere apologies. Soak your hands with the salts in the enclosed pouch to soothe any irritation.
Target: 근처의 언덕에 늑대 인간들이 있다는 이야기가 있었기 때문에 나는 최신 패키지로 예방 조치를 취했다. 의심의 여지가 포장에 냄새를 발견했습니다! 그것들을 멀리하기 위해 맹세 한 지역 치료법입니다. 당신이 괴롭다면, 진심으로 사과드립니다. 밀폐 된 주머니에 소금을 담가두면 자극을 완화시킬 수 있습니다. - G

Source: Have I told you about Adusa-daro? She's the bravest Khajiit I know, always undertaking missions for House Ravenwatch. If she was around when Resolute Jakothon took our servants captive, she would have torn the hulking Nord's arms from their sockets. Since there weren't any extra limbs lying around, I assume she was away when Jakothon came by.
Target: Have I told you about Adusa-daro? She's the bravest Khajiit I know, always undertaking missions for House Ravenwatch. If she was around when Resolute Jakothon took our servants captive, she would have torn the hulking Nord's arms from their sockets. Since there weren't any extra limbs lying around, I assume she was away when Jakothon came by.

Source: Some find it strange that I rarely trade with stronghold Orcs. I have no problem trading with Orcs, of course! But I've learned the Orcs who live in strongholds are like mages you find in caves: powerful, insular, and able to turn you inside out when they're having a bad day.
Target: 어떤 사람들은 내가 오클라호마 요새와 거의 거래하지 않는다는 것을 이상하게 여깁니다. 물론 Orcs와는 아무런 문제가 없습니다! 그러나 요새에 사는 오크들이 동굴에서 발견 할 수있는 마법사와 같다는 것을 알게되었습니다. 힘든, 섬세하고, 나쁜 날을 보내고있을 때 당신을 밖으로 내몰 수 있습니다. - G

Source: I need to reach Jakothon and the servants before Gwendis and Adusa find them, otherwise House Ravenwatch might well wind up at war with the Resolutes of Stendarr. I really don't need this trouble right now, patron. Things were going so well before that Nord started following me around. Oh, and enjoy the new materials I've enclosed.
Target: I need to reach Jakothon and the servants before Gwendis and Adusa find them, otherwise House Ravenwatch might well wind up at war with the Resolutes of Stendarr. I really don't need this trouble right now, patron. Things were going so well before that Nord started following me around. Oh, and enjoy the new materials I've enclosed.

Source: I always bribe the lighthouse keepers at a port. They're first to spot the ships, and can send runners with what they know of the shipmasters, their expected hauls, and the like. The best weapon is a keen mind, my mother always said! Also a dueling sword. She was rather particular.
Target: 나는 항상 등대지기를 항구에 매수한다. 그들은 배를 먼저 발견하고, 조선 술사와 예상되는 달랑비 등을 알고 주자를 보낼 수 있습니다. 가장 좋은 무기는 날카로운 마음이다, 우리 엄마는 항상 말했다! 또한 결투 검. 그녀는 다소 특별했습니다. - G

Source: If I were a hulking Nord who thought all vampires were fiends and practiced a religion of intolerance and piety, where would I hide? The cathedral in Shornhelm? A Stendarr shrine in the wilderness? Maybe in a cave rumored to be haunted by evil spirits that's actually home to a pack of domesticated wolves? How should I know? I'm not a Nord!
Target: If I were a hulking Nord who thought all vampires were fiends and practiced a religion of intolerance and piety, where would I hide? The cathedral in Shornhelm? A Stendarr shrine in the wilderness? Maybe in a cave rumored to be haunted by evil spirits that's actually home to a pack of domesticated wolves? How should I know? I'm not a Nord!

Source: I heard a version of Over the Seas last night called "Ever the Tease and Over the Mane." Things grew racier from there. You know how it is, lots of nautical phrases like "half-mast" and "anchors aweigh" taking on vastly different meanings. Sailors think they're so clever.
Target: 나는 어젯밤 Over the Seas의 개사곡 \\"Ever the Tease and Over the Mane\"\"이라는 노래를 들었습니다. 거기서부터 일이 더욱 야하게 되었습니다. \"\"반쪽 돛\"\"이나 \"\"닻을 올려라\"\"과 같은 많은 항해 용어들이 어떻게 완전히 다른 의미로 쓰이는지 아실 거예요. 선원들은 자신들이 매우 영리하다고 생각합니다. "

Source: I was about to charge into the third cave in the hills around Castle Ravenwatch when Gwendis emerged from the shadows and stopped me. "There's a Resolute of Stendarr in there," she hissed quietly. "I know," I whispered back, "Jakothon Sacred-Oath." Gwendis quickly explained that she and Adusa were away when the Resolute "freed" our servants.
Target: I was about to charge into the third cave in the hills around Castle Ravenwatch when Gwendis emerged from the shadows and stopped me. \\"There's a Resolute of Stendarr in there
column4: \"\" she hissed quietly. \"\"I know
column5: \"\" I whispered back
column6: \"\"Jakothon Sacred-Oath.\"\" Gwendis quickly explained that she and Adusa were away when the Resolute \"\"freed\"\" our servants."

Source: There is a danger in playing tavern games with which you are unfamiliar. This is why I learn every one of them! Seven Mugs, Skink Smash, Knuckle Jugglers, Troll Stutters, Red Staben's Dance, Frogswallow, Bilge Baiting, and even Wattle Swinging, which some Nords will say can be played with a mammoth. Do not believe this. They are testing you.
Target: 당신이 익숙하지 않은 선술집 게임을 할 때 위험합니다. 이것이 내가 그들 모두를 배울 이유입니다! 7 개의 머그컵, Skink 스매쉬, 너클 요술 쟁이, 트롤 스터 터스, 레드 스테 벤스 댄스, 개구리 스왈 로우, 빌지 타잉, 심지어는 워틀 스윙 (Wattle Swinging) 등이 있습니다. 이것을 믿지 마십시오. 그들은 당신을 시험하고 있습니다. - G

Source: Oh joyous day! There was something from Lyam waiting when I returned to the castle. He filled our great hall with the most beautiful flowers I have ever seen! It was like all the colors of the rainbow exploded inside the castle. I guess I did make an impression! But where is everyone? Why is the castle empty? What happened while I was gone?
Target: Oh joyous day! There was something from Lyam waiting when I returned to the castle. He filled our great hall with the most beautiful flowers I have ever seen! It was like all the colors of the rainbow exploded inside the castle. I guess I did make an impression! But where is everyone? Why is the castle empty? What happened while I was gone?

Source: Anvil is an odd place. Everyone knows raiding bands keep gold flowing through the port. It's always rougher when their boats return, but the locals are mostly immune. Even the meanest dogs are loathe to foul their own nests. A curious balance, but they seem to keep it.
Target: 모루는 이상한 곳입니다. 모든 사람들은 습격당하는 밴드가 항구를 통해 금을 계속 흐르게합니다. 보트가 돌아 오면 항상 더 거칠지 만 현지인들은 거의 면역 상태입니다. 가장 어리석은 개조차도 자신의 둥지를 더럽 히기를 싫어합니다. 호기심의 균형이지만, 그들은 그것을 유지하는 것 같습니다. - G

Source: What do you suppose the moons are? The Khajiit think them gods, while the Mages Guild says they're islands in the sky. I've heard stranger theories. A sailor once said they were enormous atronachs, wrestling for the amusement of the Daedric Princes. He says it's what causes thunderstorms! Foolish man. Everybody knows they're made by Sheogorath.
Target: 달이 뭐라고 생각하니? Khajiit은 신을 생각하며 Mages Guild는 하늘에있는 섬이라고 말합니다. 나는 낯선 이론을 들었다. 한 선원은 대들린 왕자들의 즐거움을 위해 씨름하면서 거대한 아크로 바크라고 말했다. 그는 그것이 뇌우의 원인이라고 말했습니다! 어리석은 사람. Sheogorath가 제작 한 것을 모두 알고 있습니다.

Source: The High King's ball is almost upon us and I still have a hundred-and-one tasks to do. I have to have my hair set and my make-up done. And I need a gown. And a bouquet of the most beautiful flowers in the land. Gwendis says she's working on everything, but I'm starting to become nervous. I want to make a good impression when Lyam comes to call.
Target: 하이 킹의 무도회는 곧 시작인데 아직 101개의 작업에 쫓기고 있습니다. 머리를 묶어야 하고, 화장도 해야 합니다. 게다가 가운도 필요해요. 그리고 우리나라에서 가장 아름다운 부케도. 그웬디스는 모두 준비되었다고 하는데, 걱정이 되요. 리암이 데리러 왔을 때 강렬한 인상을 주고 싶어요.

Source: There's very little time to explain, but I must board a ship to Alik'r. Here is your latest package. If I am unable to contact you for the duration, my assistant Low-Neck will handle the next week's deliveries.
Target: 지금 당장 알리키'어로 가는 배에 타야해서, 설명할 시간이 거의 없네요. 여기 당신이 최근에 부탁한 물건입니다. 만약 제가 연락을 드릴 수 없는 상황이 되면, 다음 주에는 제 조수인 로우-넥이 당신에게 물건을 전달해드릴 것입니다.

Source: Gwendis did it again! She brought six women into the castle and four hours later my hair is perfect, my make-up is exquisite, my gown is gorgeous, and I feel beautiful! Now all I have to do is not move for the next six hours until Lyam arrives to take me to the ball. But I haven't shirked my responsibilities, patron! Your components are enclosed.
Target: 그웬디스가 다시 해 줬어요! 6명의 여성을 성에 데려갔고 4시간 후에는 머리는 완벽하고 화장은 절묘하고, 가운은 호화롭고, 나는 자신감이 넘쳤죠! 다음은 6시간 덩인 미동도 없이 리암이 무도회에 마중 나오기를 기다릴 뿐입니다. 하지만, 직무를 게을리 하지는 않았습니다! 재료는 동봉되어 있습니다.

Source: I made landfall in Khefrem. I expected a drier climate, but the western waters are quite refreshing. And now for the good news! I heard a rumor of a mage deep in the Alik'r wastes who trades incredibly exotic materials, but only when both moons are full—two days hence, according to the charts! Tomorrow I leave for his tower.
Target: 나는 Khefrem에 상륙했다. 나는 더 건조한 기후를 기대했지만 서쪽의 물은 아주 상쾌합니다. 그리고 지금은 좋은 소식입니다! 엄청난 이국적인 재료를 취급하는 Alik'r 노폐물에 깊은 소문이 들렸지 만, 두 달이 만원 이틀이 넘었을 때만 차트에 따르면! 내일 나는 그의 탑으로 떠난다. - G

Source: The rest of our code involves such high concepts as honor and vigilance, noble spirit and restraint. We only feed from willing volunteers, and never to excess. The only exception to that rule is when we encounter criminals and evil cultists. In those cases, we can give the monsters within us full reign. Your components are enclosed.
Target: 나머지 법칙은 명예와 경계, 고결함과 자제라고 하는 숭고한 개념과 관련된 것입니다. 자원자의 피만 마시고 탐하지 마세요. 규칙의 유일한 예외는 범죄자와 사악한 광신자와 조우했을 때 뿐입니다. 그런 경우에는 우리 안에 있는 괴물을 완전히 푸는 것이 허용되어 있습니다. 재료는 동봉되어 있습니다.

Source: I knew the scorpions were large, but I didn't expect them to outsize the horses! Thankfully they turn with the grace of rowboats and lunge like drunken sailors, something I've long since grown accustomed to avoiding. The horse I rented knew more than enough to give the creatures a wide berth. I continue to the mage's tower!
Target: 나는 전갈이 컸다는 것을 알았지 만, 나는 그들이 말보다 크기가 큰 것을 기대하지 않았다! 고맙게도 그들은 노 보트의 우아함과 술취한 선원들과 같은 헛소리로 변합니다. 피할 수없는 길에 오래 익숙해졌습니다. 내가 빌린 말은 그 생물들에게 넓은 정박을 주는데 충분했다. 나는 마법사의 탑으로 계속 간다! - G

Source: Now that you know the particulars of my unique existence, let's get back to the more mundane aspects of my life. The night of the High King's ball is fast approaching, and I have a list of preparations as long as my arm to deal with. That means I need assistance. That means I need Gwendis! She really is an expert at these kinds of affairs.
Target: 나의 기묘한 체질은 이해했을 테니, 나의 인생의 더 평범한 측면으로 돌아갑시다. 하이 킹 무도회의 밤이 다가왔지만, 준비해야 할 일은 전혀 줄어들지 않습니다. 즉 저에게는 도움이 필요하다는 것입니다. 즉 그웬디스가 나설 차례랍니다! 그녀는 이런 일에 전문가거든요.

Source: Bad news. The tower was entirely empty, but for a single table. Upon it was paper, pen, and inkwell. The paper said "Petitioner's Trade" at the top. Out of spite, I wrote "the sleep you stole from me" before bedding down in the tower. In the morning I sought the page as a souvenir, but it must have fluttered away in the night. So I took the pen!
Target: 안 좋은 소식입니다. 그 탑은 완전히 비어있었고, 종이, 펜, 잉크병이 놓여 있는 테이블 하나만 있었어요. 종이에는 맨 위에 \\"청원자 거래\"\"라고 써 있었습니다. 저는 화가 나서 탑에서 잠에 들기 전 \"\"당신이 나에게서 훔쳐간 잠\"\"이라고 써 놓았습니다. 아침에 기념품으로 삼기 위해 그 종이를 찾았지만
column4: 밤중에 날아가 버렸나 봅니다. 그래서 펜을 가져왔죠! "

Source: Dawn approached as Lyam walked me to the doors of Castle Ravenwatch. I could sense Gwendis watching from the shadows, but she never revealed herself. Lyam told me how much he enjoyed the evening. We kissed. I wanted it to go on forever. But the sun was rising. Reluctantly, we parted. Now I'm happy and sad at the same time. Isn't that strange?
Target: Dawn approached as Lyam walked me to the doors of Castle Ravenwatch. I could sense Gwendis watching from the shadows, but she never revealed herself. Lyam told me how much he enjoyed the evening. We kissed. I wanted it to go on forever. But the sun was rising. Reluctantly, we parted. Now I'm happy and sad at the same time. Isn't that strange?

Source: I find it best to honor all of the Divines. Even Akatosh, who commands us to "serve and obey the Emperor." I tithe to him so he can settle that particular mess. Queen Ayrenn, Jorunn the Skald-King, High King Emeric, or someone else entirely. Perhaps even you! Whoever it is, emperors are good for business.
Target: 저는 모든 디바인을 존경하는 것이 가장 좋다고 생각합니다. 심지어 \\"황제를 섬기고 복종하라\"\"고 명령하는 아카토쉬까지도 존경합니다. 나는 그가 특별한 혼란을 수습할 수 있도록 그에게 십일조를 바칩니다. 에이렌 여왕
column4: 스컬드왕 요룬
column5: 하이 킹 에머릭
column6: 아니면 다른 사람 전부를 존경해요. 어쩌면 당신 까지도! 그게 누구든 황제들은 사업에 좋습니다. "

Source: Do you think it's too soon to see Lyam again? Would it be too forward of me to call upon him? To throw myself upon him and ravish him with sweet kisses? I feel like a school-girl and it feels wonderful! Gwendis claims all the credit, but I think my wit, charm, and beauty had something to do with Lyam's reaction.  But here are more components.
Target: Do you think it's too soon to see Lyam again? Would it be too forward of me to call upon him? To throw myself upon him and ravish him with sweet kisses? I feel like a school-girl and it feels wonderful! Gwendis claims all the credit, but I think my wit, charm, and beauty had something to do with Lyam's reaction.  But here are more components.

Source: A dozen zombies shambled from the sea onto the Anvil docks. The entire crew of the Gizzard Cutter shrieked as one and fled for the hills! I'd heard of Redguard superstitions involving the undead, but never seen it in person. The Khajiiti crew of the Sleek Claws slew the zombies, then raided the Gizzard Cutter's hold. I admit, I'm still chuckling.
Target: 12 명의 좀비가 바다에서 Anvil 부두로 날아 왔습니다. Gizzard Cutter의 모든 승무원이 소리 지르며 언덕을 향해 달아났습니다! 언데드와 관련된 레드 가드의 미신에 대해 들었지만 직접 본 적이 없습니다. 매끄러운 발톱의 Khajiiti 승무원은 좀비를 죽인 다음 Gizzard Cutter의 보류를 급습했습니다. 나는 아직도 내가 낄낄 거리다는 것을 인정한다. - G

Source: Be still my beating heart! Lyam arrived at our door at he looked simply smashing! (And, yes, contrary to popular belief, our hearts beat quite well, thank you.) How handsome the scion of the Fontbonne family looked in his finery! And, I'm pleased to say, he seemed as impressed by my appearance as I was by his. He took my hand and we were off.
Target: 진정하렴 내 심장아! 현관에 온 리암은 너무 멋졌어! (그래, 통설과 달리 우리의 심장은 평범하게 맥박치고 있었다.) 폰트본 가문의 자손이 차려입은 모습은 더할 나위 없이 잘 생겼지! 그리고 기쁘게도, 리암도 나와 마찬가지로 내 복장에 감동받은 것 같았어. 그리고 그는 내 손을 잡았고 우리는 밖으로 나갔지.

Source: You may wonder why I am so diligent with the frequency and quantity of my deliveries at such an agreeable rate. Though this is certainly a service I provide, word of our association has provided multiple business opportunities for me. In a way, your reputation is funding your shipments!
Target: 당신은 내가 왜 그런 기분 좋은 속도로 제 배달의 빈도와 양과 부지런한지 궁금해 할 것입니다. 이것이 분명히 내가 제공하는 서비스이지만, 협회의 말은 나를 위해 여러 가지 비즈니스 기회를 제공했습니다. 어떤면에서, 귀하의 평판은 선적 자금입니다! - G

Source: Have you ever attended the High King's ball, patron? What a marvelous production! The music, the food, the entertainers! We danced the night away and enjoyed each other's company. My only regret is that the party eventually came to an end. That's the trouble with the night. It never lasts as long as you want it to. Use these new materials wisely.
Target: 하이 킹 무도회에 참가한 적이 있습니까? 정말 멋진 행사죠! 음악, 요리, 그리고 연예인들! 밤새 춤을 추며 즐거운 한때를 보냈습니다. 안타까운 것은 파티가 곧 끝난다는 겁니다. 그게 밤의 안타까운 부분입니다. 아무리 원해도 끝은 반드시 찾아옵니다. 새로 보내드린 소재를 활용해 주십시오.

Source: Have you heard the phrase "squeeze blood from a stone," or some variation? I met a member of the Mages Guild who assures me this relates to some rather infamous gargoyle experiments. I'm not sure if I should believe him. He insisted Vanus Galerion was born a Snow Elf. I insisted he'd had too much to drink.
Target: \\"돌에서 피를 짜낸다\"\"같은 말을 들어본 적이 있나요? 저는 메이지 길드의 한 멤버를 만났습니다. 그는 저에게 이것이 악명 높은 가고일 실험과 다소 관련이 있을 거라고 장담 했습니다. 그를 믿어야 할지 모르겠습니다. 그는 바누스 갈레리온이 스노우 엘프로 태어났다고 주장했고 저는 그가 술을 너무 많이 마셨다고 주장했습니다. "

Source: I couldn't stand being cooped up in the castle for another moment, so I grabbed my pack and headed out to acquire more enchanting components for my clients. It was either that or go mad waiting for word to arrive from Lyam. His silence can be infuriating at times! Not a note since the ball! But my work provides a distraction--for the most part.
Target: I couldn't stand being cooped up in the castle for another moment, so I grabbed my pack and headed out to acquire more enchanting components for my clients. It was either that or go mad waiting for word to arrive from Lyam. His silence can be infuriating at times! Not a note since the ball! But my work provides a distraction--for the most part.

Source: A few days away from the castle and worrying about Lyam Fontbonne has done me a world of good. I even got to perform a community service (as the Ravenwatch code commands of us) when I saved a couple of travelers from bandits along the road to Shornhelm. I'm heading home now. And there better be something from Lyam waiting for me when I get there!
Target: A few days away from the castle and worrying about Lyam Fontbonne has done me a world of good. I even got to perform a community service (as the Ravenwatch code commands of us) when I saved a couple of travelers from bandits along the road to Shornhelm. I'm heading home now. And there better be something from Lyam waiting for me when I get there!

Source: I watched a Wood Elf kill another Wood Elf today. She pulled a dagger, slipped up behind him, and cut his throat. Then she shouted something about "avenging the black sap." Her surprise when most everyone shrugged and went about their business marked her as an outsider. If the locals have no time to bet on a fight, its outcome doesn't matter.
Target: 오늘 우드 엘프가 또 다른 우드 엘프를 죽이는 걸 봤습니다. 그녀는 단도를 뽑아 그의 뒤에 슬며시 다가와서 그의 목을 베었어요. 그리고 나서 그녀는 \\"검은 수액의 복수다.\"\"같은 말을 외쳤죠. 그런데 대부분의 사람들이 어깨를 으쓱이고는 각자의 할일을 하러 가자 그녀는 놀랐고 그것은 그녀를 이방인으로 보이게 했습니다. 지역 주민들에게 싸움에 내기를 할 시간이 없다면
column4: 싸움의 결과 따위는 중요하지 않겠죠. "

Source: Low-Neck returned with my ledger this morning and said he was impressed with my volume of business. He promised to skim no more than a small portion of my profits. Better a candid thief than a throatcutter or a skooma fiend! I hired him on the spot. If you receive this package, it means my new assistant can take direction.
Target: Low-Neck은 오늘 아침 내 장부와 함께 돌아와 내 사업 규모에 깊은 인상을 받았다고 말했다. 그는 내 이익의 작은 부분을 더 이상 훑어 보지 않을 것을 약속했다. 목구멍 꾼이나 마약 쟁이보다 솔직한 도둑이 더 나으십시오! 나는 그 자리에서 그를 고용했다. 이 패키지를 받으면 내 새로운 조수가 지시를받을 수 있음을 의미합니다. - G

Source: I heard a joke the other day. What do you call someone who rants about Dwarves who sew jewelry into the fringes of their robes? A Dwemer hemmer gem condemner! (I never said it was a good joke.)
Target: 나는 요전에 농담을 들었다. 드워프 장신구에 보석을 달고 옷을 벗기는 사람을 뭐라 부르죠? Dwemer hemmer 보석 조련사! (나는 결코 농담이라고 말한 적이 없다.) - G

Source: I slipped into the shadows and moved through the ruins, keeping to the darkness. I was certain that I was nearly invisible to my mysterious observer. In that way, I was able to approach his hiding spot without him noticing. He was so focused on scanning the ruins that he never suspected I was now right behind him. It was time to play with my prey.
Target: 나는 그림자에 몸을 숨기고 유적을 빠져나가 어둠에 몸을 숨겼습니다. 수상한 감시자의 눈에서 벗어나기 위해서입니다. 그리고, 눈치채지 못하고 그 사람의 은신처에 접근할 수 있었습니다. 그는 유적을 살피는 데 너무 신경을 많이 썼을 겁니다. 제가 바로 뒤에 있을 줄은 생각도 못한 것 같아요. 먹이와 노는 시간이었습니다.

Source: Interesting. The man who had been watching me in the Lorkrata ruins wasn't as clueless as I suspected. He was a hulking Nord who wore the armor of a Resolute of Stendarr. He moved as fast as a Wood Elf and was upon me in an instant, his weapon at the ready. I smiled and introduced myself. It was the polite thing to do before I ripped his face off.
Target: 로크라타 유적에서 저를 보던 남자는 생각한 대로 눈치채지 못했습니다. 노르드 거인으로, 스텐다르 신자의 갑옷을 입고 있었습니다. 그는 우드 엘프처럼 민첩한 몸놀림으로 무장한 채 달려온 것입니다. 저는 그를 보고 웃으며 자기소개를 했습니다. 살가죽을 찢기 전에는 그렇게 하는 것이 예의인 것입니다.

Source: I'm not as alone out here as I had thought. I know someone is watching me. The question is, is this mysterious observer benign or dangerous? Well, either way, they are about to discover that Lady Melina Cassel can be deadly when the need arises. In the meantime, enjoy these components.
Target: 여기에서는 생각하던 것처럼 혼자가 되지 않았습니다. 누군가에게 보이고 있는 것을 깨달았기 때문입니다. 문제는, 이 수상한 감시자가 좋은 사람인지 위험한 사람인가 하는 것입니다. 어쨌든, 레이디 메리나 카셀은 필요할 때는 위험한 여자가 될 수 있다는 것을 깨닫게 될 것입니다. 그나저나, 재료를 즐기세요.

Source: Does my true nature surprise you, patron? Does it disgust you? Fill you belly with terror and your bowels with dread? Really? If so, I'm disappointed in you. After all, I've served you faithfully and honored our agreement to the letter. I'm not a monster. Count Verandis says we're special. That we have a duty to those who don't possess our gifts.
Target: 제 정체에 놀라셨나요? 혐오감이 드나요? 불안감으로 몸이 꽉 차고 공포로 내장이 떨리나요? 정말로? 만약 그렇다면 유감입니다. 지금까지 저는 충성을 다해 계약을 충실히 이행해 왔을 뿐입니다. 그리고 저는 괴물이 아닙니다. 베란디스 백작은 우리는 특별하다고 말씀하셨습니다. 우리 같은 재능을 갖지 못한 사람들에 대한 의무가 있다고.

Source: I'm not sure how it would have turned out, but Jakothon and I did not fight that day. While we were in the midst of exchanging harsh words and harsher insults, a pack of mindless bloodfiends emerged from the darkness behind the Resolute and fell upon him with savage gusto. With a sigh and despite our differences, I decided to save the Resolute.
Target: 왜 이렇게 되었는지는 모르겠지만, 자코손과는 그 날 싸우지 않았다. 게다가 심한 모욕으로 응수하고 있는 도중 지능을 갖지 못한 광혈귀 무리가 자코손 뒤에서 뛰쳐나와, 야만적인 굶주림을 채우기 위해 덮칠 뻔했다. 한숨을 내쉰 나는 입장 차이는 제쳐두고 그를 구하기로 했다.

Source: Have you heard of the Resolutes of Stendarr? They're a holier-than-you group of warriors, intent on hunting down and destroying anything they don't understand. The Resolute I met in Lorkrata called himself Jakothon Sacred-Oath. He was everything you think of and more when you hear the words "religious Nord." And, yes, he was here to kill me.
Target: Have you heard of the Resolutes of Stendarr? They're a holier-than-you group of warriors, intent on hunting down and destroying anything they don't understand. The Resolute I met in Lorkrata called himself Jakothon Sacred-Oath. He was everything you think of and more when you hear the words \\"religious Nord.\"\" And
column4: yes
column5: he was here to kill me."

Source: Why does a Resolute of Stendarr want to kill Lady Melina Cassel? Well, that is the question. It was the first thing I asked him after he made his intentions known. "Because you are a foul, unholy, ugly creature," Jakothon replied. "Because you are a vampire!" What an ill-mannered brute! I am in no way ugly! As for vampire, well, he had me there.
Target: Why does a Resolute of Stendarr want to kill Lady Melina Cassel? Well, that is the question. It was the first thing I asked him after he made his intentions known. \\"Because you are a foul
column4: unholy
column5: ugly creature
column6: \"\" Jakothon replied. \"\"Because you are a vampire!\"\" What an ill-mannered brute! I am in no way ugly! As for vampire
column7: well

Source: It's me again, Melina Cassel. I'm an enchanter-in-training, a supplier of enchanting materials, and one thing more. I'm a vampire. I live by the same code as all members of House Ravenwatch, a code put in place and enforced by Count Verandis. Our primary goal is to do good works, to use our special gifts to help in any way we can.
Target: 저입니다. 메리나 카셀입니다. 견습 마법부여가이며, 마법부여 소재의 도매상이기도 하고, 그 정체는 흡혈귀이기도 합니다. 나는 레이븐워치 가문의 다른 사람과 같이, 베란디스 백작이 내걸고 준수하는 법칙을 따르고 있습니다. 우리가 가장 중요하게 여기는 것은 좋은 일을 하는 것이고, 이 특별한 체질을 사용해 남을 돕는 것입니다.

Source: I must say, Jakothon Sacred-Oath certainly knows how to dispatch bloodfiends. Once I intervened and gave him a chance to get his bearings, he took down the rest of the bloodfiends with only a modicum of help from me. He didn't thank me. He didn't decide to be my friend. All he said was, "I'll be watching," and he turned and walked away.
Target: I must say, Jakothon Sacred-Oath certainly knows how to dispatch bloodfiends. Once I intervened and gave him a chance to get his bearings, he took down the rest of the bloodfiends with only a modicum of help from me. He didn't thank me. He didn't decide to be my friend. All he said was, \\"I'll be watching
column4: \"\" and he turned and walked away."

Source: Since I'm still employed, I'll assume that my being a vampire doesn't concern you--at least not enough to stop receiving enchanting components from me. If you're interested, I'll tell you more about life in House Ravenwatch and how we use our special gifts. For now, please accept these materials as a sort of thank you for your ... understanding.
Target: 아직 해고되지 않았다는 것은, 제가 흡혈귀인 것을 신경쓰지 않거나, 마법부여 재료 받는 걸 그만둘 만큼 심각한 일로 생각하지 않는다는 뜻으로 받아들이겠습니다. 괜찮으시다면 레이븐워치 가문에서의 생활과 우리가 얼마나 특별한 재능을 사용하고 있는지 들려드리겠습니다. 이 소재는 감사의 답례로 받아주세요. 당신의... 관용에 대한 답례입니다.

Source: We return to Anvil with nearly empty hands. It was too good to be true, despite the assurances from sources I normally trust. At least I was able to turn a profit on barrels of dried fish. The spices alone will fund a backlog of shipments—such as this one.
Target: 우리는 거의 빈손으로 앤빌로 돌아왔습니다. 내가 신뢰하는 출처의 정보였음에도  불구하고 그것은 사실이기라기엔 너무 좋아서 믿을 수 없긴 했습니다. 적어도 나는 많은 건어물로 수익을 낼 수 있었습니다. 향신료 하나만으로도 재고를 처리할 자금을 댈 수 있을 거예요. 이와 같은 것들 말이죠.

Source: Dear patron, I won't bore you with the details of how I dealt with the Daedric cultist. Nor do I want to burden you with facts about me that would at best upset you and at worst make you see me in an unfavorable light. Suffice it to say, I subdued the villain and followed the Count's strictest rule: Never feed to excess--except on a villain.
Target: 어떻게 데이드라 신자를 정리했는가 하는 지루한 얘기는 생략하겠습니다. 저에 대한 사실이 부담이 되어 당신을 동요시키고, 최악의 경우 나를 의심의 눈초리로 보게 되길 바라진 않으니까요. 그러니까 이렇게 말해 두죠. 나는 악당을 쓰러뜨리고 백작의 엄격한 규정을 지켰습니다. 탐해서는 안 된다, 악당을 제외하고는.

Source: Now where was I? Oh, yes. The villain. I dispatched the cultist with relative ease and had a quick bite. (Fighting makes me peckish.) Unfortunately, my actions seemed to upset the captive young man, who recoiled from me. I must admit, I was expecting him to be a bit more grateful to me for rescuing him. Perhaps if I remove his bindings ….
Target: 자, 어디까지 말했죠? 아, 그래요, 악당 말이죠. 간단히 이교도를 처리하고, 가벼운 식사를 했습니다. (전쟁 후에는 배가 고픈 법) 유감스럽게도, 나의 행위는 붙잡힌 젊은 남자를 동요시킨 것 같아요, 나를 피하려고 했습니다. 솔직히, 도와준 것 때문에 조금은 감사할 줄 알았어요. 속박에서 풀어줬으니까요 \\....

Source: What a wonderful evening! Lyam and I talked for hours on the walk back to Shornhelm. He really is quite charming when he isn't being sacrificed to Daedric Princes. He still seems a little shy around me, and I think I make him nervous, but I'm sure he's going to invite me to attend the High King's ball! Your latest components are enclosed.
Target: 이 얼마나 멋진 저녁! Lyam와 나는 Shornhelm에 되돌아가는 산보에서 몇 시간 동안 말했다. Daedric Princes에게 희생되지 않을 때 그는 정말로 매력적입니다. 그는 여전히 내 주위에 조금 수줍어하고, 나는 그를 긴장시킬 것 같아,하지만 그는 내가 왕의 공에 참석하도록 초대 할거야! 최신 구성 요소가 동봉됩니다.

Source: Oh, patron! What did I do wrong? It's been two days and I haven't heard a word from Lyam Fontbonne since we said good night on the steps of his family's home in Shornhelm. I saved him from scamps! We shared a moment! And now, nothing! I must be a terrible person! But never fear, I haven't shirked my duty. Your components are enclosed.
Target: 아, 손님! 내가 뭘 했단 건가요? 2일이나 지났는데 리암 폰트본한테서 연락이 없습니다. 숀헬름의 집 계단에서 헤어졌을 뿐입니다. 스캠프에서 구해줬는데! 한때 같이 보냈는데! 그런데 아무 일도 없다니! 나는 나쁜 사람이겠지요! 하지만 걱정은 필요없습니다. 일은 게을리하지 않습니다. 재료는 동봉되어 있습니다.

Source: I guess the old saying is true. Never eat on a first date. The captive I rescued from the cultist is the son of a lesser noble house. Lyam Fontbonne is tall, with dark eyes and a tuft of dark hair. He's also rude and ungrateful. And he had the audacity to call me a monster! If he thinks we're going to have a second date, he's probably mistaken!
Target: 옛날 얘기는 사실이었군요. 첫 데이트에서 덤비지 말라는 거 말이죠. 광신도의 손에서 구해낸 남자는 하급 귀족의 아들이었습니다. 그는 리암 폰트본이라고 하며, 장신이고 검은 눈동자와 풍부한 검은 머리의 남자입니다만, 무례하고 배은망덕하기도 했습니다. 저를 괴물이라고 불렀던 겁니다! 2번째 데이트를 할 거라 생각한다면 착각이에요!

Source: It took some doing, but I was able to calm Lyam down. I convinced him that his eyes were playing tricks on him. The stress of almost being sacrificed to a Daedric Prince and all. Of course I didn't bite the cultist! And I never sucked the blood from his neck! Now that that's behind us, I wonder if he has an escort for the High King's ball?
Target: 고생했지만, 리암을 안정시켜 눈의 착각이라고 납득시킬 수 있었습니다. 데이드라 공의 제물이 될 뻔했던 공포 탓이라고. 물론 저는 광신도에게 물리거나 하지 않았어요! 목에서 피같은 건 빨지 않았어요! 자, 이 건에 대해서는 이제 충분하겠지요. 그에게는 하이 킹 무도회 상대가 있을까요?

Source: Gwendis volunteered to respond to Lyam's invitation to accompany him to the High King's ball for me. She's such a good friend! She let him know that I would be both honored and delighted to attend the ball as his companion for the evening. Now all I have to do is wait patiently for the night of the ball. Arrgh! I don't do patiently very well.
Target: 리암의 하이 킹 무도회 초대에는 그웬디스가 답변을 주게 되었습니다. 정말 좋은 친구죠! 그녀가 리암에게 알려주었습니다. 그의 상대로 무도회에 참가할 수 있다는 것은 영광이고 기쁜 일이라고. 저는 무도회 밤까지 참을성 있게 기다리면 됩니다. 으으! 참는 건 질색이에요.

Source: While waiting for the High King's ball, I decided I needed a distraction. A short trip into the wilds of Rivenspire to search out new components seemed like a good idea. I hadn't poked around the ruins of the Lorkrata Hills for a while, so that was as good a destination as any. I was immediately successful, as you can see from this shipment.
Target: 하이 킹 무도회를 기다리는 동안 머리를 식히려 했습니다. 리벤스파이어의 황야에 나가서 새로운 재료를 찾는 것은 좋은 생각처럼 보였습니다. 한동안 로크라타의 언덕 유적을 확인하지 않았기 때문에, 더할 나위 없는 목적지였습니다. 이번 화물을 보면 아시겠지만, 금방 수확이 있었습니다.

Source: Oh happy day! A messenger arrived at the castle today. He brought a letter from Lyam. He apologized for the delay and wants to see me! What should I wear? I need to find Gwendis! She's so much better at these sorts of things. I promise to tell you all about my meeting with Lyam. Next time.
Target: 아, 정말 멋진 날! 오늘 성에 심부름꾼이 왔습니다. 리암이 보낸 편지를 전하려 온 겁니다. 연락이 늦어진 것에 대한 사과와 만나고 싶다는 것이었습니다! 무엇을 입고 갈까? 그웬디스에게 상담해야겠어요! 그녀는 이런 일에 익숙하니까요. 리암과 만났을 때의 일은 모두 전해드릴게요. 다음 기회에.

Source: Gwendis is amazing. She was so helpful! She advised me all about what dress to wear, how to set my hair, all sorts of things to make my meeting with Lyam unfold as smoothly as possible. He still seemed nervous and a little shy, but he did eventually ask me to attend the High King's ball. I, of course, told him I'd think about it and let him know.
Target: 그웬디스는 대단해요. 정말 도움이 되요! 어떤 드레스를 입어야 할지, 머리를 어떻게 해야 할지, 모든 것을 조언해 주었어요. 리암과 만났을 때 부드럽게 이야기가 진행되도록. 그는 아직 긴장하고 있고, 멋있었지만, 그래도 마지막에는 하이 킹 무도회에 초대해 주었습니다. 저는 물론, 생각하고 나서 나중에 답장을 보내겠다고 대답했습니다.

Source: Wouldn't you know, we happened on a bunch of them Ashlanders following a herd of guar. They seemed even less happy about us being there than Granny's caravaner, but she put them in their place right quick. Granny isn't in the business of taking guff. She got them Ashlanders to lead her back to their tribe camp.
Target: Wouldn't you know, we happened on a bunch of them Ashlanders following a herd of guar. They seemed even less happy about us being there than Granny's caravaner, but she put them in their place right quick. Granny isn't in the business of taking guff. She got them Ashlanders to lead her back to their tribe camp.

Source: Hello, dear. Granny just wanted to let you know that she's making a little detour. Granny's got it on good authority that a mess of boats got themselves good and stuck in the last big freeze, and the creak in her knees are telling Granny there's a thaw coming.
Target: Hello, dear. Granny just wanted to let you know that she's making a little detour. Granny's got it on good authority that a mess of boats got themselves good and stuck in the last big freeze, and the creak in her knees are telling Granny there's a thaw coming.

Source: If there's nothing else you should listen to, it's Granny's creaky knees. Just like she figured, the ice flows are getting all slushy. Granny isn't the rower she used to be, but she found a perfectly good dinghy and the cold's good for her arthritis, so she'll be searching for those boats on the morrow!
Target: 귀를 기울여야 할 것이 없다면 할머니의 삐걱 거리는 무릎입니다. 그녀가 생각한 것처럼, 얼음이 흐트러져 가고 있습니다. 할머니는 예전의 노 젓는 사람이 아니지만 완벽하게 좋은 배가 있고 관절염에 좋은 감기가있어 내일이면 그 배를 찾을 것입니다!

Source: The tribe elder was a shrewd one, even for ash folk. Granny can appreciate someone who knows there's a use to everything, and also a customer willing to pay a pretty drake for items of use. She thinks there's good trade to be had swapping our surplus now and again. Got to diversify to stay competitive in this economy.
Target: 부족 장로는 애쉬 족 사람들에게조차도 단호한 사람이었습니다. 할머니는 모든 것에 사용법이 있다는 것을 아는 사람과 사용하기에 예쁜 옷차림을 지불 할 의사가있는 사람을 감사 할 수 있습니다. 그녀는 지금과 같이 흑자를 바꿀 좋은 무역이 있다고 생각합니다. 이 경제에서 경쟁력을 유지하기 위해 다각화했습니다.

Source: Well, Granny's had about enough of all this dust and she's finished most of her business with the ash folk, so she's going to be heading home. She's going to hop on a boat out of Dagon Fel and dip her toes in the Sea of Ghosts for a few days before she goes inland again.
Target: Well, Granny's had about enough of all this dust and she's finished most of her business with the ash folk, so she's going to be heading home. She's going to hop on a boat out of Dagon Fel and dip her toes in the Sea of Ghosts for a few days before she goes inland again.

Source: Near as Granny can tell, she's going to have to hire some helping hands if she plans to reclaim those poor trapped boats. She's going to take a few days to poke around the ports and find some enterprising younger folk that know a little ice ain't much to worry about.
Target: Near as Granny can tell, she's going to have to hire some helping hands if she plans to reclaim those poor trapped boats. She's going to take a few days to poke around the ports and find some enterprising younger folk that know a little ice ain't much to worry about.

Source: Discerning Customer, this one must notify you that Granny Gravius's Gently Used Goods has switched to a new gentler packing material for fragile goods. Do not be alarmed by the presence of fur inside parcel. Fulfillment by Hawker.
Target: Discerning Customer, this one must notify you that Granny Gravius's Gently Used Goods has switched to a new gentler packing material for fragile goods. Do not be alarmed by the presence of fur inside parcel. Fulfillment by Hawker.

Source: Whew! Granny's found some muscles she plum forgot existed after all that rowing, but the exercise did her some good, and her business too! She's found herself those boats she'd heard about. Whole fleet of them, just sitting in the ice waiting to finish their voyage.
Target: Whew! Granny's found some muscles she plum forgot existed after all that rowing, but the exercise did her some good, and her business too! She's found herself those boats she'd heard about. Whole fleet of them, just sitting in the ice waiting to finish their voyage.

Source: Well, that ice was still sturdy enough for Granny to walk on, though she nearly slipped and busted her bum. At least nobody would have been around to see poor Granny in such a sorry state of affairs. Granny got a good look into some of those boats and she's sure it'll all be worth the trouble once she's got them freed.
Target: Well, that ice was still sturdy enough for Granny to walk on, though she nearly slipped and busted her bum. At least nobody would have been around to see poor Granny in such a sorry state of affairs. Granny got a good look into some of those boats and she's sure it'll all be worth the trouble once she's got them freed.

Source: Hello, dear. Granny's still shaking the ashes out of her clothes from her jaunt through the Ashlands. Seems she wasn't the first to have the idea of poking around for unclaimed goods. Granny must have seen a dozen departed souls on the first day without so much as a loincloth stuck to their bones.
Target: Hello, dear. Granny's still shaking the ashes out of her clothes from her jaunt through the Ashlands. Seems she wasn't the first to have the idea of poking around for unclaimed goods. Granny must have seen a dozen departed souls on the first day without so much as a loincloth stuck to their bones.

Source: Turns out there's a whole flock of ash folk that have their home out there and they don't leave nothing to waste. Now Granny won't be discouraged by those ash folk's claim to things, so she's having her caravaner take her out in search of their camp. He don't seem too happy about it, but Granny's paying so that's all there is to say on the matter.
Target: Turns out there's a whole flock of ash folk that have their home out there and they don't leave nothing to waste. Now Granny won't be discouraged by those ash folk's claim to things, so she's having her caravaner take her out in search of their camp. He don't seem too happy about it, but Granny's paying so that's all there is to say on the matter.

Source: Good news, loyal customers! Granny Gravius's Gently Used Goods is pleased to announce a new line of quality products well suited for any special occasion: Granny Gravius's Rarefied Relics and Antiques! You are pre-qualified for Granny Gravius's Rarefied Relics and Antiques and will be receiving specially tailored offers by courier soon.
Target: Good news, loyal customers! Granny Gravius's Gently Used Goods is pleased to announce a new line of quality products well suited for any special occasion: Granny Gravius's Rarefied Relics and Antiques! You are pre-qualified for Granny Gravius's Rarefied Relics and Antiques and will be receiving specially tailored offers by courier soon.

Source: Discerning Customer, along with your usual shipment this one has included a small sample of pristine Dwemer fabric available for pre-order from Granny Gravius's Rarefied Relics and Antiques. Quality unmatched for centuries can soon be yours. Return your order form forthwith to secure your place on the waiting list. Fulfillment by Hawker.
Target: Discerning Customer, along with your usual shipment this one has included a small sample of pristine Dwemer fabric available for pre-order from Granny Gravius's Rarefied Relics and Antiques. Quality unmatched for centuries can soon be yours. Return your order form forthwith to secure your place on the waiting list. Fulfillment by Hawker.

Source: Granny finally gave that lizard-bird what was coming to it, pretended to nod off this evening and sure enough the chicken-livered beast came swooping down to have a peck of ole Granny. That's when she gave that pesky critter a solid wack on the head, climbed down to give it one last kick, and took some plumage too, for good measure.
Target: Granny finally gave that lizard-bird what was coming to it, pretended to nod off this evening and sure enough the chicken-livered beast came swooping down to have a peck of ole Granny. That's when she gave that pesky critter a solid wack on the head, climbed down to give it one last kick, and took some plumage too, for good measure.

Source: Granny's almost to the Ashlands, so she figures couriers will be hard to come by. She's sent word back to her place of business to make sure her favorite customer's well taken care of. Don't you worry none about old Granny, she's not going to let any overcooked patch of dirt get the best of her.
Target: Granny's almost to the Ashlands, so she figures couriers will be hard to come by. She's sent word back to her place of business to make sure her favorite customer's well taken care of. Don't you worry none about old Granny, she's not going to let any overcooked patch of dirt get the best of her.

Source: Discerning Customer, this one is contacting you in regard to your account with Granny Gravius's Gently Used Goods. There is nothing wrong with your account; however, you have not responded to the wondrous deals offered by Granny Gravius's Rarefied Relics and Antiques. This one wishes to know if you've received our mailings. Fulfillment by Hawker.
Target: Discerning Customer, this one is contacting you in regard to your account with Granny Gravius's Gently Used Goods. There is nothing wrong with your account; however, you have not responded to the wondrous deals offered by Granny Gravius's Rarefied Relics and Antiques. This one wishes to know if you've received our mailings. Fulfillment by Hawker.

Source: Discerning Customer, this one regrets to inform you that orders for Granny Gravius's Rarefied Relic and Antiques are no longer being accepted at this time. Any payments included for orders received after this date will be returned within ninety business days. Fulfillment by Hawker.
Target: 단골 고객 인 경우, Granny Gravius의 Rarefied Relic 및 Antiques에 대한 주문이 현재 더 이상 허용되지 않는다는 사실을 알리기 위해 후회합니다. 이 날짜 이후에 접수 된 주문에 대한 지불은 영업일 기준으로 90 일 이내에 반환됩니다. 호커의 성취.

Source: Discerning Customer, this one has included a Dwemer leather scrap with your shipment. Note its suppleness and elasticity. Dwarven machine belts were manufactured to last thousands of hours of heavy use, but we have seen they can last thousands of years. Never risk popping a girdle again! Fulfillment by Hawker.
Target: Discerning Customer, this one has included a Dwemer leather scrap with your shipment. Note its suppleness and elasticity. Dwarven machine belts were manufactured to last thousands of hours of heavy use, but we have seen they can last thousands of years. Never risk popping a girdle again! Fulfillment by Hawker.

Source: Discerning Customer, attached is an artist's rendition of your home after just one easy order of Dwemer bowls and cups. Both beautiful and nearly indestructible, they ensure refined dining long after the fall of civilization. Order a full set and get a pattern for Dwarven forge-mitts, no less useful in the kitchen! Fulfillment by Hawker.
Target: Discerning Customer, attached is an artist's rendition of your home after just one easy order of Dwemer bowls and cups. Both beautiful and nearly indestructible, they ensure refined dining long after the fall of civilization. Order a full set and get a pattern for Dwarven forge-mitts, no less useful in the kitchen! Fulfillment by Hawker.

Source: Your daily delivery is enclosed.  It occurs to me, in my travels, that the rest of Tamriel is filled with just the sort of people I try to ignore at home. And the worst of it is, in their lands, I'm the tourist.
Target: 당신의 일일 배송을 동봉합니다. 제가 여행을 하는 동안 떠오르는 생각은 나머지 탐리엘 사람들이 제가 집에서  모른 체 하려고 하는 바로 그런 사람들로 가득 차 있다는 것입니다. 그 중에서도 최악인 것은, 그들의 땅에서, 제가 관광객이라는 것입니다.

Source: Still searching for a group, but I've been able to pick up crafting materials here and there. I'm sure you would hate for your faithful hireling to fall prey to bandits or some such! Always safety in numbers. Still, I'm ever vigilant about my shipments. Please enjoy these materials!
Target: Still searching for a group, but I've been able to pick up crafting materials here and there. I'm sure you would hate for your faithful hireling to fall prey to bandits or some such! Always safety in numbers. Still, I'm ever vigilant about my shipments. Please enjoy these materials!

Source: Here is your delivery. I am now going to take a hot bath and consider why traveling only seems like an adventure in retrospect.
Target: 여기 당신의 배달물입니다, 이제 저는 뜨거운 목욕을 하면서 왜 여행이 추억 속의 모험처럼 보이는지 고려해 보겠습니다.

Source: I've been thinking lately about my current collection methods. Surely Y'ffre does not mind take I that which has already fallen? I'm not hurting the Green in any way. So I've begun to wonder if perhaps I may partake in a meal of fruit that has also already fallen? I'll think upon it, but for now here is your latest shipment.
Target: I've been thinking lately about my current collection methods. Surely Y'ffre does not mind take I that which has already fallen? I'm not hurting the Green in any way. So I've begun to wonder if perhaps I may partake in a meal of fruit that has also already fallen? I'll think upon it, but for now here is your latest shipment.

Source: As I gathered components for this delivery, I got to thinking about moths. Why do you only see them at night? I'm not saying that they're vampire butterflies, but I started carrying extra toothpicks, just to be safe.
Target: 지금 배달할 품목들을 모으던 중인데, 나방에 대한 생각이 났어. 왜 나방은 밤에만 볼 수 있을까? 물론 나방이 무슨 흡혈나비라고 생각하는 건 아니야. 그래도 혹시 모르니까 이제 밤에는 여분의 이쑤시개를 챙겨서 다니고 있어.

Source: After much thought I've decided against eating fruit, even that which has dropped from the trees. I'm not sure if my stomach could handle it, not to mention the diseases that I might develop. I'm not sure how the other races can handle such a diet. My collection of woodworking materials continues, however. Please enjoy!
Target: After much thought I've decided against eating fruit, even that which has dropped from the trees. I'm not sure if my stomach could handle it, not to mention the diseases that I might develop. I'm not sure how the other races can handle such a diet. My collection of woodworking materials continues, however. Please enjoy!

Source: I got caught in two rainstorms yesterday, and then a hailstorm, which is hard rain that hurts and puts dents in your armor. Bad weather always surprises me. I'm glad I'm not a pessimist, because I don't think I'd be a very good one.
Target: 두번의 폭풍우를 맞이하고 난 후에 우박 폭풍이 오더군요.  그건 아프고 제 갑옷을 찌그러트리는 강한 비였어요. 나쁜 날씨는 언제나 절 놀라게 하죠. 제가 비관주의자가 아니라 다행입니다.  왜냐면 좋은일이 될거란 생각이 안들거든요.

Source: Met that shady Nord on the road again. The good news is that he was able to sell me the materials for this latest shipment. The bad news is that I believe he may be following me. Perhaps I'll travel within the forest for a few days. Just in case.
Target: Met that shady Nord on the road again. The good news is that he was able to sell me the materials for this latest shipment. The bad news is that I believe he may be following me. Perhaps I'll travel within the forest for a few days. Just in case.

Source: The thing I hate the most about traveling in Tamriel are the damnable gnats, buzzing in my ears and stinging my flesh. Someone told me that the buzzing is the mating call of male gnats, but only female gnats bite, so now I get more nervous when I don't hear anything at all!
Target: 탐리엘 여행에서 내가 가장 싫어하는 것은, 내 귀에 윙윙거리는 소리를 내고, 내 피부를 찌르는 빌어먹을 하루살이 벌레들이다. 누군가가 윙윙거리는 소리는 수컷이 암컷을 유혹하는 소리고, 무는 것은 암컷 뿐이라고 얘기해 줬다. 그래서 이제는 아무 소리도 안 들리는 게 더 불안하다.

Source: I had a great revelation today. After not meeting a single merchant for days, I stood amidst a grove of trees, worrying about my next shipment. As I looked around I noticed how much dead limber was collected upon the forest's floor. There's no harm in taking what has already fallen! Please enjoy this shipment of freshly collected materials.
Target: I had a great revelation today. After not meeting a single merchant for days, I stood amidst a grove of trees, worrying about my next shipment. As I looked around I noticed how much dead limber was collected upon the forest's floor. There's no harm in taking what has already fallen! Please enjoy this shipment of freshly collected materials.

Source: Another fine lot of provisioner components are enclosed. I decided to give up on music shortly after a drunken Nord smashed my mandolin. Looking for a new hobby, now. I thought about taking up juggling, but I don't have the balls. Any suggestions?
Target: 괜찮은 식량 공급용 품목들을 포장했어. 참, 어떤 술 취한 노르드가 내 만돌린을 부숴먹는 바람에 음악은 포기하기로 했지 뭐야. 다른 취미를 찾아보고 있었는데 저글링을 배우는 것도 괜찮을 것 같아, 그치만 저글링 할 공이 없어.  다른 제안 없니?

Source: I send you this shipment along with a bit of bad news. I seemed to have unwillingly entered quite a ... debate last night with the Wood Elf group that I'm traveling with. They questioned my loyalty to the Green Pact, and tried to convince me to leave my line of current work. Of course I have no such wish! Still, their words are hard to swallow.
Target: I send you this shipment along with a bit of bad news. I seemed to have unwillingly entered quite a ... debate last night with the Wood Elf group that I'm traveling with. They questioned my loyalty to the Green Pact, and tried to convince me to leave my line of current work. Of course I have no such wish! Still, their words are hard to swallow.

Source: I'm often met with skepticism when I talk of my conviction in the Pact. No matter! As long as I hold faith, I don't care what others say. Just because I cannot easily obtain or use these crafting materials does not mean that it goes against my faith to send them to you. I hope you're able to craft a fine piece from this shipment.
Target: I'm often met with skepticism when I talk of my conviction in the Pact. No matter! As long as I hold faith, I don't care what others say. Just because I cannot easily obtain or use these crafting materials does not mean that it goes against my faith to send them to you. I hope you're able to craft a fine piece from this shipment.

Source: I've finally found a group of Wood Elves to travel with, though I haven't been met with the warmest reception. I believe my currently employment is somewhat off-putting for them. I've tried to explain my reasoning, but to no avail. Still, here is your shipment, as promised!
Target: I've finally found a group of Wood Elves to travel with, though I haven't been met with the warmest reception. I believe my currently employment is somewhat off-putting for them. I've tried to explain my reasoning, but to no avail. Still, here is your shipment, as promised!

Source: It's odd that my Wood Elf companions are quieter than the group of Redguards I traveled with. The look in their eyes makes the back of my neck crawl, especially when I'm trading for your crafting materials. I'm not sure how much longer I'll be with this group. But have no fear! I'll still make sure my shipments are timely and well stocked.
Target: It's odd that my Wood Elf companions are quieter than the group of Redguards I traveled with. The look in their eyes makes the back of my neck crawl, especially when I'm trading for your crafting materials. I'm not sure how much longer I'll be with this group. But have no fear! I'll still make sure my shipments are timely and well stocked.

Source: I met a spot of trouble while collecting this shipment for you. A few of the Wood Elves I'm traveling with happened to catch me as I gathered your materials, and began to question what I was doing. I calmly explained that all I had collected was already fallen, but they simply refuse to listen. I'm not sure how much longer I'll be welcomed.
Target: I met a spot of trouble while collecting this shipment for you. A few of the Wood Elves I'm traveling with happened to catch me as I gathered your materials, and began to question what I was doing. I calmly explained that all I had collected was already fallen, but they simply refuse to listen. I'm not sure how much longer I'll be welcomed.

Source: Good day, my friend! Here is your delivery. My clarity of mind has improved considerably since out last correspondence. I believe this to be the result of daily meditation; a practice that I have recently taken up. I find it vastly preferable to sitting around doing nothing.
Target: 안녕하십니까, 내 친구여! 여기 물건을 보냅니다. 마지막 편지를 주고 받은 때부터 제 정신은 이제 꽤나 맑아졌어요. 이게 다 매일 하는 명상 덕분이라고 생각해요; 최근 계속하고 있는 연습이에요.  아무것도 안하고 빈둥거리는 것보다는 훨씬 나은 일이에요.

Source: Once again, my possessions and I came to a parting of the ways. This time I was set upon by bandits. Ah, well. As my grandfather used to say: "The more you have, the more you want. But the less you have, the wider the selection." I can only conclude that my future contains unlimited possibilities.
Target: 나는 또 다시 나의 소유물과 작별했어. 이번에는 도적들에게 습격당했거든. 할아버지께서 말씀하시곤 했지 \\"가진 것이 많을 수록 더 많은 것을 원하게 된다. 하지만 적게 가지면 선택의 폭이 넓어진다.\"\" 그래
column4: 나는 나의 미래가 무한한 가능성을 가지고 있다고 결론지을 수 밖에 없어. "

Source: I hope this delivery finds you well. I purchased a mandolin and I'm teaching myself to play. In fact, today I wrote a song on cats. That may have been a mistake, because verse number three got run over by a wagon. Next time I'll use parchment.
Target: 이 물건들이 당신을 잘 찾았으면 좋겠습니다.  저는 만돌린을 하나 구입했고 혼자서 연주해보고 있습니다. 사실은 오늘 고양이 위에 노래를 써봤어요. 그건 실수였죠. 왜냐하면  세번째 절이 마차에서 도망쳐버렸으니까요.  다음번엔 양피지를 써야겠네요.

Source: I decided that meditation is not for me, and thought I might take up the study of music. I found an Orc merchant specializing in musical instruments of every type. I asked him for a recommendation. He sold me a blunt instrument and told me to knock myself out. I was a half day's ride from him before I got the joke.
Target: 명상은 나랑 맞지 않는 것 같아서 저는 음악을 공부하기로 했던 적이 있어요. 저는 모든 악기를 다룰 줄 아는 오크 상인을 만났죠.  전 그에게 추천을 해달라고 했어요. 그는 저에게 뭉툭한 악기를 팔았고 한번 두드려 보라고 하던군요.  그게 농담이라는건  반나절 쯤 말을 타고 간 후였어요.

Source: I've had many close calls on the road with highwayman, ferocious animals, and monsters of every description, and yet I still continue in this line of work. Why? I'm not sure. I'm no hero, believe me. I just figure that death is inevitable, and the day I die will be a day like any other. Just a bit shorter.
Target: 노상강도, 사나운 동물들, 모든 괴물들 때문에 거의 죽을뻔 했지만 작업은 계속됩니다. 왜? 나는 잘 모르겠습니다. 나는 영웅이 아닙니다.진짜에요. 나는 죽음을 피할 수 없다는 것을 알고 있으며, 내가 죽는 날은 다른 어떤 날과 전혀 다르지 않을겁니다. 다만 조금 더 짧은 날일뿐. - G

Source: Today a Redguard spoke to me about my business practices. He wondered how much profit I made, buying materials as a hireling rather than gather them myself. He balked when I admitted my numbers. Yes, perhaps my current trade will not bring me great wealth, but the thought of you using these materials to their fullest is fulfillment enough.
Target: Today a Redguard spoke to me about my business practices. He wondered how much profit I made, buying materials as a hireling rather than gather them myself. He balked when I admitted my numbers. Yes, perhaps my current trade will not bring me great wealth, but the thought of you using these materials to their fullest is fulfillment enough.

Source: Waxing philosophic on the road today. I see Dark Anchors everywhere and the drums of war filling the air, and I find myself growing more and more pessemistic about Tamriel's future. What if today turns out to be the tomorrow I worried about yesterday? Also, I am quite drunk.
Target: 오늘 조금 철학적인 기분으로 걸어보았습니다. 주변에는 다크 앵커들과 전쟁의 북소리로 공기를 채우고 있고, 나는 Tamriel의 미래에 대해 점점 더 비관적 인 태도를 취하고 있음을 알게됩니다. 만약 오늘이 어제 걱정했던 것과 같은 날이 된다면? 또한, 나는 꽤 술에 취해 있었다.

Source: I thank you for the continued faith you've had in me as your hireling. With all of the trade available in Elsweyr, I have no worries in missing my shipment deadlines. Most merchants I meet have crafting materials on hand, and are more than happy to sell or trade them.
Target: I thank you for the continued faith you've had in me as your hireling. With all of the trade available in Elsweyr, I have no worries in missing my shipment deadlines. Most merchants I meet have crafting materials on hand, and are more than happy to sell or trade them.

Source: I have never been a religious man, but I've taken to visiting shrines and temples of late, to educate myself about the various dieties of Tamriel. After weeks of careful study, I have come to the conclusion that everybody seems to worship the gods that hate the same people they do. Curious.
Target: 나는 신실한 사람이 아니야, 하지만 늦게나마 제단과 사원들을 찾아가 보기는 했지. 탐리엘의 여러 신격들에는 누가 누가 있나 알아보려고 말이야. 몇 주간 세심히 연구한 결과, 내 나름의 깨달음을 얻었어.  사람들은 섬길 신을 고를 때, 자기가 싫어하는 사람들을 똑같이 싫어하는 신을 선택하더군.  흥미로운 현상이야.

Source: I wonder what you'll make from my latest shipment? Perhaps a lovely fire staff, or a strong, solid shield! Why, the possibilities are endless. I hope whatever you make helps you throughout your adventures.
Target: 나는 당신이 나의 최신 선적으로 무엇을 만들지 궁금합니다. 아마도 사랑스러운 소방 요원이나 강하고 단단한 방패 일 것입니다! 왜, 가능성은 끝이 없습니다. 당신이 만드는 모든 것이 모험을 통해 도움이되기를 바랍니다.

Source: Ducked into a tavern to get out of the rain and have a hot meal. The food was terrible and the service was worse, but I honestly didn't mind. It made me feel better about not having enough coin to leave a tip. Your components are enclosed.
Target: 비가 와서 뜨거운 식사를하기 위해 선술집으로 피했습니다. 음식은 끔찍했고 서비스는 더 나빴습니다. 그러나 나는 솔직히 신경 쓰지 않았습니다. 팁으로 낼 동전이 부족할때, 죄책감을 느낄 필요가 없으니까요. 당신의 물품이 동봉되어 있습니다.

Source: When I speak of my trade to others, I'm often met with confusion. I know it's not uncommon for Wood Elves to trade for wooden wares, but to make a career out of it does stand out.
