I find I need to be much more subtle in my dealings. Not everything can be dealt with using a hammer and a nail. That was the thought going through my head as I went out to deal with Constable Chedric.
Target: 제가 기업가가되기 전에는 목공예가 였을 때 제 삶은 훨씬 단순하고 명확했습니다. 이제 상황은 상당히 복잡해졌습니다. 나는 내 거래에서 훨씬 더 미묘 할 필요가 있음을 알았다. 망치와 못을 사용하여 모든 것을 다룰 수있는 것은 아닙니다. 그것은 내가 Constable Chedric을 다루기 위해 나섰던 것에 따라 나의 머리를 지나는 생각이었다. - G

Source: All in all, I was beginning to feel a bit silly, what with a flock of birds surrounding me and no clear idea how to finish my daring rescue of Plucky and the rabbit. That was when I think Kyne herself lent a hand. A huge eagle swooped out of the sky. It frightened the other birds so much that they exploded away from me—and right into the cultists!
Target: 전부해서, 나는 바보 같은 느낌이 들기 시작했다. 나를 둘러싸고있는 새 무리와 Plucky와 토끼에 대한 나의 대담한 구출을 어떻게 끝내야하는지 명확하지 않다. 그것이 바로 Kyne 자신이 손을 빌려준 것이라고 생각할 때였습니다. 거대한 독수리가 하늘에서 날아 들었다. 그것은 다른 새들을 너무 두려워하여 저를 멀리서 폭발 시켰습니다.

Source: Oh, patron! You should have seen the cultists' faces as I came storming into their camp with a flock of birds. Aleet's potion worked amazingly well, attracting winged creatures of all shapes and sizes. They surrounded me like a cloud of wings and talons—like the fury of Kyne herself burst upon them! Now if I had only planned my next move.
Target: 아, 후원자! 내가 새 무리로 캠프에 몰려 들면서 컬트의 얼굴을 보았어 야했다. 함대의 물약은 모든 모양과 크기의 날개 달린 생물을 끌어 들이며 놀랍도록 잘 작동했습니다. 그들은 날개와 탤론의 구름처럼 나를 감쌌다. Kyne 자신의 분노가 그들 위에 터지 듯이! 이제 나는 내 다음 행동을 계획했다.

Source: I charged the cultists, surrounded by all manner of birds attracted to me after I drank Aleet's potion. Now we stared at each other, the cultists confused and nervous, me unsure how best to proceed with my daring plan to rescue Plucky and the rabbit. My moment of surprise was quickly evaporating, but I didn't have a clue as to what to do next.
Target: Aleet의 묘약을 마신 후에 모든 종류의 새들이 내게 끌린 컬트리스트들을 위탁했다. 이제 우리는 서로를 빤히 보았고, 혼란스럽고 긴장한 컬 티스트들, 대담한 계획을 Plucky와 토끼를 구하기위한 최선의 방법으로 확신하지 못했습니다. 놀라움의 순간은 빠르게 증발하고 있었지만 다음에해야할 일에 대한 단서가 없었습니다. - G

Source: Those sermons I endured at the side of the priest of Mara must have rubbed off on me, after all. Staring into the depths of that shadowy hood, I suddenly didn't want to go through with this dark contract anymore. What was I thinking, trying to have an officer of the law assassinated by the Dark Brotherhood? I'm sure the figure will understand.
Target: 결국 나는 마라 성직자의 편에서 견디었던 설교가 내게 문질러 댔을 것이다. 저 그림자의 깊은 곳을 응시하면서 나는 갑자기이 어두운 계약을 맺기를 원하지 않았다. 나는 어둠의 형제애에 의해 암살당하는 법관을 찾으려하고 무엇을 생각하고 있었습니까? 나는 그 인물이 이해할 것이라고 확신한다.

Source: With a tinge of regret, I bid farewell to the alchemist Aleet-Uka today. He decided to continue on, while I needed to see a man about a rumor in the little village on the hill. Turns out, he may have a lead on another ruin I can investigate. In the meantime, enjoy this shipment of components!
Target: 유감스럽게도 오늘 나는 연금술사 인 Aleet-Uka에게 작별 인사를한다. 그는 계속 언덕에있는 작은 마을에서 소문에 대해 한 남자를 볼 필요가있는 동안 계속하기로 결정했습니다. 그가 조사 할 수있는 또 다른 파멸을 주도 할 수도 있습니다. 그동안 부품 배송을 즐기십시오! - G

Source: "You made a mistake?" the dark figure said with more than a hint of incredulity. "That must be the first time such a thing has happened. You mistakenly built an effigy, set up candles, accidentally stabbed the effigy multiple times, and inadvertently spoke the prescribed words of power. Is that what you're telling me?" I nodded an affirmation.
Target: \\"You made a mistake?\"\" the dark figure said with more than a hint of incredulity. \"\"That must be the first time such a thing has happened. You mistakenly built an effigy
column4: set up candles
column5: accidentally stabbed the effigy multiple times
column6: and inadvertently spoke the prescribed words of power. Is that what you're telling me?\"\" I nodded an affirmation."

Source: On the way to the village on the hill, Plucky decided to run off and chase a rabbit. Stupid dog thinks that if he catches the rabbit, it will magically give him rabbit meatballs—cooked and ready to eat! If only that were true. Maybe if we catch a few of the long-eared creatures, I can find a cook in town who knows how to prepare the delicacy.
Target: 언덕 위의 마을로가는 길에, Plucky는 도망 치고 토끼를 쫓기로 결정했습니다. 어리석은 개는 그가 토끼를 잡으면 마법 고기로 토끼 미트볼을 먹을 준비가되어 있다고 생각합니다! 그게 사실이라면. 어쩌면 우리가 긴 귀가 먹은 생물 몇 마리를 잡으면 진미를 준비하는 방법을 알고있는 마을의 요리사를 만날 수 있습니다.

Source: What a gruesome ritual! I made an effigy of Constable Chedric, as instructed, but I'm still waiting for the Nightshade petals to arrive from the alchemist. Then I have to sit inside a circle of candles, stab the effigy, and whisper some inane words that don't make a lick of sense. If this is just an elaborate prank, someone's going to get hurt.
Target: 이 얼마나 끔찍한 의식인가! 나는 지시 된대로 Constable Chedric의 인형을 만들었지 만, 여전히 Nightshade 꽃잎이 연금술사로부터 도착하기를 기다리고있다. 그럼 나는 촛불의 원안에 앉아서 인형을 찔러야하고, 감각을 자극하지 않는 끔찍한 단어들을 속삭여 야합니다. 이것은 단지 정교한 농담 일 뿐이라면 누군가가 다칠 것입니다.

Source: I followed Plucky as he chased the rabbit, but a strange noise ahead gave me pause. I drew my weapon and approached, using what cover I could to conceal my presence. From my hiding place, I saw a sight that made my blood run cold. Daedric cultists! Three robed figures tossed nets over both Plucky and the rabbit. And the day had started so well.
Target: 나는 Plucky가 토끼를 쫓을 때 따라 갔지만, 이상한 소리가 나에게 멈추게했다. 나는 내 무기를 꺼내서 내 존재를 은폐 할 수있는 것을 사용하여 접근했다. 숨어 있던 곳에서 나는 피가 춥게 된 광경을 보았다. Daedric cultists! 3 명의 입힌 인물이 Plucky와 토끼 모두에 그물을 던졌다. 그리고 그날은 너무나 잘 시작되었습니다. - G

Source: I was beginning to think the whole ritual thing to summon a representative of the Dark Brotherhood was some kind of prank to make me look silly, but no sooner had I finished reciting the words than a figure in a black-hooded robe stepped out of the shadows. "Who do you need dealt with, petitioner?" the hooded figure asked.
Target: I was beginning to think the whole ritual thing to summon a representative of the Dark Brotherhood was some kind of prank to make me look silly, but no sooner had I finished reciting the words than a figure in a black-hooded robe stepped out of the shadows. \\"Who do you need dealt with
column4: petitioner?\"\" the hooded figure asked."

Source: How do I get myself into these situations? Now I have to save Plucky and his rabbit from a trio of Daedric cultists who are preparing to begin some kind of ritual. And Plucky and the rabbit are the main components in the foul ceremony! Think, Valinka, think! There has to be something—wait, Aleet's potion! I have an idea ….
Target: 어떻게 이런 상황에 처하게 될까요? 이제 나는 Plucky와 그의 토끼를 어떤 종류의 의식을 시작할 준비를하고있는 Daedric cultists의 트리오 (trio)로부터 구해야 만합니다. 그리고 Plucky와 토끼는 파울 의식의 주요 구성 요소입니다! 생각 해봐, 발린 카, 생각해! Aleet의 묘약이 기다려야합니다! 나는 아이디어가 …. - G

Source: Today the caravan passed a group of fat mercenaries, huffing and puffing their way down the road. They claimed to be "separatists." This one thinks they should try separating themselves from their sweetrolls.
Target: Today the caravan passed a group of fat mercenaries, huffing and puffing their way down the road. They claimed to be \\"separatists.\"\" This one thinks they should try separating themselves from their sweetrolls."

Source: I was deep in the ruins of Indaren Manor, held fast by fear and the ghostly power surrounding the Veiled Lady. I couldn't even draw my weapon, for all the good it would do against the spirit. "You have found only doom," she moaned, her voice a winter wind whispering through the eaves. I closed my eyes, happy that Plucky was safe in the village.
Target: 나는 인다렌의 폐허 깊은 곳에 베일드 레이디를 둘러싸고 있는 공포와 유령 같은 힘에 의해 단단히  붙잡혀 있었습니다. 나는 영혼과 맞서는데 별 도움 안되는 무기조차  들 수 없었죠. \\"당신은 오직 파멸만을 찾았군요.\"\" 그녀는 처마 사이로 속삭이는 겨울 바람처럼 탄식했어요. 나는 플러키가 마을에서 무사함을 기뻐하며 눈을 감았습니다."

Source: You may have noticed by now that sarcasm is only one of the many services that Zukki offers. He also specializes in mockery and open derision.
Target: You may have noticed by now that sarcasm is only one of the many services that Zukki offers. He also specializes in mockery and open derision.

Source: Something had changed. I opened one eye to see the Veiled Lady's shawl was back in place and she had stopped moving. There, between us, stood a rabbit. I couldn't be sure, but I think it was the one I rescued from the cultists. It was locked in a contest of stares with the ghost, thereby shattering the spell that held me. So I ran.
Target: 뭔가 바뀌 었습니다. Veiled Lady의 목도리가 제자리로 돌아 왔고 그녀가 움직이지 않는 것을 보았습니다. 거기에 우리 사이에 토끼가있었습니다. 확신 할 수는 없지만 그것이 내가 컬트리스트들로부터 구한 것이라고 생각합니다. 그것은 유령과 응시하는 콘테스트에 갇히게되어 나를 붙잡은 주문을 산산조각 냈습니다. 그래서 나는 달렸다. - G

Source: I finally found my betrothed working in a house of ill-repute. She was not the bright-eyed lass I remembered, and immediately the wise words of my beloved mother came to me, from so many years ago. "You shouldn't have picked that up," she told me, "you don't know where it's been."
Target: 이제야 내 사랑하는 여자를 매춘굴에서 찾을 수 있었다. 하지만 내가 기억했던 것처럼 밝은 눈동자의 여자는 아니었다. 그리고 벌써 몇 년 전에 들었던 사랑하는 엄마의 말이 생각났다. \\"그런 거 줍지 마라. 어디 있었는지 모르니까.\"\""

Source: Dear patron. I wasn't able to recover the lost treasure of Indaren Manor. However, I did learn a valuable lesson. Sometimes an act of kindness can save your life—no matter how delicious the rabbit meatballs may be. Or something like that. Your components are included.
Target: 후견인 여러분. 나는 Indaren Manor의 잃어버린 보물을 되 찾을 수 없었다. 그러나 나는 값진 교훈을 배웠다. 토끼 미트볼이 얼마나 맛있을지라도 친절한 행동으로 삶을 구할 수 있습니다. 아니면 그런 식으로. 귀하의 구성 요소가 포함되어 있습니다. - G

Source: This one is growing tired of the young ones.  Kittens are rude and disrespectful, and they are always threatening to run away. This is the only thing that keeps Zukki going.
Target: This one is growing tired of the young ones.  Kittens are rude and disrespectful, and they are always threatening to run away. This is the only thing that keeps Zukki going.

Source: Here are your components. I don't know if I've told you this, but I appreciate the trust you continue to impart to me. This is the best job I have ever had. I am paid just enough to avoid quitting, and work just enough to avoid getting fired.
Target: 당신에게 물건을 드립니다. 이미 전달하고 있는지 모르겠습니다만, 저에게 위탁해 주는 것에 감사합니다. 이 일은 제가 지금까지 해온 가운데 최고입니다. 그만두지 않는 정도의 급료를 받으며 잘리지 않는 만큼의 일을 하면 좋으니까.

Source: On the road again, and I find myself heading in the direction of the Bthunzel ruins. You'd think that my encounter with the Veiled Lady would have cured me of my fascination with dungeons and adventures, but you'd be wrong. I'm a Nord! Adventure is what we live for! And mead. We love mead.
Target: 다시 길에서 나는 Bthunzel 폐허의 방향으로 향하고있다. Veiled Lady와의 만남이 던전과 모험에 대한 나의 매력을 치유 할 것이라고 생각 하겠지만, 틀렸을 것입니다. 나는 노르! 모험은 우리가 사는 것입니다! 그리고 미친. 우리는 미친 사랑한다. - G

Source: It recently occurred to Zukki that his sarcasm is so advanced that stupid people think he is stupid, as well. Consequently, he has been inadvertently making a lot of friends. He hates them all, but he has no idea how to show it.
Target: It recently occurred to Zukki that his sarcasm is so advanced that stupid people think he is stupid, as well. Consequently, he has been inadvertently making a lot of friends. He hates them all, but he has no idea how to show it.

Source: If these Khajiit do not wish to hear a snarky reply, why do they keep asking Zukki stupid questions? Here are your components.
Target: If these Khajiit do not wish to hear a snarky reply, why do they keep asking Zukki stupid questions? Here are your components.

Source: Zukki recently noticed that some Argonians are easily irritated and inclined to resent it if you poke them with a stick. He also discovered that you can find out which ones by poking them with a stick.
Target: Zukki recently noticed that some Argonians are easily irritated and inclined to resent it if you poke them with a stick. He also discovered that you can find out which ones by poking them with a stick.

Source: The Veiled Lady's question was appropriate. After all, I had invaded her manor without permission. But none of the other ghosts I encountered hindered my advance, so I didn't expect this one to prove troublesome. "I seek the lost Indaren treasure," I said. Suddenly, the air around the spirit churned and swirled, and her veil pulled back to reveal—
Target: 베일드 레이디의 질문은 정당했습니다. 결국 나는 허락도 없이 그녀의 저택을 침범했던 것이었죠. 그러나 내가 마주친 다른 유령들 중 내 앞길을 방해하는 귀신은 하나도 없었기 때문에 이 귀신이 문제가 될 줄은 몰랐습니다. 나는 \\"잃어버린 인다렌의 보물을 찾고 있소\"\"라고 말했습니다. 그러자 갑자기 영혼을 둘러싼 공기가 주변을 휘젓듯이 소용돌이치며 그녀의 베일이 뒤로 당겨져 모습을 드러냈어요."

Source: This one believes he has determined the proper number of times you can ask someone to repeat themselves before simply nodding and pretending you understood. Three.
Target: This one believes he has determined the proper number of times you can ask someone to repeat themselves before simply nodding and pretending you understood. Three.

Source: I can't describe the ghostly visage revealed when the Veiled Lady's shawl parted. Really. I've tried. The words come out as gibberish and the letters as undecipherable runes. But I can tell you that the sight frightened me to my very core. I was a child again, standing helpless before an angry spirit. And the spirit was drawing closer.
Target: 나는 Veiled Lady의 목도리가 헤어질 때 드러난 유령의 모습을 묘사 할 수 없다. 정말. 난 노력 했어. 그 말은 횡설수설로 나오고, 편지는 해독 할 수없는 룬으로 나온다. 그러나 그 광경이 나를 아주 두려워하게했다고 말할 수 있습니다. 나는 화를내는 영 앞에 무력 해 서 다시 아이였습니다. 그리고 그 정신은 점점 더 가까워졌습니다. - G

Source: This one can be annoyingly acerbic at times. He knows it is a character flaw. However, Zukki recently noticed that his caustic demeanor unintentionally frightens small children, so it may not be entirely without merit.
Target: This one can be annoyingly acerbic at times. He knows it is a character flaw. However, Zukki recently noticed that his caustic demeanor unintentionally frightens small children, so it may not be entirely without merit.

Source: It is Zukki. Do you remember him? Oh, wait. This one forgot that he only exists in your world when you need something from him. Take your delivery and choke on it.
Target: It is Zukki. Do you remember him? Oh, wait. This one forgot that he only exists in your world when you need something from him. Take your delivery and choke on it.

Source: Forgive Zukki's last outburst. He ran out of wine, which is vital to maintaining his ability to suffer the idiots who surround him. He has corrected this shortfall, and he is currently in the planning stages of a monumental hangover. In the meanwhile, here is your delivery.
Target: Forgive Zukki's last outburst. He ran out of wine, which is vital to maintaining his ability to suffer the idiots who surround him. He has corrected this shortfall, and he is currently in the planning stages of a monumental hangover. In the meanwhile, here is your delivery.

Source: I was exploring the haunted ruins of Indaren Manor when I encountered a most terrifying spirit—the Veiled Lady. This regal Dark Elf floated above the wrecked remains of the manor's banquet hall. I could see right through her, but her face was hidden behind a veil of gossamer ghost-silk. Her soft, piercing voice asked, "Why are you here?"
Target: 나는 인다렌의 귀신들린 저택의 폐허를 탐험하는 도중 가장 무서운 영혼인 베일드 레이디를 만났어요. 이 위풍 당당한 다크 엘프는 무너진 연회장의  잔해 위에 떠 있었죠. 나는 그녀를 똑바로 볼 수 있었지만, 그녀의 얼굴은 섬세한 귀신 실크로 만든 베일에 가려져 있었어요. 그녀의 부드럽고 날카로운 목소리가 물었습니다. \\"왜 여기에 온거지?\"\""

Source: "The Indaren ruins," Ilton Beran said with a dramatic flair. "You will not find a more haunted location—or a more dangerous one." Turns out, the Indarens were a wealthy family of Dark Elves who lived in a huge mansion a hundred or so years ago. And then something happened to them, but I had stopped listening by that point in the story.
Target: \\"인다렌 폐허는 말입니다.\"\" 일튼 베런은 극적인 톤으로 말했습니다. \"\"그 곳 보다 더한 귀신들린 장소나 더 위험한 곳은 없을 것입니다.\"\" 알고 보니 인다렌 사람들은 백여 년 전 거대한 저택에 살았던 부유한 다크엘프 가문이었어요. 그러다가 그들에게 무슨 일이 생겼지만
column4: 나는 이야기의 그 부분에서 듣는 걸 그만 뒀습니다."

Source: What a long-winded blowhard! But at least Ilton Beran was true to his reputation. He provided me with exacting directions to the haunted ruins known as Indaren Manor. He mentioned ghosts and lost treasure and something about unspeakable danger, but who can remember all those boring facts when there's adventure waiting? Components are included.
Target: 얼마나 긴 바람이 불어가는가! 그러나 최소한 Ilton Beran은 그의 평판에 충실했습니다. 그는 인덴 매너 (Indaren Manor)로 알려진 유령의 유적에 대한 정확한 지침을 제게 제공했습니다. 그는 귀신을 언급하고 보물과 말할 수없는 위험에 관한 것을 잃어 버렸지 만 모험이 기다리고있을 때 그 지루한 사실을 모두 기억할 수 있습니까? 구성 요소가 포함되어 있습니다. - G

Source: This could be it, patron. This could be the adventure that elevates me above that pretender, Narsis Dren. All I have to do is slip into the ruins of Indaren Manor, avoid the ghosts and untold dangers, and find at least one piece of the lost treasure. Easy as melting snow in a blacksmith's furnace! Wish me luck!
Target: 수호자 일 수도 있습니다. 이 말은 나귀스런 Dren보다 더 위를 치켜 드는 모험이 될 수 있습니다. 내가해야 할 일은 인덴 매너의 유적으로 빠져 들어가 유령과 막연한 위험을 피하고 적어도 잃어버린 보물 한 조각을 찾아내는 것입니다. 대장장이의 용광로에서 눈이 녹기 쉽다! 행운을 빌어! - G

Source: Who knew ghosts could be so touchy about their state of existence. And Dark Elf ghosts? Well, they're the only ghosts I've ever encountered, but it seems to me they must be the worst of the bunch. When I refused to show the least bit of fear at their spooky mischief, they became sullen and withdrawn. All except for the Veiled Lady.
Target: 유령이 그들의 존재 상태에 너무 민감 할 수 있다는 것을 알았던 사람. 그리고 다크 엘프의 유령? 글쎄, 그들은 내가 만난 유일한 유령이긴하지만 나에게는 그들이 최악 일 것 같아 보인다. 나는 그 무시 무시한 장난에 두려움을 가장하기를 거부했을 때, 헐렁하고 철저하게되었다. Veiled Lady를 제외한 모든 것. - G

Source:
For purchasing The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind Collector's Edition, you have received the Collector's Edition bonus features. 

• The Dwarven War Horse mount
• The Dwarven Spider pet
• Gray Bear Ability Skin
• Exclusive PvP Emotes
• Morag Tong Style Conversion, useable on most found or crafted items

Your new mount, pet, ability skin, and emotes can be found in your Collections menu.
Target:
For purchasing The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind Collector's Edition, you have received the Collector's Edition bonus features. 

• The Dwarven War Horse mount
• The Dwarven Spider pet
• Gray Bear Ability Skin
• Exclusive PvP Emotes
• Morag Tong Style Conversion, useable on most found or crafted items

Your new mount, pet, ability skin, and emotes can be found in your Collections menu.

Source: I'm so angry with Karamel Little-Leaf right now! Do you know what she did when she hugged me? She stole my map to the Bthunzel ruins! The same one I … acquired … from Narsis Dren! She tricked me. Like I was some milk-drinking Breton wench and not a Nord warrior maiden. There will be a reckoning. Of that, you can be sure!
Target: 나는 Karamel Little-Leaf에 너무 화가났다! 그녀가 나를 안아 주었을 때 그녀가 한 일을 알고 있습니까? 그녀는 나의지도를 Bthunzel 폐허에 훔쳤다! 나시 스 드렌에게서 얻은 건 ... 그녀는 나를 속였습니다. 내가 우유를 마시는 브르타뉴 어 마녀 였고 노르 드 전사의 처녀가 아니었던 것처럼. 응보가있을 것입니다. 그 중, 당신은 확신 할 수 있습니다! - G

Source:
Congratulations on your daring expedition to the Halls of Fabrication. We're all interested to hear about the private works of a Living God. I'd be a lot more impressed if you hadn't glided through on the robe hems of that philandering wizard, but the others insist that you're deserving of more than a pat on the backside. Enjoy it.

I hope you're keeping better company than that parchment skinned old codger now that you've returned to the land of flesh and beauties. Take it from Felvyn, you don't want Divayth Fyr anywhere near a promising bevvy of betties unless you fancy drinking alone. What's so intriguing about staring at stars anyway? But I digress.

Toasting to you,

Felvyn the Swordarm
Target:
대담한 원정대 원을 축하합니다. 우리 모두는 살아 계신 하느님의 사적인 일에 대해 듣고 싶어합니다. 당신이 그 탁월한 마법사의 옷가게 헴을 훑어 보지 않았다면 나는 더 감명 받았을 것입니다.하지만 다른 사람들은 당신이 뒷쪽에 두껍게 껴안는 것 이상의 가치가 있다고 주장합니다. 그것을 즐기십시오. 

 당신이 육체와 아름다움의 땅으로 돌아 왔으므로 그 양피지가 오래된 코닥을 껍질 벗기는 것보다 더 나은 회사를 유지하기를 바랍니다. 펠빈 (Felvyn)에게서 가져 가라. 혼자서 술 마시지 않는다면 유망한 베 비트 (bevy)의 근처에서 디바 야드 파이어 (Divyth Fyr)를 원하지 않을 것이다. 어쨌든 별을 응시하는 데 흥미로운 점은 무엇입니까? 하지만 나는 빗 나간다. 

 당신에게 달려 드는 것, 

 Swordarm을 알리십시오.

Source: Here are your goods. I don't know how, or why, but I seem to be acquiring a reputation of sorts. Strangers wink at me, as though they know me. Shopkeepers offer me discounts. I don't know what I did to deserve such respect, but I am truly honored. I wonder if those Morag Tong fellows have something to do with it?
Target: 여기 당신의 물건이 있습니다. 나는 어떻게, 또는 왜, 그러나 나는 종류의 명망을 취득하고있는 것을 보인다. 낯선 사람들은 저를 아는 것처럼 저를 윙크합니다. 가게 주인들은 저에게 할인을 제공합니다. 나는 그런 존경을받을 자격이 있는지 모르지만, 나는 정말로 존경 받는다. 모라그 통 친구들이 그 일과 관련이 있는지 궁금합니다. -

Source: Even without a map, I remember the general vicinity of the Bthunzel ruins. If I hurry, I might even be able to catch up with that little thief, Karamel. We'll see how well her jokes and the way she smiles and the funny way she tilts her head serves her when I wrap my fingers around her skinny Wood Elf neck! Your components are included.
Target: 지도가 없어도 Bthunzel 유적지의 일반적인 주변을 기억합니다. 서두르면 나는 그 작은 도둑 인 Karamel을 따라 잡을 수도 있습니다. 우리는 그녀의 농담과 그녀의 미소 짓는 모습, 그리고 그녀의 마른 체형의 나무 엘프 목에 손가락을 감쌀 때 그녀가 그녀의 머리를 기울이는 재미있는 방법을 보게 될 것입니다! 귀하의 구성 요소가 포함되어 있습니다. - G

Source: A hooded stranger appeared in the dead of night. I knew I could trust him, for he bore a tattoo like mine.  He gave me a scroll bearing the name of a local villager and told me he was a Mark, although the name on the scroll was Farfal. I promised that I would pay this Mark Farfal a visit, and give him the regards of the Morag Tong.
Target: 두건을 붙인 낯선 사람이 밤에 죽은 것처럼 보였다. 나는 그가 내처럼 문신을했기 때문에 그를 믿을 수 있음을 알았다. 그는 지역의 마을 사람의 이름을 지닌 두루마기를 나에게 주었고, 두루마리에 오른 이름이 파르팔 (Farfal)이긴하지만 그가 마크 (Mark)라고 말했다. 나는이 마크 파르 칼 (Mark Farfal)에게 방문을 지불하고 모라 통 (Morag Tong)에 관해서 그에게 줄 것을 약속했다.

Source: Plucky and I have sneaked up on a camp not far from where I think the ruins of Bthunzel are located. It's worse than I imagined! I found Karamel Little-Leaf—and she's sharing a drink with Morella the Cruel and her thugs! I guess our meeting at the bazaar wasn't an accident. It appears the Wood Elf thief works for Narsis Dren's nemesis!
Target: Plucky와 나는 Bthunzel의 폐허가 위치한다고 생각하는 곳에서 멀지 않은 곳에서 캠프에 몰래 들어왔다. 상상했던 것보다 더 나빠! 나는 카라멜 리틀 리프 (Karamel Little-Leaf)를 발견했습니다. 그녀는 Morella the Cruel과 그녀의 심복을 함께 마시고 있습니다! 시장에서의 만남은 우연이 아니었나 봅니다. 우드 엘프의 도둑이 나시스 드렌의 천적을 위해 일하는 것처럼 보입니다! - G

Source: Well, this Morag Tong membership continues to pay great dividends! This Mark Farfal fellow opened his home to me, fed me and gave me a large sum of gold! A strange fellow, what with that nervous twitch of his, but quite agreeable. Your components are enclosed.
Target: 거참, 모라그의 회원인 것은 매우 득이 되는 거죠. 이 마크 파팔 이라는 사람은 나를 집에 들여서 식사를 대접하고 많은 돈도 쥐어 준 것입니다. 좀 유별난 인물 같고 신경질적인 것도 있어 얼굴을 움찔거리는데 굉장히 좋은 사람이었습니다. 당신에게 물건을 동봉하겠습니다.

Source: I guess I have a nemesis now. Maybe even two. It appears that Morella the Cruel and Karamel Little-Leaf are working together to find the ruins of Bthunzel before I do. And they stole the map that I stole in order to beat me to it! I may just be mad enough to do something reckless. In true Nord tradition, of course.
Target: 나는 지금 네메시스를 가졌다 고 생각한다. 어쩌면 2 개. 내가하기 전에 Bthunzel의 폐허를 찾기 위해 잔인한 모렐라와 카라멜 리틀 리프가 함께 노력하고있는 것처럼 보입니다. 그리고 그들은 나를 훔치기 위해 내가 훔친지도를 훔쳤습니다! 나는 무언가를 무모하게 할만큼 충분히 화가 나 있을지 모른다. 물론, 진정한 노르 전통에서. - G

Source: Zukki travels with a caravan of other Khajiit. We are all from Senchal on the Quin'rawl Peninsula of Elsweyr. We have many young ones, and we take them everywhere. Zukki has no idea how they find their way back. Your components are enclosed.
Target: Zukki travels with a caravan of other Khajiit. We are all from Senchal on the Quin'rawl Peninsula of Elsweyr. We have many young ones, and we take them everywhere. Zukki has no idea how they find their way back. Your components are enclosed.

Source: These young Khajiit are so full of lies and bad manners. Zukki would turn them away if they didn't grow up to be such good salesman. Here is your delivery.
Target: These young Khajiit are so full of lies and bad manners. Zukki would turn them away if they didn't grow up to be such good salesman. Here is your delivery.

Source: I never had a friend like Karamel Little-Leaf, but I won't be pressured into a life of crime. I reluctantly told her I couldn't help her. Not with her scheme to rob the bazaar, at any rate. I can't believe how weepy I got. Not proper Nord behavior at all! But Little-Leaf gave me a good hug and said she understood. She really is a good friend.
Target: Karamel Little-Leaf와 같은 친구는 없었지만 범죄의 삶에 압박감을 느끼지 않을 것입니다. 나는 마지 못해 그녀에게 내가 그녀를 도울 수 없다고 말했다. 바자르를 도둑질하는 그녀의 계획에, 어쨌든. 나는 얼마나 우울한 지 믿을 수 없다. 전혀 적절한 노르 드 행동이 아닙니다! 그러나 리틀 리프는 나에게 좋은 포옹을했고 그녀가 이해했다고 말했다. 그녀는 정말 좋은 친구입니다. - G

Source: Congratulations, your Doom Wolf has arrived! You can find your new mount in your Collections window. Enjoy your adventures together!
Target: Congratulations, your Doom Wolf has arrived! You can find your new mount in your Collections window. Enjoy your adventures together!

Source: I'm drowning my guilt in mead. I didn't help Little-Leaf, but I also decided not to warn the merchants, either. Now I feel guilty about doing absolutely nothing! Karamel succeeded at robbing the bazaar. She smiled and blew me a kiss before she disappeared into the wilderness. I hope I see her again. I miss her already.
Target: 나는 미친 듯이 내 죄책을 익사하고있다. 나는 리틀 리프를 도왔지만, 상인들에게도 경고하지 않기로 결정했다. 이제 나는 절대 아무것도하지 않는 것에 대해 죄책감을 느낀다. 카라멜은 바자를 강탈하는데 성공했다. 그녀는 광야로 사라지기 전에 미소 지으며 키스를 날려 버렸다. 나는 그녀를 다시 볼 수 있기를 바랍니다. 나는 그녀를 그리워하고있다. - G

Source: Greetings. This one is called Zukki-dar, or simply "Zukki." He is a Baandari Trader by profession. Zukki knows little of what he is selling, save that he is charging a great deal too much for it, but as he travels the land he will look for items that might be of interest to you.
Target: Greetings. This one is called Zukki-dar, or simply \\"Zukki.\"\" He is a Baandari Trader by profession. Zukki knows little of what he is selling
column4: save that he is charging a great deal too much for it
column5: but as he travels the land he will look for items that might be of interest to you."

Source: Plucky has been trying to lift my spirits, but things haven't been the same since Karamel Little-Leaf went away. The high-spirited little Wood Elf really grew on me. You know what I need? I need an adventure! I think it's finally time to investigate the Dwarven ruins of Bthunzel! Now, where did I put Narsis Dren's map?
Target: Plucky는 내 영혼을 들어 올리려고 노력하고 있지만, Karamel Little-Leaf가 사라진 이후의 상황은 같지 않았습니다. 하이 - 센스있는 작은 나무 엘프는 정말로 나로 자랐다. 내가 필요한 걸 알아? 나는 모험이 필요하다! 드디어 Bthunzel의 드워프 폐허를 조사 할 시간이 온 것 같아요! 나시 스 드렌의지도는 어디에 두었습니까? - G

Source: Tavah's training continues. Today's lesson is to start the day off with a smile. That way it is over and done with. Tavah learns quickly.
Target: Tavah의 훈련은 계속됩니다. 오늘의 교훈은 쉬는 날을 미소로 시작하는 것입니다. 그렇게 끝나면 끝납니다. 타바는 빨리 배운다.

Source: Many Khajiit distrust the other races. This is bad business. Zukki has no prejudice. He dislikes everyone, equally. Your delivery is enclosed.
Target: Many Khajiit distrust the other races. This is bad business. Zukki has no prejudice. He dislikes everyone, equally. Your delivery is enclosed.

Source: Zukki is training a young Khajiit named Tavah. That one would sell you something, steal it back, then sell it to you again. It is not only dishonest, it is highly profitable.  Zukki admires that.
Target: Zukki is training a young Khajiit named Tavah. That one would sell you something, steal it back, then sell it to you again. It is not only dishonest, it is highly profitable.  Zukki admires that.

Source: Here is your delivery. It is this one's turn to cook for the caravan. Zukki enjoys cooking with moon sugar. Sometimes he even adds it to the food.
Target: Here is your delivery. It is this one's turn to cook for the caravan. Zukki enjoys cooking with moon sugar. Sometimes he even adds it to the food.

Source: It always amazes me how many people leave books scattered in the wilderness. Most of those I've stumbled upon are scholarly works and dry histories, but today I found a book of fiction that intrigues me. It is entitled "The Lusty Argonian Maid." I may stay at a common house tonight, and read it in my bunk.
Target: It always amazes me how many people leave books scattered in the wilderness. Most of those I've stumbled upon are scholarly works and dry histories, but today I found a book of fiction that intrigues me. It is entitled \\"The Lusty Argonian Maid.\"\" I may stay at a common house tonight
column4: and read it in my bunk."

Source: Here is your delivery. "The Lusty Argonian Maid" is a work of genius. Truly a classic that will almost certainly survive the ages. I wonder if there is a sequel. There were many unanswered questions.
Target: Here is your delivery. \\"The Lusty Argonian Maid\"\" is a work of genius. Truly a classic that will almost certainly survive the ages. I wonder if there is a sequel. There were many unanswered questions."

Source: I never seem to pack enough sweetrolls.
Target: 언제나 스위트 롤이 부족해지고 말았습니다.

Source: Last night I stumbled upon a group of revelers who greeted me as though I were expected. They gave me strong drink and many claps upon the back, and we had a grand time. I awoke with a curious tattoo.  It appears I am now a member of a fraternal organization called "The Morag Tong." They seem like fine fellows. I hope I run into them again.
Target: Last night I stumbled upon a group of revelers who greeted me as though I were expected. They gave me strong drink and many claps upon the back, and we had a grand time. I awoke with a curious tattoo.  It appears I am now a member of a fraternal organization called \\"The Morag Tong.\"\" They seem like fine fellows. I hope I run into them again."

Source: I try to keep your components varied and plentiful. Towards that end I have been trying to fish more frequently. I find it quite relaxing, as well as an excellent excuse for drinking while the sun is up.
Target: 나는 당신의 구성 요소를 다양하고 풍부하게 유지하려고 노력한다. 그 끝으로 나는 더 자주 낚시를 해왔다. 나는 태양이 위로있는 동안 그것을 마시는 것에 대한 훌륭한 변명뿐만 아니라 그것을 아주 긴장시키는 것을 안다.

Source: I came across an impromptu camp alongside the road. Tents and merchant stalls had been hastily assembled, and the place had the feel of a carnival or bazaar. The festive mood and genuine excitement of the crowd drew me in, and it wasn't long before I was trying to decide what tasty morsels to sample and which heady brews to drink.
Target: 나는 길 옆에 즉석 캠프를 발견했다. 천막과 상인 포장 마차가 서둘러 모여 있었고 그 곳은 카니발이나 바자 같은 느낌을 받았다. 축제 분위기와 군중의 진정한 흥분이 나를 끌어 들였습니다. 그리고 맛있는 음식물을 맛보기로 결정할 때가 멀지 않았습니다. - G

Source: I've been enjoying fishing. Though I'm not very good at it, it gives me time to think. After some time, and some mead, I began to feel a kinship with these strange gilled creatures. We are very much alike. We both get into trouble when we open our mouths.
Target: 낚시를 즐기고 있습니다. 별로 잘하는 편은 아니지만 낚시는 생각할 시간을 주어요. 그리고 조금 시간이 흘렀고 벌꿀 술을 조금 머금고 있는데, 이 기묘한 아가미 호흡을 하는 생물들과 일종의 유대를 느낍니다. 닮은 꼴입니다. 입만 열면 문제에 연루되니까요..

Source: I've met some intriguing people in my journeys, but few have been as bright and fun-loving as Karamel Little-Leaf. I bumped into the Wood Elf at the Seven Traders Bazaar, the traveling carnival I told you about. She's quick with quips and jokes, and she knows how to acquire free drinks—especially when the buyers are male!
Target: 나는 여행 중에 흥미로운 사람들을 만났지만 Karamel Little-Leaf만큼 밝고 재미있는 사람은 거의 없었다. 나는 세븐 트레이 더스 바자 (Seven Traders Bazaar)의 우드 엘프 (Wood Elf)와 부딪쳤다. 그녀는 퀴즈와 농담에 빠르며, 무료 마시는 방법을 알고 있습니다. 특히 구매자가 남성 인 경우 더욱 그렇습니다! - G

Source: My fishing expeditions have only been marginally successful. Recently I met a wily Argonian who said that a fisherman is really just a jerk on one end of a line, waiting for a jerk on the other. I should hunt more.
Target: 낚시에 나가도 좋은 성과를 얻을 수 없게 되었습니다. 최근 약삭빠른 아르고니아인과 만났는데, 어부가 낚싯줄의 한쪽을 팽팽하게 잡아당기는 것도 또한 기다리는 것이 멍청하다고 말하고 있었습니다. 앞으로 더 사냥을 해야 할지도 모릅니다.

Source: Karamel Little-Leaf may be my favorite person ever! Even Plucky likes her! We're having a grand old time at the Seven Traders Bazaar. She knows which brewers serve the most potent mead, and she's personal friends with a cook who makes the most amazing rabbit meatballs. She keeps hinting that she has something to ask me. I wonder what it is.
Target: Karamel Little-Leaf는 내가 좋아하는 사람이 될 수 있습니다! Plucky도 그녀를 좋아합니다! Seven Traders Bazaar에서 웅장한 시간을 보내고 있습니다. 그녀는 어느 양조업자가 가장 강력한 미드를 섬기는 지 알고 있으며, 그녀는 가장 놀라운 토끼 미트볼을 만드는 요리사와 개인적인 친구입니다. 그녀는 계속해서 그녀가 나에게 물어볼 게 있다는 것을 암시한다. 나는 그것이 무엇인지에 관해 궁금하게 생각한다. - G

Source: Apologies if these components are late. Rather uncomfortable today. I went into the woods to answer nature's call, and grabbed a handful of leaves to clean up. It was a small, glossy green plant with three leaves. I may have made a rash decision.
Target: 이번 물건을 보내는 것이 늦어져 죄송합니다. 오늘은 몸도 좀 좋지 않고 숲 속에서 볼일을 본 뒤 닦으려 잎을 확 뜯어 버렸습니다. 단지 그 잎이라는 것이 작고 매끄러워서 세조각으로 나뉘어져 있었습니다. 실수였습니다.

Source: Why do these things keep happening to me, patron? I hate to burden you with my problems, but you seem to be a good listener. And you do owe my for all the components I send your way. Turns out, Karamel Little-Leaf is a thief! She asked me to help her rob the Seven Traders Bazaar. Oh, what a terrible turn of events!
Target: 왜 이런 일이 계속 나에게 일어나는거야, 후원자? 내 문제로 당신을 짐을 싫지만, 당신은 좋은 청취자 인 것 같습니다. 그리고 당신은 당신이 보내는 모든 구성 요소에 대해 빚지고 있습니다. Karamel Little-Leaf는 도둑입니다! 그녀는 나에게 그녀가 7 Traders Bazaar를 도둑 맞도록 도와달라고 부탁했다. 오,이 얼마나 끔찍한 사건! - G

Source: A traveling merchant sold me a fine piece of armor called a pauldron. I don't know if it's supposed to go over my knee or my elbow, and I was too embarassed to ask him. I'm rapidly coming to the conclusion that life would be much simpler if I didn't try to understand things. It was a real bargain, though.
Target: 어떤 행상인이 \\\\\\\\\\"폴드론\\\\\"\\\\\"라는 좋은 갑옷을 나에게 팔았습니다. 그저 이것이 무릎에 대야 하는 것인지 팔꿈치에 대 것인지 부끄러워서 물어보지 못했습니다. 그래서 요즘은 사물을 이해하려고 하지 않는 편이 여러가지로 삶에 도움이 될 것이다 라는 결론에 이르렀습니다. 그래도 굉장히 좋은 쇼핑이 되었습니다."

Source: Another feather in the enormous, feathery cap of the Undaunted! Well fought! Your exploits have earned you this reward, and the resentful admiration of your peers. Lift a pint to their inferior valor! There's never been a better time to be Undaunted!\n\n- Maj al-Ragath, Undaunted and four-time Rotmeth drinking champion at The Outside Inn
Target: 언던티드의 빛나는 업적에 또 하나의 거대한 업적을 쌓았군! 잘 싸웠어! 네 공적들이 이 보상과 동료들의 질투섞인 선망을 가져다주는군 그래. 그들의 뒤떨어지는 무용에도 건배를! 언던티드가 되기에 이보다 더 좋은 시기는 없었다고.\n\n- 마즈 알-라가스, 언던티드이자 바깥쪽 여관에서 열린 로트메스 마시기 대회 4회 우승자

Source: I saw a Daedra for the first time. I can't get the image out of my head. For three nights running, I haven't been able to sleep at all. I feel pretty good, though. Just a little light headed. Trying to keep my wits about me and remain sane, so when the trees start talking to me, I refuse to talk back.
Target: 처음 데이드라를 눈으로 보았습니다. 지금도 그 모습이 눈에 선합니다.  사흘 동안 도망을 다녀서 한숨도 못 잤습니다. 조금 머리가 어지럽지만 기분은 나쁘지 않습니다. 아무튼 이성을 잃지 않도록 노력하고 있습니다. 비록 나무들이 나에게 말을 걸고 와도 무시하도록 하겠습니다.

Source: Sold that paldron thing at a nice profit, so I took on a big, burly sellsword just in case I run into more of those Daedra. He's got a big scar and an eye patch, and he doesn't talk much. He said his name is Immaterial. That's a strange name, isn't it? Components enclosed.
Target: 그 폴드론이 좋은 값으로 팔렸기에 다시 데이드라를 만나 버릴 경우를 대비해서 크고 강력한 용병을 고용하기로 했습니다. 큰 상처에 안대, 그리고 말수도 적습니다. 참고로 이름은 \\\\\\\\\\"비물질적인(Immaterial)\\\\\"\\\\\" 이라고 하는것 같습니다. 이상한 이름이지 않습니까? 물건을 동봉하겠습니다."

Source: Turns out the sellsword's name is "Kull." He doesn't talk much. I asked about his family, and he said "Dead." I asked if he was married. He said, "Twice. Both dead." I asked if he had many friends. He said, "Just you."  That made me nervous. Maybe he thinks a friend is just an enemy that's still alive.
Target: Turns out the sellsword's name is \\"Kull.\"\" He doesn't talk much. I asked about his family
column4: and he said \"\"Dead.\"\" I asked if he was married. He said
column5: \"\"Twice. Both dead.\"\" I asked if he had many friends. He said
column6: \"\"Just you.\"\"  That made me nervous. Maybe he thinks a friend is just an enemy that's still alive."

Source: Tales of your glory have grown long and dubious. Fitting tribute for a member of the Undaunted. I hope you enjoy the false sense of security that this gear provides. May it serve you well … until it doesn't.\n\n- Glirion the Redbeard, Undaunted
Target: 너의 영광이야기가 길게 이어지고 있다. 언던티드의 일원으로서는 좋은 경향이다. 이 장비를 받고, 가짜 안심감을 느껴라. 분명 도움이 되겠지... 도움이 되지 않게 될 때까지.\n\n- 언던티드의 붉은 수염 그릴리온

Source: As a reward for completing Cadwell's Silver, you've been granted the Soul-Shriven Style Motif, along with a number of Azure Plasm style items based on your tireless work destroying Dark Anchors.
Target: 캐드웰의 은을 완료한 보상으로, 영혼 없는 자의 스타일 모티브와 다크 앵커를 파괴하려는 노력에 걸맞는 아즈레 플라즘 양식 아이템을 받았습니다.

Source: The bards are singing your praises all across Tamriel. Only lavish tips and threats of violence can make them stop! It's a tough time to be a jealous milksop, but a fine time to be a true Undaunted. Keep raising the bar. I love watching grown Nords cry!\n\n- Maj al-Ragath, Undaunted and Four-Eyed Grog drinking champion at The Shining Star
Target: 음유시인들이 탐리엘(Tamriel) 전역에서 너에 대해 노래하고있어. 두둑한 팁을 주거나 공갈 협박으로만 노래를 멈출 수 있을걸! 질투하는 겁쟁이가 되기보다 진정한 언던티드(Untaunted)가 되기에 훌륭한 시기야. 앞으로도 계속 목표를 높이라고. 난 다 큰노르드(Nord)들이 우는걸 구경하는게 좋거든! \n\n- 마즈 알라가스(Maj al-Ragath), 언던티드이자, 아웃사이드 여관(The Outside Inn)에서 로트메스(Rotmeth) 마시기대회를 4회 우승한 챔피언

Source: Once again, you rise from the depths, alive and Undaunted. Bully for you. Please accept this reward and my tepid congratulations. Remember, for the true Undaunted, celebrations are sloppy but brief. Tomorrow brings more death and glory. Don't keep it waiting.\n\n- Glirion the Redbeard, Undaunted
Target: Once again, you rise from the depths, alive and Undaunted. Bully for you. Please accept this reward and my tepid congratulations. Remember, for the true Undaunted, celebrations are sloppy but brief. Tomorrow brings more death and glory. Don't keep it waiting.\n\n- Glirion the Redbeard, Undaunted

Source:
Congratulations! As part of your Gold Bundle, you now have access to the following DLC:

• Imperial City
• Orsinium
• Thieves Guild
• Dark Brotherhood

You can access this DLC by opening your Collections menu, navigating to the DLC section, and accepting the beginning quest for each DLC. You can also find these quests out in the world by exploring.

You've also received the Palomino Mount! You can find it in your Collections window. We hope you'll enjoy your adventures together!
Target:
축하합니다! 골드 번들의 일부로 다음 DLC에 액세스 할 수 있습니다.

• 임페리얼 시티
• 오시니움
• 도둑 길드
• 다크 브라더후드

이 DLC는 [컬렉션] 메뉴를 열어 액세스할 수 있습니다 DLC 섹션으로 이동하고 각 DLC의 시작 퀘스트를 수락하세요. 탐색을 통해 전 세계에서 이러한 퀘스트를 찾을 수도 있습니다.

팔로미노 마운트 또한 받으셨습니다! 컬렉션 창에서 찾을 수 있습니다. 모험을 즐기기를 바랍니다!

Source:
For purchasing Skyrim HD, your account has been awarded the following collectibles: 
•Gray Yokudan Charger Mount
•Dragon Warrior Costume
To view your rewards, please visit your collections menu.
Target:
Skyrim HD를 구입하실 때 귀하의 계정에 다음과 같은 수집품이 수여됩니다 : 
 • 회색 요쿠다 군마 마운트
 • 드래곤 전사 복장
 보상을 보려면 컬렉션 메뉴를 방문하십시오.

Source: Congratulations, your Black Cat non-combat pet has arrived! You can find it in your Collections window. We hope you'll have fun together!
Target: 축하합니다, 비전투 애완동물 검은 고양이가 도착했습니다! 컬렉션 창에서 찾을 수 있습니다. 같이 행복하게 살길 바래요!

Source:
For pre-purchasing The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind, you have received the Discovery Pack bonus features. 

• The exclusive Warden costume
• The exclusive Dwarven War Dog pet
• Three Vvardenfell Treasure Maps
• A Dwarven Crown Crate
• Two Crown Experience Scrolls

Your Warden costume and Dwarven War Dog pet can be found in your Collections menu. Your Crown Experience Scrolls and Treasure Maps are attached to this mail. Your Crown Crate has been added to your account, and can be opened from the Crown Crates menu.
Target:
Elder Scrolls Online : Morrowind를 미리 구매하려면 Discovery Pack 보너스 기능을 받으십시오. 

 • 독점 군장 복장 
 • 독점 드워프 전쟁 개 애완동물 
 • 바덴펠 보물지도 3개 
 • 드워프 크라운 상자 
 • 크라운 체험 스크롤 2개 

 군장 복장 및 드워프 전쟁 개 애완동물은 컬렉션 메뉴에서 찾을 수 있습니다. 크라운 체험 스크롤과 보물지도가 이 메일에 첨부됩니다. 크라운 상자가 계정에 추가되었으며 크라운 상자 메뉴에서 열 수 있습니다.

Source: Today I saw a spider so big and hairy it looked like it was wearing a wolf pelt. Is that even possible? Your components are enclosed.
Target: 오늘 엄청난 거대한 거미를 목격했습니다. 게다가 털 때문에 마치 늑대의 모피를 입고 있는 것 같았습니다. 그런 일은 있을 수 있죠? 어쨌든 당신에게 물건을 보냅니다.

Source: I awoke this morning feeling regretful that I haven't seen my beloved family in years, but it passed when I remembered that the reason I became an adventurer in the first place was that I really can't stand my beloved family. Especially Alphonse.
Target: 오늘 아침 눈이 떠지면 몇년이나 사랑하는 가족과 만나지 못한 것을 깨닫게 되고 후회하게 되었습니다. 하지만 원래 모험자가 된 이유가 그 사랑하는 가족이 지겨웠기 때문이라고 생각하자 후회하는 마음도 시들어 버렸습니다. 특히 알폰스의 때문에.

Source: As it turns out, Dark Elves are generous hosts when they aren't trying to kill you. Your provisioner components are enclosed.
Target: 새로 깨달은 것이지만 다크 엘프들은 이쪽을 죽이려 오지 않는 한 너무나도 관대한 사람들이죠.

Source: A quick note along with your delivery. I must leave this area rather quickly, having discovered the true nature of the Morag Tong. Would you happen to know of a reliable person who can remove a tattoo?
Target: 배달과 함께 빠른 메모. 나는 모라 통의 진정한 본질을 발견하면서이 지역을 오히려 빨리 떠나야 만한다. 귀영 나팔을 제거 할 수있는 믿을만한 사람을 알고 있습니까?

Source: Dear patron. My reckless approach didn't work out so well. Before I could get in more than a dozen hammer swings on Morella's thugs, she cast some sort of spell and vines snaked out of the ground to bind me. I was held fast. And what did Plucky do? He went over to nuzzle Karamel's outstretched hand. Betrayed again, and by my own dog!
Target: 후견인 여러분. 내 무모한 접근 방식이 그렇게 잘 풀리지 않았다. 모렐라의 심복에 십여개가 넘는 망치 스윙을하기 전에, 그녀는 일종의 주문과 포도 나무가 나를 묶어주기 위해 땅에 뱀을 던져 넣었습니다. 나는 빨리 붙들렸다. 그리고 Plucky는 무엇을 했습니까? 그는 카라멜의 뻗은 손을 손가락으로 찔러 들었다. 또 배신하고, 내 개로 배신했습니다! - G

Source: Today I discovered, on a dare, that there is no easy way to milk a Guar. Your provisioner components are enclosed.
Target: 오늘 나는 감히, Guar를 쉽게 먹을 방법이 없다는 것을 발견했습니다. 제공 업체 구성 요소는 동봉됩니다.

Source: Since I'm still writing, I assume you realize I escaped from the clutches of Morella the Cruel. The how of things is what makes the tale interesting. As the vines tightened around me and Karamel stroked Plucky's fur, I saw the Wood Elf smile and wink at me. Morella was delivering a villainous monolog while a dark figure snuck up behind her.
Target: 내가 아직도 글을 쓰고 있기 때문에 잔인한 모렐라의 클러치에서 벗어났다는 것을 알았습니다. 사물의 방법은 이야기를 흥미롭게 만드는 것입니다. 포도 나무가 내 주위에 조여지고 Karamel이 Plucky 's 모피를 치듯이, 나는 Wood Elf 미소를보고 나에게 윙크했다. 모렐라는 악몽 같은 모습을 드러내는 동안 악몽 같은 모습을 보였습니다. - G

Source: Here is your delivery. I wonder, do you know anything of Khajiit etiquette?  What is the proper way to respond when your host coughs up a hairball at dinner?
Target: 여기 자네 택배일세. 궁금한 게 있는데, 혹시 자네 카짓 예절에 대해 뭐라도 아는 거 있나? 저녁식사 도중에 자네 Host 가 털뭉치를 뱉었을 때에 적절하게 반응해 주는 법이 뭐지?

Source: Guess who rescued me. Go ahead. Guess! I'm sure you'll never figure it out. Shor's bones, I hardly believe it—and I was there! Narsis Dren, the famed explorer who once tried to show me his artifact, slipped into the camp and dispatched Morella the Cruel with a single blow to the head! And then Little-Leaf eliminated her thugs. It was remarkable!
Target: 누가 나를 구했는지 맞춰봐. 어서. 추측! 나는 당신이 결코 그것을 이해하지 못할 것이라고 확신합니다. 쇼어의 뼈들, 나는 거의 그것을 믿지 않는다. 그리고 나는 거기에 있었다! 한때 나에게 그의 유물을 보여 주려고 한 유명한 탐험가 인 Narsis Dren은 캠프에 들어가서 모렐라를 잔인하게 파견했습니다. 그리고 나서 리틀 리프는 그녀의 심복을 제거했습니다. 그것은 주목할 가치가 있었다! - G

Source: My latest traveling companion insisted on traveling at night, which was quite inconvenient and upsetting to my sleep cycle. I began to have my suspicions when he would leave the road to go hunting and return hours later with nothing to show for it. He swore up and down that he didn't know what a vampire was, then one morning it suddenly dawned on him. Have you any use for vampiric ash?
Target: 저의 새로운 여행 동료는 이동은 밤에만 한다고 말했습니다만 나에게는 평소와 수면 시간이 반대로 되어서 매우 불편하였습니다.  또한 노상에서 떨어져 혼자 사냥을 떠나 몇 시간이나 지나서 먹이도 없이 돌아왔을 때는 의심이 들기 시작했습니다. 그는 하늘과 땅에 맹세코 흡혈귀는 모른다고 그랬는데, 그 근처가 일출과 함께 밝혀졌습니다. 그런데 흡혈귀의 재는 뭔가 쓸모 없으시겠죠?

Source: One of the Khajiit put a lizard in my bed roll. It's difficult to laugh at a practical joke when your whole life feels like one. Your delivery is enclosed.
Target: 카짓 들 중 한명이 내 침낭 속에 도마뱀을 넣었어. 이 카짓의 삶 자체가 농담 같은 것이라는 생각이 들었지만 악의적인 농담에는 좀처럼 웃을 수 없더라. 네 물건을 동봉할께.

Source: I hope this delivery finds you well. The Khajiit gave me some sweet candy called moon sugar, and now I can't feel my lips.
Target: 이번 배달이 당신한테 잘 갔으면 좋겠군. 카짓이 내게 달설탕이라는 달콤한 사탕을 몇 개 줬는데, 입술에 감각이 느껴지지 않아.

Source: After two straight days of consuming liquor and moon sugar, I awoke to find that the Khajiit took to the road while I slept, abandoning me. I also can't find my pants.
Target: 이틀 연속으로 술과 문 슈거를 먹어 댔더니, 내가 잠든 사이에 다른 카짓들은 가버리고, 난 혼자 버려져있었어. 그리고 아무리 봐도 바지가 보이지 않아.

Source: The city guard arrested me and questioned me for hours, all because I arrived at the gates with no pants. They finally determined that I was harmless, and even gave me an old pair of tattered leggings. It must be Morndas. I've always hated Morndas. Delivery enclosed.
Target: 도시 경비병이 날 붙잡고 몇 시간 동안 질문을 했는데, 왜나하면 내가 성문에 바지도 없이 찾아와서였지. 내가 무고하단 걸 알아차리고는, 심지어 나한테 낡고 헤진 레깅스도 한 벌 주더군. Morndas 가 틀림없어. 난 항상 Morndas 를 증오했었는데. 물품을 동봉합니다.

Source: Here are your components. I do not like these Khajiit. They are sarcastic and crude and do not appreciate my better qualities. Today over lunch I tried to build a sense of camaraderie by inviting them to sing a bawdy tavern song. My overtures were brutally rejected.
Target: 당신이 요청한 부속품들 여기 있네. 이 카짓들이 마음에 들지 않아. 이 놈들은 빈정대면서 하는 일도 대충이고 나은 대우에도 감사 하나 받아본 적 없네. 오늘 점심을 먹으면서 동지애를 돈독히 하려고 외설적인 여관 노래를 노래하기 위해 그 놈들을 불렀어. 내 제안은 무참히 거절당했지.

Source: An item you listed has sold. (<<1>>)\n\nAttached is your profit, after deductions.
Target:
등록한 물품이 판매되었습니다. 

<<1>>

 세후 판매 금액이 첨부되어있습니다.

Source: An item you listed has been canceled. (<<1>>)\n\nAttached is your item.
Target: An item you listed has been canceled. (<<1>>)\n\nAttached is your item.

Source: You are one of the finest warriors ever to enter the arenas of Maelstrom! Here is the reward for your deeds.
Target: You are one of the finest warriors ever to enter the arenas of Maelstrom! Here is the reward for your deeds.

Source: An item you listed has expired. (<<1>>)\n\nAttached is the item.
Target: An item you listed has expired. (<<1>>)\n\nAttached is the item.

Source:
You purchased an item. (<<1>>)

The item you purchased is attached.

Note: Any items not retrieved within 30 days of delivery will be lost.
Target:
아이템을 구매하셨습니다. (<<1>>)

구매한 아이템을 동봉하였습니다.

주의: 편지를 받고 30일 내로 찾지 않으면 소멸됩니다.

Source: Close call on the road. A group of bloodthirsty Goblins passed so closely, they almost discovered my hiding place. I'm not afraid of death, mind you. I'd just like to avoid being there when it happens.

Traveling with another caravan, this time Baandari traders. I don't think these Khajiit like me. I've never been a cat man. I grew up with dogs. I think the Khajiit can tell this with one glance. Once nasty, sidelong, vindictive glance. Your delivery is enclosed.
Target: 현재는 바안다리 상인들의 캐러밴과 행동을 같이 하고 있습니다. 이 카짓들은 저를 별로 좋아하지 않는 것 같아요. 저는 제가 고양이 인간이라고 생각했던 적이 없습니다. 저는 개와 함께 자랐거든요. 이 카짓들은 그걸 알고 있는 눈빛이었습니다. 그것도 험악하고, 앙심을 품고 째려보는 눈빛이요. 물건을 동봉하겠습니다.

Source: Here are your goods. Interesting development. Kull saved my life. We were attacked by Orc marauders, and he took all six of them down without breaking a sweat. Maybe he is my friend.
Target: 당신에게 물건을 보냅니다. 그런데 흥미로운 일이 있었습니다. 컬이 내 목숨을 구해 준 것 입니다. 오크 약탈자들에게 습격당했을 때 그는 한순간도 머뭇거리지 않고 6명 모두를 무너뜨렸습니다. 그는 정말 내 친구인지 모릅니다.

Source: Today Kull informed me that he's returning to the city to take up the study of flower arranging. I'm going to miss the big lug, but we must all follow our passions.
Target: 오늘 컬을 보냈습니다. 그는 마을로 돌아가고 꽃 장식 공부를 시작한다고 합니다. 그 거한이 없는 것은 쓸쓸한 일이지만 누구나 자신의 목표로 길을 가야 하니까 상관 없습니다.

Source: I love Tamriel. It's just the people I can't stand. Components enclosed.
Target: 탐리 엘을 사랑해. 그것은 내가 견딜 수없는 사람들입니다. 동봉 된 구성 요소.

Source: Another meager delivery. It rained all night and the road is a muddy slog. I don't know if I'm over it, or used to it, but it's not bothering me as much as usual. Also, drunk again.
Target: 적을지도 모르겠지만 물건을 보냅니다. 밤에 비가 쏟아져 길은 진흙탕으로 변하고 있습니다. 저는 익숙해졌는지 극복했는지는 모르겠지만, 그 일에 옛날 만큼 초조하지 않게 됐습니다. 그리고 또 취했어요.

Source: Well, boss, as I was telling you last time, woodworking calms me. As you know, I'm an Orc, and I have an Orc's temper. Maybe even two Orcs' worth! My other businesses often require me to give my temper free rein. So at the end of the day I need to do something that relaxes me and lets the tension slide away. Sawing and hammering works wonders!
Target: 사장님, 지난 번 말씀 드렸듯이 목공은 나를 진정시켜줍니다. 아시다시피, 저는 오크이고 오크의 성질이 있습니다. 어쩌면 두 오크의 가치조차도! 내 다른 사업체들은 종종 내 성질을 자유롭게해주어야한다. 그래서 하루가 끝나면 나는 긴장을 풀어줄 수있는 무언가를해야합니다. 톱질 및 망치질이 놀라운 일! - G

Source: The female called Naamah continues to annoy this one to no end. This is probably because she lacks the power of conversation, but not the power of speech. Every time she opens her mouth, Zukki gets a fierce desire to be lonesome.
Target: The female called Naamah continues to annoy this one to no end. This is probably because she lacks the power of conversation, but not the power of speech. Every time she opens her mouth, Zukki gets a fierce desire to be lonesome.

Source: Writing this from a tavern, drinking mead and getting philosophical. I don't think I'll ever find true love. And neither will that toothless Khajiit over there. Or the lady with the mustache. Or pretty much anyone at table three.
Target: 선술집에서 이것을 쓰고, 미친 듯이 술을 마시고 철학적으로 생각해보십시오. 나는 진실한 사랑을 찾을 수 없을 것이라고 생각합니다. 그리고 저기에 그 이가없는 Khajiit도 없을 것입니다. 아니면 콧수염이있는 여자. 또는 테이블 3의 꽤 많은 사람.

Source: I had a visit from thugs working for the Khajiit known as Splendid-Paws. I decided to open a tavern across from his inn, and that has his fur standing on end. Doesn't he know that competition is good for the digestion? And I'm building the place with my own two hands. Consider it a massive woodworking project to help me deal with my anger issues!
Target: 나는 화려한 발로 알려진 Khajiit을 위해 일하는 사기꾼들로부터 방문을했다. 나는 여관 맞은 편에 선술집을 열어 결말을 보냈다. 경쟁이 소화에 좋음을 알지 못합니까? 그리고 나는 내 두 손으로 그 자리를 짓고있다. 분노 문제를 다루는 데 도움이되는 방대한 목공 프로젝트를 고려하십시오! - G

Source: Zukki will never understand humans. They work hard to earn gold, and then spend it on things they don't want, to impress people they don't like. How does this make sense?
Target: Zukki는 결코 인간을 이해하지 못할 것입니다. 그들은 열심히 일해서 금을 얻고 싶지 않은 일에 그것을 쓰고 그들이 싫어하는 사람들을 감동시킵니다. 이것이 어떻게 의미가 있습니까?

Source: Your next delivery is enclosed. I met a woman named Helga, and we had a torrid love affair that lasted all night. When we awoke and I gazed upon her in the light of the morning sun, she looked deep into my eyes and told me she wants to get married. I hope she meets someone nice.
Target: 다음 배송분을 동봉하겠습니다. 어젯밤 헬가라는 여성을 만나면서 그녀와 밤새 사랑을 나누었습니다. 우리가 깨어났을 때 나는 아침 햇살에 비추인 그녀를 바라보고 있었는데 그녀는 내 눈을 들여다보고 결혼하겠다고 말했습니다. 그녀에게 좋은 운명이 있기를 바라고 싶네요.

Source: Zukki meets many Nords in his travels. They may look like idiots and talk like idiots, but do not let this deceive you. They really are idiots.
Target: Zukki meets many Nords in his travels. They may look like idiots and talk like idiots, but do not let this deceive you. They really are idiots.

Source: Your provisioner components are enclosed. Interesting news. I just received a letter from my brother Alphonse. Apparently he was thrown into the King's dungeon for something he didn't do. He didn't run fast enough.
Target: 당신에게 식량 재료를 동봉하겠습니다. 그런데 재미 있는 소식이 왔습니다. 알폰세에게 편지가 왔는데 누명을 써서 왕의 감옥에 갇혔다는 것인데. 음, 하지 않는 죄를 추궁 받았다는 것 보다 \\\\\\\\\\"전력으로 도망 가지 않았다\\\\\"\\\\\" 라고 보이는 것 같은데 말이죠."

Source: With all of my other business ventures going so well, you're probably wondering why I continue to serve as a hireling for crafting components. That's a fair question. Woodworking calms me. It lets me clear my head and relax. Call it a hobby. I figure I might as well make some gold in the process, so here we are. Your materials are enclosed.
Target: 다른 모든 비즈니스 벤처 사업이 잘 진행되면서 왜 내가 구성 요소 제작에 대한 고용인으로 계속 봉사하는지 계속 궁금해 할 것입니다. 그것은 공정한 질문입니다. 목공은 나를 진정시킨다. 그것은 내 머리를 깨끗이하고 긴장을 풀어줍니다. 취미라고 불러. 나는 과정에서 금을 만들 수도 있다고 생각합니다, 그래서 여기 있습니다. 귀하의 자료는 동봉됩니다. - G

Source: Have I mentioned the Khajiit named Naamah? She travels with the caravan. She is very popular with all the young males, and she knows this. Every night she visits a different bedroll. One might say that she climbed the ladder of popularity wrong by wrong.
Target: 내가 언제 나마흐라는 이름을 가진 카짓을 말한 적 있나? 그녀는 캐러밴들과 함께 여행하지. 모든 젊은 남자들이 그녀를 원한다고, 그리고 그녀도 알고 있지. 나마흐는 같은 침구에서 다시 잠을 잔 적이 없어. 누군가는 그녀가 잘못된 방법으로 잘못된 인기를 얻고 있다고 하더군.

Source: On my way to mail this, I noticed a city guard was following me. When I confronted him, he told me I was just being paranoid. That's impossible. I'm the opposite of paranoid. I suffer from delusions that people like me.
Target: 우편으로가는 길에 도시 경비병이 나를 따라 다니는 것을 알아 차렸다. 내가 그와 대면했을 때, 그는 내가 단지 편집증 환자라고 말했다. 불가능합니다. 나는 편집증의 반대입니다. 나는 사람들이 저를 좋아한다는 망상으로 고통받습니다.

Source: While we'd never have cause to be disagreeable to one another, my other business ventures often require me to let my inner Orc out to play. I'm not proud of my violent tendencies, but they do help me keep the gold flowing. Sometimes you have to break a few legs to make a kwama egg omelet, am I right? At least, that's how my uncle explained it.
Target: 우리가 서로에게 불쾌감을 줄 수는 없지만, 내 다른 비즈니스 벤처 기업은 내 안의 오크가 게임을하도록 내게 요구하기도합니다. 나는 내 폭력적인 경향에 대해 자랑스럽지 않지만, 나는 그들이 금괴가 흐르는 것을 돕는다. 가끔은 kwama 계란 오믈렛을 만들기 위해 몇 다리를 부러 뜨려야합니다. 맞습니까? 적어도 삼촌이 그것을 설명하는 방법입니다. - G

Source: Zukki has had a very satisfying and productive day. Unfortunately, this was not it. Nonetheless, he has enclosed your delivery.
Target: Zukki는 매우 만족스럽고 생산적인 하루를 보냈습니다. 불행하게도, 이것은 그렇지 않았습니다. 그럼에도 불구하고, 그는 당신의 배달을 동봉했습니다.

Source: Hello, boss. If I don't sound like my usually cheerful self, that's because I'm upset. I've always felt a little bad after a client or a rival requires me to accidentally injure them repeatedly in the course of a transaction. It's the cost of doing business. But today's transaction has left me feeling out of sorts. Regretful, even.
Target: 안녕, 보스. 내 말이 평소와 달리 밝게 들리지 않는다면, 그건 내가 화가났기 때문일거야. 내 고객이나 경쟁자가 거래 도중 실수인 척 하면서 부상을 입으라고 요구 하는걸 좋아하지 않아, 때문에 그런 요구를 들은 후엔 항상 기분이 좋지 않았고. 이것도 사업을 하는데 필요한 대가라는데 난 잘 모르겠어. 하지만 하나 확실한건 오늘의 거래는 유난히 내 기분을 상하게 했다는 거야.  그리고, 후회 돼.

Source: Greetings, boss. Margog here. Another unfortunate accident sent Splendid-Paw's employees to the healer again. That's what happens when you wander into a construction site without paying attention to where you're walking. You fall into a pile of wooden beams and iron nails. Over and over again. Maybe now the Khajiit will mind his own business.
Target: 인사, 사장님. 여기 마고 그. 또 다른 불행한 사고가 Splendid-Paw의 직원들을 치료사에게 다시 보냈습니다. 그것은 당신이 걷고있는 곳을 주목하지 않고 건설 현장을 돌아 다닐 때 일어납니다. 나무 기둥과 철톱으로 무너집니다. 다시 반복하여. 아마 지금 Khajiit는 자신의 사업에 신경 쓸 것입니다. - G

Source: Another bandit attack on the road. Zukki believes that there are two kinds of people in this world: those who draw steel and stand up for themselves and those who run for the bushes. Bushes are better. They also offer shade.
Target: Another bandit attack on the road. Zukki believes that there are two kinds of people in this world: those who draw steel and stand up for themselves and those who run for the bushes. Bushes are better. They also offer shade.

Source: Sorry, I overslept. I hope these components still arrive in a timely manner. Sometimes I think that the only thing standing between me and achieving greatness is, well... me.
Target: 죄송합니다, 늦잠 잤어요. 이번 물품이 그래도 제때에 도착했으면 좋겠는데요. 가끔 자신이 위업을 이루기 위한 유일한 장애는 결국... 자신이라는 생각이 듭니다.

Source: My tavern should be ready for its grand opening very soon. I'm going to call the place "Hammer and Saw" because woodworking means so much to me. I'm one busy Orc! Crafting supplier, tavern owner, dealer in dubiously acquired goods, conveyer of illicit materials—like I said, an entrepreneur! Speaking of which, your materials are enclosed.
Target: My tavern should be ready for its grand opening very soon. I'm going to call the place \\"Hammer and Saw\"\" because woodworking means so much to me. I'm one busy Orc! Crafting supplier
column4: tavern owner
column5: dealer in dubiously acquired goods
column6: conveyer of illicit materials—like I said
column7: an entrepreneur! Speaking of which

Source: Why are these Altmer so serious? They never smile or laugh. If they find it so hard to laugh at themselves, Zukki would be pleased to do it for them.
Target: 이 알트머가 왜 그렇게 심각한가요? 그들은 결코 웃지도 웃지도 않는다. 그들이 자신을 비웃기가 너무 힘들다면 Zukki는 그들을 위해 기꺼이 할 것입니다. - G

Source: Here are your provisioner components. Interesting day. I got into a tavern fight. I really gave him a good shot to the knee with my chin, then got blood all over his fist, with my nose. That will teach him.
Target: 식량 재료를 보냅니다. 오늘은 흥미로운 하루였는데 술집의 싸움에 휘말렸습니다. 상대의 무릎에는 턱으로 타격을 주고, 녀석의 주먹에는 코피를 발랐습니다. 이것으로 녀석도 질릴 것입니다.

Source: Fahdah the Eyeful. She's a Redguard brawler whose brawn is matched by her stunning beauty. I've had the opportunity to watch her work as an interested bystander and her beatings are legendary. She accomplishes more with a look and a snarl, however, than most thugs can even get close to with a barrel full of weapons. I hope the healer can help her!
Target: Fahdah 눈알. 그녀는 그녀의 놀라운 아름다움에 부합하는 힘줄을 지닌 붉은 가드 싸움꾼입니다. 관심있는 방관자로서 그녀의 작품을 볼 기회가 있었고 그녀의 구타는 전설적입니다. 그녀는 외모로도 많은 일을하지만, 대부분의 심복은 무기가 가득한 배럴에 가깝습니다. 치유 사가 그녀를 도울 수 있기를 바랍니다. - G

Source: You're probably wondering what could have happened to make old Margog the Hammer into a melancholy horker. Where's the happy-go-lucky Orc with a million ideas that I hired, you're probably asking yourself. Well, he feels bad about something that happened the other day. And instead of evaporating like so much dew, that feeling remains. Guilt.
Target: 늙은 마고 그 해머를 우울한 마약 제조 회사로 만들 수 있었는지 궁금 할 것입니다. 내가 고용 한 수백만 가지 아이디어를 가진 행복한 행운의 오크는 어디에서 왔을 까? 저번에 일어난 일에 대해 그는 기분이 좋지 않습니다. 그리고 많은 양의 이슬처럼 증발하는 대신 그 느낌이 남아 있습니다. 죄. - G

Source: So what did Margog do to feel guilty about? I injured one of my rival's associates! That's right. Splendid-Paws got his fur in a bunch over something or another I did and sent a couple of thugs to teach me a lesson. That never works out well for either Splendid-Paws or his thugs, as you well know. But one of those thugs was Fahdah the Eyeful.
Target: 그래서 마고그는 죄책감을 느끼기 위해 무엇을 했습니까? 나는 라이벌 동료 중 하나를 다쳤다! 맞습니다. 화려한 앞발은 내가 모방 한 것을 모으거나 나에게 한 두발의 심복을 보내서 나에게 교훈을 가르쳤다. 그것은 당신이 잘 알고 있듯이, Splendid-Paws 나 그의 사악한 자들을 위해 잘 작동하지 않습니다. 그러나 그 깡패 중 한 명은 눈을 뜨게 한 파다 (Fahdah the Eyeful)였습니다. - G

Source: I heard you were fighting against the forces of Molag Bal. You know, the more I learn about that guy, the more I don't care for him. Good luck! Delivery enclosed.
Target: 나는 당신이 몰락 발의 군대와 싸우고 있다고 들었습니다. 그에 대해 더 많이 알면 알수록 그를 더 좋아하지 않아. 행운을 빕니다! 물건 동봉.

Source: Has Zukki told you about his brother Yakku, who was borish and spent his youth bullying Zukki? Word has come that Yakku passed away. He was involved in a tragic fishing accident. Zukki did not attend the burial, but he sent a nice letter saying that he approved.
Target: Has Zukki told you about his brother Yakku, who was borish and spent his youth bullying Zukki? Word has come that Yakku passed away. He was involved in a tragic fishing accident. Zukki did not attend the burial, but he sent a nice letter saying that he approved.

Source: Here are your components. I took a hot bath for the first time in months. It was very relaxing, until I noticed I had six toes on one foot. I panicked, sure that I'd been the victim of a dreadful curse, and went to see the best, most expensive healer in the city. Turned out it was just a blister.
Target: 당신에게 물품을 보냅니다. 몇달 만에 따뜻한 물로 목욕할 수 있어 마음이 편안해 집니다. 그러나 한쪽 발에 발가락이 6개 붙어 있다는 생각이 퍼뜩 들었습니다. 뭔가 무서운 저주에 걸린 것 아닌지 패닉 상태가 되어서 거리에서 가장 비싸고 우수한 치유사를 찾아갔습니다. 그 결과 여분의 발가락은 단순히 구두에 쓸린 것이라고 판명되었습니다.

Source: The caravan leader keeps a box for lost and found items. Yesterday the box went missing, so Zukki is being very careful not to lose anything until it is found.
Target: The caravan leader keeps a box for lost and found items. Yesterday the box went missing, so Zukki is being very careful not to lose anything until it is found.

Source: Another delivery for you. Rough day. I barely escaped another Brigand attack. Despite what the locals might tell you I did not "run like a scared rabbit." More like a brave and noble rabbit, who happened to be late for an appointment.
Target: Another delivery for you. Rough day. I barely escaped another Brigand attack. Despite what the locals might tell you I did not \\"run like a scared rabbit.\"\" More like a brave and noble rabbit
column4: who happened to be late for an appointment."

Source: I hope someday we'll all be able to put away our fears and prejudices, and just make fun of Nords. (Delivery enclosed.)
Target: 언젠가 우리 모두가 공포와 편견을 버리고 노르드들을 조롱할 수 있게 되었으면 좋겠네요. (물품을 동봉하겠습니다.)

Source: Zukki wonders about the future. What does it hold for him? Where will it take him? He thinks perhaps the future will be just like the present, only more expensive.
Target: Zukki wonders about the future. What does it hold for him? Where will it take him? He thinks perhaps the future will be just like the present, only more expensive.

Source: Your delivery is enclosed. Is it just me, or does every woman in Tamriel have severe emotional problems?
Target: 물건을 동봉하겠습니다. 그런데 탐리엘의 여성 모두 정신적인 문제를 안고 있는 기분이 드는 건 저 뿐일까요?

Source: Patron. Now that you have entered into a partnership with Uraviin Dres, there will be a few changes. First, I will be unable to send you personalized notes for the foreseeable future. That's just not my cup of flin. Second, your regular shipments will continue. Third, I will avenge myself against Veesk. After all, I am a scion of House Dres.
Target: 고용주, 우라빈 드레스와의 계약이 성사됐어. 거기에서 약간의 변경점이 있어, 우선 개인적인 편지를 보내는 것이 아마 당분간은 불가능해질 거야. 내 탓이 아니야. 그리고, 짐은 앞으로도 정기적으로 보낼 거야. 마지막으로, 베스크에게는 내가 직접 복수한다. 나 역시 드레스 집안의 막내니까.

Source: Being a year older has gotten Zukki to thinking about retiring from the hard life of the road. The trouble is, he has no other useful skills or talents. Perhaps he could go into teaching?
Target: Being a year older has gotten Zukki to thinking about retiring from the hard life of the road. The trouble is, he has no other useful skills or talents. Perhaps he could go into teaching?

Source: Here is your shipment. I hope it meets your needs. I decided to spend some of my savings to equip myself with better weapons for hunting and self defense. I got a new two-handed sword and a sturdy bow. I also got a new knife, but that's just in case of cake.
Target: 짐을 보냅니다. 필요한 물건을 갖추고 있으면 좋겠지만. 사실은 적금을 깨서 사냥과 자체 방어 때문에 더 좋은 무기를 샀어요. 양손 검과 튼튼한 활을 손에 넣었습니다. 새로운 나이프도 사두었습니다만, 케이크 전용입니다.

Source: I understand you're in the market for a hireling. Someone to acquire components for you. Materials. Of the woodworking variety. Then look no further! I'm Margog the Hammer, and I'm just the Orc for the job. My rates are cheap, my deliveries are on time, and I know Orcs who know Orcs, if you understand my intention.
Target: 재료를 찾아와줄 자, 재료, 목공 건설업자를 찾고 있다고? 더 이상 찾지 않아도 된다고! 나는 망치의 마고그이고 그런 일에 딱 맞는 오크다. 품삯은 싸고, 배달은 시간대로, 게다가 오크 사이에서 유명하다. 무슨 말 하고 싶은지 알겠지.

Source: This one hates growing old. Zukki's whiskers are white and his bones are weary. He is getting so old he is afraid to buy green bananas. Why does old age come at such a bad time?
Target: This one hates growing old. Zukki's whiskers are white and his bones are weary. He is getting so old he is afraid to buy green bananas. Why does old age come at such a bad time?

Source: Found another lizard in my bedroll. I hate lizards. They're creepy, especially chameleons. When you stop and think about it, at any given time, there's no way to know how many chameleons are right in plain view. Your delivery is enclosed.
Target: 또 담요 속에 도마뱀이 있었습니다. 도마뱀이 싫습니다. 기분 나쁘잖아요. 특히 카멜레온 같은 것도 매우 싫습니다. 그러고보니 어떠한 때에도 시야 안에 도대체 몇 마리의 카멜레온이 숨어 있는지 알았다는 것은 아니지만요. 물건은 동봉하겠습니다.

Source: The dog left Zukki and ran off with a necromancer, presumably for the bones. Zukki is sad at this development, but he should have known better than to trust an animal that is surprised by its own farts.
Target: The dog left Zukki and ran off with a necromancer, presumably for the bones. Zukki is sad at this development, but he should have known better than to trust an animal that is surprised by its own farts.

Source: I have an in-grown toenail and a huge pimple on my nose. And it just started raining. And my backpack split a seam. When I said, "Can this day get any worse?" it was a rhetorical question, not a challenge to the Divines.
Target: I have an in-grown toenail and a huge pimple on my nose. And it just started raining. And my backpack split a seam. When I said, \\"Can this day get any worse?\"\" it was a rhetorical question
column4: not a challenge to the Divines."

Source: Zukki is another year older today. He may not move as fast as he used to, but he cannot regret getting older. It is a privilege denied to many.
Target: Zukki is another year older today. He may not move as fast as he used to, but he cannot regret getting older. It is a privilege denied to many.

Source: Here are your components. I don't know why, but I seem to attract traveling companions that never stop talking. And the whole time all I can think is that I wish they'd finish so I can tell my own story that's not just better, but also directly involves me.
Target: 요리용 소재를 보내겠습니다. 왜인지는 모르지만 나는 어떻게도 수다스러운 여행 동료들을 끌어들이는 경향이 있는 것 같아요. 그럴 때는 늘 상대가 말을 멈추고 내게 더 더 좋은 이야기를 하게 하지 않을까 라고 답답한 생각을 하고 있습니다.

Source: I have a confession to make. I'm not supplying you with crafting components out of any sense of duty or obligation. I have an ulterior motive. I'm using the profits to finance my grander ambitions. You see, I plan to build an organization that has its fingers in all kinds of related businesses. I guess you could call me an entrepreneur.
Target: 털어놓아야 할 일이 있다. 재료를 공급하는 것은 의무나 부담 때문이 아니다. 다른 목적이 있다. 이익은 큰 야망을 위한 자금으로 하고 있다. 사실, 관련된 업계 모두로 이어지는 조직을 만들 생각이다. 창업가라고 불러도 된다.

Source: Zukki has decided that the reason he uses sarcasm so much is because it keeps him from telling people what he really thinks about them.
Target: Zukki has decided that the reason he uses sarcasm so much is because it keeps him from telling people what he really thinks about them.

Source: Some of my business ventures might be considered criminal. I'm all right with that. I supply the necessary services to meet the ever-growing demands, and if that's a crime then I'm a skinny Wood Elf! But never fear, boss. For you, everything will always be above board and totally honest. For the most part. And you have my word on that!
Target: 범죄를 저지르는 일을 하기도 한다. 조금도 신경 쓰지 않는다. 급속도로 불어나는 수요를 충족시키기 위해 필요한 서비스를 제공하는 것 뿐이다. 그게 범죄라면 난 철부지 우드엘프나 다름없다고! 하지만 걱정하지 마라. 너와의 일은 언제나 공평하게 하고 있다. 맹세해도 된다!

Source: This one lives every day as if it was his last, because one day he will be right. But Zukki is ready to meet his makers. Whether his makers are prepared to meet him is quite another matter.
Target: This one lives every day as if it was his last, because one day he will be right. But Zukki is ready to meet his makers. Whether his makers are prepared to meet him is quite another matter.

Source: Sorry if this delivery was delayed. I got lost in the woods last night and had to use the stars to get my bearings, which got me lost further north.
Target: 배송이 늦어지면 사과하겠어요. 어젯밤은 숲 속에서 길을 잃어버려 별자를 보고 방위를 확인하게 되었습니다.덕분에 더 길을 잃어버리고 주위를 둘러보니 더욱 북쪽으로 향하고 있더군요.

Source: Margog the Hammer here, sending greetings and salutations. I'm proud to say that my business has really taken off. As you can plainly see, the quality of my merchandise is of the highest caliber. It all has to do with my suppliers. I've made arrangements to provide the best materials to you on a regular basis. Arrangements that can't be refused.
Target: 망치의 마고그다, 안녕하신가. 내 장사가 잘 되고 있는 것을 자랑스럽게 여기고 있다. 보다시피 우리 물건은 일급품인데 그건 우리 도매원 덕분이다. 그쪽에 최고의 소재를 정기적으로 전달하도록 수배했다. 이런 거래는 거절할 수 없을 것이다.

Source: Did this one already mention that he does not like children? They are loud and sticky. But Zukki has learned many things from them, like how much patience he does not have.
Target: Did this one already mention that he does not like children? They are loud and sticky. But Zukki has learned many things from them, like how much patience he does not have.

Source: Your delivery is enclosed. Yesterday I was hunting in the vicinity of the village where I grew up, so I stopped by to visit with my mother. She had a nice talk.
Target: 물건을 동봉하겠습니다. 어제는 내가 자란 마을 근처에서 사냥을 해서 어머니를 방문했습니다. 어머니 쪽은 여러가지 할 이야기가 있었던 것 같습니다.

Source: This latest shipment didn't fall off the back of a merchant wagon--at least not all of it! But I jest. You'll discover as we get to know each other that Margog the Hammer has a wonderful sense of humor. I'm even funnier than most Orcs, or so I've been led to believe. All of my henchmen say so. Of course, that's what I pay them for! Ha!
Target: 이 최신 물품은 상인의 짐마차에서 떨어진 물건이 아니다. 아니, 전부 다는 아니지만! 농담이다! 교제가 깊어지면 망치의 마고그의 유머감각이 일급품이라는 것을 알 수 있을 것이다. 적어도 다른 오크와 비교하면 훨씬 재밌다. 부하도 모두 그렇게 말하고 있어. 물론이지. 그것 때문에 돈을 지불하는 거니까! 하!

Source: This one has never married. He recently heard that married people live longer, but Zukki doesn't believe that. He thinks it probably just seems longer.
Target: This one has never married. He recently heard that married people live longer, but Zukki doesn't believe that. He thinks it probably just seems longer.

Source: Back in the city today. I hate city people. I can tell how judgemental they are just by looking at them. Your components are enclosed.
Target: 오늘은 다시 거리로 돌아왔습니다. 동네 사람들은 싫어합니다. 첫눈에 봐도 그들이 얼마나 편견에 찬 존재인지 알거든요.당신에게 물건을 동봉하겠습니다.

Source: An unfortunate accident befell Splendid-Paws' associates today. They demanded their share of gold from my business. A business they had nothing to do with. That's when the hammer hanging over my work table slipped from its hook and bashed both of the poor fellows in the head. Repeatedly. I hope the Khajiit has a good healer on his payroll.
Target: 오늘, 화려한 앞발이 불행한 사고를 당했다. 나에게 일의 자기 몫을 요구한 것이다. 전혀 상관없는 일인데도. 그때 작업대 위에 매어있던 망치가 갈고리에서 미끄러져 내려와 불쌍한 두명의 머리를 내리쳤다. 몇번이고 말이지. 카짓 녀석이 솜씨 좋은 치유사를 고용하고 있으면 좋겠는데.

Source: Hello, boss. I hope this shipment of woodcrafting components finds you well. At least, I hope you're feeling better than those thugs the so-called Khajiit crime lord sent to talk to me. I understand one of them may not make it. I imagine this could lead to further trouble between the cat and I, but such is the cost of doing business. Am I right?
Target: 요, 목공 재료 적하물이 잘 도착하기를 바란다. 적어도 카짓 범죄왕이 나에게 보낸 깡패들보다는 기분이 좋을 것이다. 그놈들 중 하나는 가망이 없을 것 같군. 그것 때문에 고양이와 나 사이의 갈등이 더 커질 것 같지만 그것도 사업의 대가이다. 그렇지?

Source: Greetings, boss. It's me, Margog the Hammer. Since you seem interested in my various enterprises, I thought I'd tell you about my latest venture. I'm in the middle of establishing a method for redistributing appropriated goods in the town I call home. Turns out, someone already thinks they have that business locked up--and they're angry with me.
Target: 여어, 망치의 마고그다. 내가 하고 있는 계획에 관심이 많아보여서, 요즘 사업에 대해 전해주려고. 고향 마을에서 부정한 유출품을 유통시키는 구조를 만들어내는 중인데, 이 일을 이미 독점하고 있다고 생각하는 녀석이 있어서, 나한테 화를 내고 있다.

Source: Do I care about a filthy Khajiit? Do I care about his claim to have cornered the market on the redistribution of goods acquired by questionable means in my town? Of course not! Who does Splendid-Paws think he is? He's not my boss! He's not even an Orc! If he sends his thugs around here again, I can't be held responsible for what happens.
Target: 내가 불결한 카짓에 대해 신경이나 쓰던가? 내 마을에서 수상쩍은 방식으로 구한 물건의 유통을 주선하고 있다는 놈의 말에 신경쓰냐고? 물론 아니지! 그 화려한 앞발 놈은 무슨 생각이지? 걘 내 대장이 아냐! 그 놈은 심지어 오크도 아니라고! 만약 또 다시 그 녀석 조직원을 여기 주변으로 보낸다면, 무슨 일이 생기던 내 탓 마.

Source: The dog does not leave this one's side now, which is convenient should the need arise for him to bark violently for no reason, right in Zukki's ear.
Target: The dog does not leave this one's side now, which is convenient should the need arise for him to bark violently for no reason, right in Zukki's ear.

Source: Your deliveries are enclosed. Though it is not definite yet, I am considering signing up for the military so that I can support our alliance's efforts in Cyrodiil. I will let you know as soon as possible, so that you can find a suitable replacement.
Target: 물건을 동봉하겠습니다. 아직 확정은 없지만 시로딜에 있는우리 동맹의 활동을 지원할 수 있도록 군대에 자원하려고 생각하고 있습니다. 만약 그렇게 되면 나를 대신할 사람을 찾도록 최대한 빨리 알리세요.

Source: A Khajiit spends a lot of time on personal grooming. Dogs do not. This dog's idea of personal grooming is to roll in a pile of rotten fish. The dog is also very shaggy and unkempt. This one is surprised how often the dog gets up and Zukki realizes he has been speaking to the wrong end.
Target: A Khajiit spends a lot of time on personal grooming. Dogs do not. This dog's idea of personal grooming is to roll in a pile of rotten fish. The dog is also very shaggy and unkempt. This one is surprised how often the dog gets up and Zukki realizes he has been speaking to the wrong end.

Source: Please ignore my previous correspondence. I have decided not to join the army in Cyrodiil. Although I am firm in my beliefs, I decided that it would be a mistake to die for them, because what if they're wrong? Your components are attached.
Target: 지난번 이야기에 대해서는 잊어 주세요. 시로딜의 군대에 지원하지 않기로 했습니다. 저의 결심은 바뀌지 않습니다만, 혹시라도 만약 그들이 틀렸다고 한다면 그들 때문에 죽는 것도 틀린 것이 되기 때문이기에. 그리고 물품을 동봉하겠습니다.

Source: I'm glad I decided to keep working for you. You continue to be a generous employer. They say that money isn't the key to happiness, but I figure, if I save up enough I can just have a key made. Your delivery is enclosed.
Target: 당신 밑에서 계속 일하게 되서 정말 좋았어요. 당신은 고용주로서는 매우 관대합니다. 돈 만이 행복의 열쇠는 아니다라고 말 할수 있겠지만, 돈을 보관하려면 열쇠란걸 만들어야 되는 게 아닌가요? 어쨌든 물건을 동봉하겠습니다.

Source: I'm mailing this package and getting out of this city as quickly as possible. It's filled with criminals and thieves. The back alleys are so dangerous, you can get stabbed while you're getting stabbed. Must run, now. Being chased.
Target: 나는 부랴부랴 이 소포를 보내고 거리에서 탈출하겠습니다. 여기는 범죄자와 도적의 소굴입니다. 뒷 골목 따위는 너무나 위험해서 찔리고 있는 중에 찌르는 듯한 곳이에요. 쫓기고 있는 중이라서 도망칩니다. 그럼.

Source: Why is it that people seem to take such pleasure at feeling superior to others? Zukki is glad he is not one of them. He is far better than that. Here is your delivery.
Target: Why is it that people seem to take such pleasure at feeling superior to others? Zukki is glad he is not one of them. He is far better than that. Here is your delivery.

Source: Enclosed are your provisioner components. I hope you find them useful.
Target: 당신에게 보낼 요리 재료를 동봉하여 보냅니다. 유용했으면 좋겠습니다만.

Source: This one enjoys long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy him. Here is your delivery.
Target: This one enjoys long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy him. Here is your delivery.

Source: Madam Firilanya, at your service. A true pleasure to become your exclusive outfitter. Your sartorial expertise is known even in the Summerset Isles. With my extensive mercantile connections, I shall source materials so you may create the finest-fitting—and looking!—armors. I've enclosed proof of my diligence. Expect regular deliveries!
Target: 부인 Firilanya, 귀하의 서비스. 독점적 인 복장이되는 진정한 기쁨. 당신의 조예 전문 기술은 서머셋 제도 (Summerset Isles)에서도 알려져 있습니다. 내 광범위한 상업 관계로, 나는 재료를 공급할 것이므로 당신은 최고의 피팅을하고보고 싶을 것이다. 나는 근면 한 증거를 동봉했다. 정기적 인 배송을 기대하십시오!

Source: Between people trying to cheat him and people trying to accost him, Zukki feels certain that he has become Nirn's principle means of employment. The entire economy of Tamriel appears to be based on ruining Zukki's day. And that is on a good day.
Target: Between people trying to cheat him and people trying to accost him, Zukki feels certain that he has become Nirn's principle means of employment. The entire economy of Tamriel appears to be based on ruining Zukki's day. And that is on a good day.

Source: Once again, a timely delivery. I do hope you are pleased with the contents. The seasonal rains nearly washed them from the docks, but a good Altmer securing chain is worth its weight in gold. Unless you're imprisoned, of course.
Target: 이번에도 제때 배송합니다. 내용에 대해서 만족하실 수 있길 바랍니다. 계절 비 때문에 한 발자국만 더 앞으로 갔다면 부두에서 떠내려 갈 뻔 했어요. 알트머제 고정용 쇠사슬 덕분입니다. 그 무게는 황금만큼의 가치가 있었습니다. 그 쇠사슬만의 이야기라면 다르겠지만.

Source: Much as he has tried, this one simply cannot be optimistic about anything. But then, Zukki does not recall anything in his job description about being willing to poop sunshine on demand, so you will just have to deal with it.  Also, this one is out of wine again.
Target: 그가 시도한 것만큼이나,이 것은 단순히 어떤 것에 대해서 낙관적 일 수는 없습니다. 그러나 Zukki는 요구에 따라 햇빛을 비칠 수 있다는 것에 대한 자신의 직업 묘사에서 어떤 것도 기억하지 않습니다. 따라서 당신은 그것을 처리해야 할 것입니다. 또한,이 와인은 다시 와인이 부족합니다.

Source: I don't know why High Elven names confuse many throughout Tamriel, but to help bridge cultural differences I answer to "Miss Firi" or "Madam Lanya," as well as my given name. A competitor of mine once called me "Fishwife Firi," so I undercut her prices until she left town. I had to draw the line somewhere.
Target: 왜 하이 엘벤의 이름이 타미리엘 전체에서 많은 사람들을 혼란스럽게 하는지 모르겠지만, 문화적 차이를 메우기 위해 저는 주어진 이름뿐만 아니라 \미스 피리\"나 \"마담 라냐\"에 답합니다. 제 경쟁자가 저를 \"피쉬 와이프 피리\"라고 불렀기 때문에 저는 그녀가 마을을 떠날 때까지 가격을 낮게 책정했습니다. 어딘가에 선을 그어야 했어요. "

Source: This one is people-watching in the city. This one has noticed that there are two kinds of people in this world. Zukki doesn't like either of them.
Target: 이것은 도시에서 사람을보고 있습니다. 이 세상에는 두 종류의 사람들이 있다는 것을 눈치 챘습니다. Zukki는 그들 중 하나를 좋아하지 않습니다.

Source: It occurs to me that the collecting I do for you usually only takes up half of my day. That means I am fully employed half the time, so it follows that I am a part-time unemployee. It also explains why I am usually drunk by mid-afternoon. It's mid-afternoon. Can you tell?
Target: 최근 알았습니다만 당신 때문에 여러가지 물건을 모으는 것은 대략 반나절 정도면 끝날겁니다. 즉 하루의 절반 밖에 일하지 않는, 즉 하루의 일부는 고용되지 않은 것입니다. 제가 저녁까지는 술 취해도 되는 이유더군요. 그리고 지금이 마침 저녁이네요. 마음이 있나요?

Source: There is a stray dog following the caravan, and it fascinates Zukki. One can learn many things from a dog, including loyalty and perseverance. Also the importance of turning around three times before lying down.
Target: There is a stray dog following the caravan, and it fascinates Zukki. One can learn many things from a dog, including loyalty and perseverance. Also the importance of turning around three times before lying down.

Source: Your provisioner components are enclosed. I wonder, have you ever tried cooking with wine? I find it quite pleasing. I've even heard that some people add it to the food.
Target: 요리 재료를 동봉하겠습니다. 그런데 와인을 사용해서 요리해보신 적 있으세요? 꽤 괜찮은 것입니다. 안에는 음식을 넣는 사람도 있다고 듣었습니다.

Source: Zukki does not know why he works so hard to make others dislike him. It happens quite naturally without all that effort.
Target: Zukki does not know why he works so hard to make others dislike him. It happens quite naturally without all that effort.

Source: I ran into Helga, the woman who shared my bed some time ago, and we spent another night together. If she were a pair of boots I would wear her out. I just wouldn't wear her out in public.
Target: 조금 전 잠자리를 함께 한 헬가를 다시 만났고 또 하룻밤을 함께 보냈습니다. 그녀가 장화였다면 분명 빵꾸날 때까지 썼을 것입니다. 다만 공공 장소에서는 착용하지는 않겠지만요.

Source: Zukki is drinking and musing on the nature of morality, while the tavern keeper naps. What is just, Zukki wonders, and what is dishonest? Perhaps the distinction lies in what is right, and what one can rationalize. Wine puts Zukki in a better mood, therefore they won't miss a bottle or two.
Target: Zukki is drinking and musing on the nature of morality, while the tavern keeper naps. What is just, Zukki wonders, and what is dishonest? Perhaps the distinction lies in what is right, and what one can rationalize. Wine puts Zukki in a better mood, therefore they won't miss a bottle or two.

Source: I wish I could afford a mount. I imagine the best thing about traveling on horseback is that you no longer have to step in the mess other people's horses leave behind.
Target: 탈 짐승을 살 수 있었으면 좋겠습니다. 말을 타고 여행하는 첫번째 잇점은 다른 사람의 말이 남기고 간 것에 잘못 내디딜 위험이 사라지는 일이지요.
