챔피언스 서클은 당신의 최근 전투에 대해 들었으며, 전투에 발을 들여 놓은 것을 축하합니다! 이 날의 영광을 위해 또 하나의 시합을 완료 한 것에 대한 보상이 여기 있습니다! 에잇 디바인의 축복으로 내일 다시 우리와 함께하실 수 있기를 바랍니다!


- 전투관리관 리빈

Source: I heard tales of Dark Elf Saints made of gears and lightning. They caught my interest. Then I heard they were crushed by you, so my interest is gone. My compatriots say it deserves a toast, so I begrudgingly raise a mug to your glory. I'm not buying you a drink though. Find some newblood willing to wet your lips.
Target: 다크 엘프 성도들에게 기어와 번개로 만든 이야기를 들었습니다. 그들은 내 관심을 끌었다. 그렇다면 나는 그들이 당신에 의해 짓 눌린 것을 들었다. 그래서 나의 관심은 사라졌다. 제 동포들은 축배를 받아야한다고 말합니다. 그래서 저는 마지 못해 당신의 영광을 위해 잔을 올립니다. 나는 당신에게 술을 사지 않을 것이다. 입술을 적시고 싶은 새로운 혈액을 찾으십시오. - G

Source: This letter from Canon Llevule of the Tribunal invites you to come to the island of Vvardenfell in Morrowind to meet Lord Vivec. You can find Canon Llevule outside the town of Seyda Neen.
Target: 트리뷰날을 섬기는 사제 레블레(Canon Llevule)에게서 온 이 편지는, 트리뷰날 중 한명인 로드 비벡(Lord Vivec)을 만날 수 있도록 당신을 모로윈드의 바덴펠 섬으로 초대합니다. 당신은 세이다 닌(Seyda Neen)마을 밖에서 레블레를 찾을 수 있을 것입니다.

Source: Thank you for testing the Dungeon Finder Bonus Daily Rewards on PTS! We appreciate you taking the time to play a random Dungeon on PTS.\n\nThese rewards are only for testing purposes, and do not reflect any actual upcoming uses of this system.
Target: PTS에서 Dungeon Finder Bonus Daily Rewards를 테스트 해 주셔서 감사합니다! PTS에서 무작위 던전을 플레이하는 데 시간을 내 주셔서 감사합니다. \n\n이 보상은 테스트 목적으로 만 사용되며이 시스템의 향후 실제 사용을 반영하지 않습니다. - G

Source:
Greetings <<1>>!

The Circle of Champions has heard the rumors; gladiators shudder when they hear your name, the crowd roars when you enter the ring, the bards sing your praises after each match! I know a true Battleground champion when I see one and am honored to offer you this reward. May it help you to continue on your path towards greatness. Stay strong, Champion!

-Battlemaster Rivyn

안녕하십니까 <<1>>!

챔피언스 서클에서 어떤 소문을 들었는지 아십니까: 검투사들이 당신의 이름만 들어도 떨고, 당신이 링에 내려가면 관중들은 환호의 함성을 지른다더군요, 그리고 매 경기마다 당신에 대한 칭찬이 끊이지 않는다지요! 저는 진정한 전장의 챔피언을 만나게 되고 상을 줄 수 있어서 영광입니다. 이 물건들이 당신이 위대한 여정을 이어 나가는데 도움이 되길 바라며. 강해지십시오, 챔피언!

-전투관리관 리빈

Source: Prior Velan talked. I'm not proud of what I did to make that happen, but it was necessary. He kept saying 'thrice-written, once damned' and 'it comes for my words.' When I asked if he meant Hecul, he shrieked and began babbling. I couldn't make sense of it, half of what he said was 'abavarlor.' I've never seen someone so terrified.
Target: Velan 이전에 말했습니다. 나는 그렇게하기 위해 무엇을했는지 자랑스럽지 않지만 필요한 것이었다. 그는 계속 '세 번 쓰다, 한 번 저주했다'고 말하면서 '내 말을 듣는다'고 계속 말했습니다. 그가 Hecul을 의미하는지 물었을 때, 그는 비명을 질렀고 자지기 시작했습니다. 나는 그것을 이해할 수 없었다, 그가 말한 것의 절반은 'abavarlor'였다. 나는 그렇게 두려운 사람을 본 적이 없다. - G

Source: Prior Velan was most afraid of the Outcast Ruin's true name. 'Thrice-written, once-damned?' From my records, Sixul wrote it three times. Unless you count the etching he made from the River Ruin's walls. Does that count? I don't know how many times I've written it down. Two times? Three? Only in letters I sent. Do you still have them? Can you check?
Target: 이전의 Velan은 Outcast Ruin의 진정한 이름을 가장 두려워했습니다. '세 번 쓰고, 한 번 저주 받았어?' 내 기록에서 Sixul은 그것을 세 번 썼습니다. 강둑의 벽에서 만든 에칭을 세지 않으면 말입니다. 그게 중요할까요? 나는 그것을 몇 번이나 적었는지 모르겠습니다. 두 번? 세? 내가 보낸 편지에서만. 아직도 가지고 있니? 확인할 수 있습니까? - G

Source: Prior Velan said 'It comes for my words' and then would not stop saying 'abavarlor.' His own words became 'forbidden symbols,' replaced with that one Ayleid phrase. Davamin's journal entries kept repeating the word. Eron Salt's letters as well. Is it some sort of infection? Once it begins, does it signal your doom? Sounds like a curse of some kind.
Target: 이전의 Velan은 '내 말에 어울린다'고 말하면서 'abavarlor'라고 말하지 않을 것입니다. 그의 말은 '금단의 상징'이되었고, 그 하나의 Ayleid 문구로 바뀌었다. Davamin의 일기 항목은 계속해서 계속 반복됩니다. Eron Salt의 편지도 마찬가지입니다. 어떤 종류의 감염입니까? 일단 그것이 시작되면, 그것은 당신의 운명을 신호합니까? 어떤 종류의 저주처럼 들린다. - G

Source: Why such interest in this Outcast Ruin, and why did Davamin's journal repeat the Ayleid word for 'forbidden symbol?' Could it mean 'forbidden text?' If so, 'abavarlor' most refers to Hecul, the Outcast Ruin's real name. But why did it appear in the first place?
Target: 어째서 그들이 추방된 자의 유적에 관심이 있었고, 왜 다바민의 일지에 '금지된 기호'를 의미하는 에일 리드 단어가 반복해 적혀있는 걸까요? 이게 「금지된 언어」라는 것을 의미하는 걸까요? 그렇다면 「아바발로어」는 대부분 헤클, 추방자의 유적의 진실된 명칭을 이야기하는 것일 겁니다. 하지만 왜 이 이름이 처음에만 나타난 걸까요?

Source: Tomorrow the Little Scrapper makes port. Tonight I spend my last moments of relative calm with the Khajiit boatswain. I told him of the nereid that fled from me, weeks ago, and he said they fear a curse greater than their own. When I asked what curse I bore, he said, 'the abrasive beauty of a driven woman.' I'll miss the scruffy sea cat.
Target: 내일 작은 함정이 항구를 만듭니다. 오늘 밤 나는 Khajiit 보트와 상대적인 평온의 나의 마지막 순간을 보낸다. 나는 그에게 몇 주 전에 나에게서 도망 쳤던 네리 드 (nereid)에 대해 말했다. 그리고 그는 자신들보다 더 큰 저주를 두려워한다고 말했다. 내가 지루한 저주를 물었을 때, 그는 '운전 한 여성의 마력적인 아름다움'이라고 말했다. 나는 초라한 바다 고양이가 그리울거야. - G

Source: The caravan met another group of traveling circus performers, but these were not criminals, they were actually somewhat entertaining. But Zukki quickly became bored and his mind wandered. Soon he found himself obsessed with an odd thought. What do circus performers run off to join?
Target: The caravan met another group of traveling circus performers, but these were not criminals, they were actually somewhat entertaining. But Zukki quickly became bored and his mind wandered. Soon he found himself obsessed with an odd thought. What do circus performers run off to join?

Source: You've made a wise decision, dear. Granny Gravius's Gently Used Goods is going to take good care of you in these troubled times. When your other suppliers are coming up short, you can count on old granny to have everything you need.
Target: You've made a wise decision, dear. Granny Gravius's Gently Used Goods is going to take good care of you in these troubled times. When your other suppliers are coming up short, you can count on old granny to have everything you need.

Source: You see the strangest things in the city. Yesterday, Zukki saw a Sorceror turn into a tavern. This one made a joke. He is not surprised you didn't get it.
Target: You see the strangest things in the city. Yesterday, Zukki saw a Sorceror turn into a tavern. This one made a joke. He is not surprised you didn't get it.

Source: This one has many irrational fears, but Zukki's greatest fear is that he'll never get over all of his phobias. Here is your delivery.
Target: This one has many irrational fears, but Zukki's greatest fear is that he'll never get over all of his phobias. Here is your delivery.

Source: Now don't let my last message alarm you. Every order from Granny Gravius's Gently Used Goods comes with Granny's Guarantee. You'll get your deliveries even if Granny has to hike it out to you herself!
Target: Now don't let my last message alarm you. Every order from Granny Gravius's Gently Used Goods comes with Granny's Guarantee. You'll get your deliveries even if Granny has to hike it out to you herself!

Source: Good news! Granny hears the legion is on the march to give those bandits a good ole sweeping out. You can bet Granny will be right on their heels making sure her customers are getting the best in reclaimed goods every day.
Target: Good news! Granny hears the legion is on the march to give those bandits a good ole sweeping out. You can bet Granny will be right on their heels making sure her customers are getting the best in reclaimed goods every day.

Source: Granny here with a little bundle for her favorite customer. There's a cookie tucked in the parcel in case you get peckish on the road, unless those rapscallion couriers have been helping themselves again. They'll get a stern talking to, be certain.
Target: 여기 그녀의 가장 좋아하는 고객을위한 작은 묶음으로 할머니. 그 rapscallion 특사가 다시 자신을 돕지 않는 한, 당신은 길에서 peckish 얻을 경우를 대비하여 소포에 집어 넣은 쿠키가 있습니다. 그들은 선견지명을 가지고 확신을 갖습니다.

Source: My, my, brigandry certainly is on the rise on the outskirts of Cyrodiil. Granny came across the most beautiful carriage just upturned in a ditch. Had the most beautiful curtains and upholstery. Must have broken some poor dear's heart to have to leave it behind.
Target: My, my, brigandry certainly is on the rise on the outskirts of Cyrodiil. Granny came across the most beautiful carriage just upturned in a ditch. Had the most beautiful curtains and upholstery. Must have broken some poor dear's heart to have to leave it behind.

Source: The early worm gets the juicy bits, as they say. All the hard work those strapping young legionnaires put in has Granny's business booming again. She'll have to knit them a little thank you during the next slow spell.
Target: The early worm gets the juicy bits, as they say. All the hard work those strapping young legionnaires put in has Granny's business booming again. She'll have to knit them a little thank you during the next slow spell.

Source: Granny would like to let you know that she's got a fine surplus of leather sundries she doesn't have room for, so she's taking special orders. Color and suppleness limited by availability.
Target: Granny would like to let you know that she's got a fine surplus of leather sundries she doesn't have room for, so she's taking special orders. Color and suppleness limited by availability.

Source: Your delivery is enclosed. Did I mention the female called Namah grew tired of the Nord she ran off with? She has returned to the caravan, but she still wants nothing to do with Zukki. She says that Zukki is too condescending. Isn't that adorable?
Target: Your delivery is enclosed. Did I mention the female called Namah grew tired of the Nord she ran off with? She has returned to the caravan, but she still wants nothing to do with Zukki. She says that Zukki is too condescending. Isn't that adorable?

Source: Why is it that every time Zukki opens his mouth, some idiot starts making speeches? Here is your delivery.
Target: Why is it that every time Zukki opens his mouth, some idiot starts making speeches? Here is your delivery.

Source: The caravan met up with a troupe of traveling circus performers, but they turned out to be criminals who tried to rob us and we had to fight them off. Zukki did very well because he thought quickly. He went right for the juggler.
Target: The caravan met up with a troupe of traveling circus performers, but they turned out to be criminals who tried to rob us and we had to fight them off. Zukki did very well because he thought quickly. He went right for the juggler.

Source: Namah is infuriating. Zukki hates it when she asks him to drop everything just because he is doing nothing, because he was thinking of doing something and now he forgets what.
Target: Namah is infuriating. Zukki hates it when she asks him to drop everything just because he is doing nothing, because he was thinking of doing something and now he forgets what.

Source: Namah says I should eat healthier foods. Why would I do that? Even the healthiest Khajiit is just dying the slowest. Here is your delivery.
Target: Namah는 내가 더 건강한 음식을 먹어야한다고 말한다. 내가 그런 짓을 왜 하겠어? 가장 건강한 Khajiit조차도 가장 느리게 죽어 가고 있습니다. 여기에 배달됩니다.

Source: This one met a female minstrel that said she was a harp player, but Zukki noticed she was picking, not plucking. Lyre!
Target: This one met a female minstrel that said she was a harp player, but Zukki noticed she was picking, not plucking. Lyre!

이곳 챔피언스 서클의 군중들이 응원하는 가슴 벅찬 경기인, 배틀그라운드에서 당신이 거둔 최근의 승리에 경의를 표합니다! 당신이 매 순간의 결정적인 판단으로 얻은 영광스러운 메달들의 숫자를 보십시오. 이것들 말고 당신의 기량에 필적할만한 물건이 있을까 싶습니다. 이 보상이 다음 시합에서도, 당신이 놀라운 기술을 계속 보여주는데에 도움이 되기를 바랍니다. 당신의 승리가 계속되기를!

 - 전투관리관 리빈
